original: anyatheti yadi tasya sarvathābhāva eveṣyate na bandho na mokṣa iti /

original: pūrvaṃ baddho mucyata iti kṛtvā muktir api na syāt /
analyzed: pūrvam baddhaḥ mucyate iti kṛtvā muktiḥ api na syāt

original: atha vā kathaṃ na yathā prakhyāti tathā bhāveneṣyate sarvathā vā'bhāva iti parābhiprāyavyudāsārtham āha  tat kṣayān muktir iṣyate /

original: anyathā hi na bandho na mokṣa iti sankleśavyavadānāpavādadoṣaḥ syāt /

original: yathā grāhyagrāhakatvena bhrāntir udbhāsitā'pi yadi tathā syāt paramārthata evaṃ sati nityaḥ sankleśaḥ syāt /

original: evaṃ ca bhrāntimātrasyāpy abhāve sankleśābhāvo nityañca vyavadānaṃ prasajyeta /

original: evaṃ cobhayathāpi mokṣārthināṃ vyartho yatnaḥ syāt /

original: atha vā yena sangraho lakṣyate tat sangrahalakṣaṇaṃ /

original: tac ca kim artham uktaṃ ? atra hi grāhyagrāhakarahitam abhūtaparikalpamātramevāstīty ayuktaṃ /

original: ataḥ sūtrāntarair avirodhapradarśanārthaṃ teṣām iha sangraha ucyate /

original: atra hy abhūtaparikalpasya dvayarahitatā grāhyagrāhakābhāva uktaḥ /

original: sa punar dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragārthapratibodhaprayoganiśraya viśeṣaḥ kuśalo dvividhaḥ /

original: idaṃ vijñaptimātram ālambanārtharahitaṃ svabījaparipākād rūpādyābhāsaṃ vijñānaṃ pravartate na tu rūpādiko'rtho'stītyevaṃ grāhakopalabdhiṃ niśritya grāhyānupalabdhiṃ praviśati /

original: evaṃ hy anena vicārayitavyaṃ  utpadyamānam anutpannaṃ vā vijñānaṃ viṣayamālambeta /

original: athālambanagrahaṇakāle tasyātmātiśaya iṣyate evam apy ātmātiśayasyānyata eva darśanād anyadevotpannam ālambanaṃ gṛhṇātīti prasajyate /

original: tasyānantaram arthānupalabdhiṃ niśritya vijñaptimātrasyāpy anupalabdhiṃ bhāvayan laukikāgryadharmākhyaḥ prajñādisahitaḥ saparivāraḥ samādhir āmukhībhavati /

original: viṣayacihnaṃ vyavahāranimittaṃ paricchinnaṃ karotīti paricchedaḥ saṃjñā /

original: kena chādanāt kathaṃ vā chādanāt kliśyata iti ? ata āha  avidyayā yathābhūtadarśanavibandhād iti /

original: avidyayā hy adarśanātmakatvād bhūtadarśanaviṣaye pracchādite bhūtadarśanaṃ notpadyate'to bhūtadarśanotpattivibandhanād avidyā bhūtadarśanavibandhaḥ /

original: bhūtadarśanaṃ punaḥ prādhānyena lokottaraprajñā tat pṛṣṭhodbhavatvāt tat pṛṣṭhalābhāt tad avagamāc ca tat prayoga iti śrutacintābhāvanāmayī bhūtadarśanam ity ucyate /

original: bhūtadarśanavibandhād avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya ityevaṃ chādanād avidyayā kliśyate jagad iti /

original: kena ropaṇāt kva kasya vetyata āha saṃskārair vijñāne karmavāsanāyā iti /

original: tatra saṃskārā yat kāyikaṃ karma vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyasvarūpaṃ tat punar bhavam abhisaṃskarotīti saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra saṃskārāḥ yat kāyikam karma vācikam mānasam ca puṇya apuṇya an iñjya svarūpam tat punar bhavam abhisaṃskaroti iti saṃskāraḥ
apraṇihitam rohayati iti arthaḥ

original: tadeva ca saṃskāraśabdenocyate na tu sarvaṃ /

original: taccābidyādhipatyāt punar bhavam ākṣeptuṃ samarthaṃ bhavati na sattāmātreṇetyavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ity ucyate /
analyzed: tat ca abidyā ādhipatyāt punar bhavam ākṣeptum samartham bhavati na sattā mātreṇa iti avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ iti ucyate

original: tathāhi tāny anutpannavidyasya punarbhavaṃ saṃskurvanti notpannavidyasya /

original: na cādhipatyamātreṇaivāvidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya ucyate sāmānyena sā samutthānapratyayopi /
analyzed: na ca ādhipatya mātreṇa eva avidyā saṃskārāṇām pratyayaḥ ucyate sāmānyena sā samutthāna pratyayaḥ api

original: avidhyā hi samprayuktvādhyathā sarvakleṣānāṃ sāmānyena samutyānapratyayastayā tatsamuttyā nāṃ cetanānām api /
analyzed: avidhyā hi samprayuktvā adhyathā sarva kleṣānām sāmānyena samutyāna pratyayaḥ tayā tad samuttyāḥ nām cetanānām api

original: api saṃskārāṇāṃ bhavabhogabhedaprārthanānvayānāṃ samutthāne tat sahabhūtā'vidyā sāmānyapratyayaḥ /

original: āniñjyānām api tad bhūminiḥsaranadṛṣṭisamutthānānāṃ tat sahabhūtā'vidyā sāmānyapratyaya iti saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya uktaḥ /
analyzed: āniñjyānām api tat bhūmi niḥsarana dṛṣṭi samutthānānām tat sahabhūtā avidyā sāmānya pratyayaḥ iti saṃskārāṇām pratyayaḥ uktaḥ

original: vijñāna iti atrālayavijñānam abhipretaṃ na tu pravṛttivijñānaṃ /

original: vyuparatapravṛttivijñānasyotpattisthānanayanā'sambhavāt kuśalakliṣṭayoś ca samavadhānābhāvāt saṃskārais tatra karmavāsanāyāḥ pratiṣṭhāpanābhāvāt /

original: kā punar iyaṃ karmavāsanā nāma ? anāgatasya janmano bījaṃ hetubhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kā punar iyam karma vāsanā nāma anāgatasya janmanaḥ bījam hetu bhāvaḥ

original: tad yathā brīhiphalaṃ bhūmibhasmapurīṣādipratyayaviśeṣam apekṣya pariṇamad ankurotpattau hetubhūtaṃ bījam iti /

original: pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ punaratra vijñānasantāne tat prathamatas tad bījasyāpy āyanaṃ /

original: evaṃ saṃskārair vijñāne punarbhāvabījādhānāj jagat kliśyate /

original: ārūpyasamāpatīlābhino hi yatraiva cyavante tatraivotpadyanta iti katham ārūpyeṣūpapattisthānaprāpaṇam iti tad yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ nāmarūpavat /

anga pratyanga paripūritāḥ ca ṣaṣ āyatana avasthāyām eva

original: trayāṇāṃ hīndriyaviṣayavijñānasannipāte indriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yastriprakāro vikāras tat paricchedaḥ sparśaḥ /
analyzed: trayāṇām hi indriya viṣaya vijñāna sannipāte indriyasya sukha ādi vedanā utpatti anukūlaḥ yaḥ tri prakāraḥ vikāraḥ tat paricchedaḥ sparśaḥ

original: ata evāyam indriyavikārasādṛśyaṃ spṛśati tadākāratayeti sparśa ucyate /

original: atha vā ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa indriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlaṃ trividhaṃ vikāraṃ prasūte /

original: vedanā hi tṛṣṇayopabhujyate āsvādyata ity arthaḥ /

atha vā upabhogaḥ atra vedanāyāḥ anubhavaḥ

original: sukhādiṣucānubhūyamāneṣu tatra sukhādiparipoṣaṇād anurāgapratighamohaiḥ kliśyate jagat /

original: karṣaṇāt kena kasya veti na vijñāyata ity ata āha tṛṣṇayā karmākṣiptasya punar bhavasyeti /
analyzed: karṣaṇāt kena kasya vā iti na vijñāyate iti atas āha tṛṣṇayā karma ākṣiptasya punar bhavasya iti

original: saṃskārair vijñāne bījaparipoṣaṇenākṣiptasya punar bhavasyodaka kalpayā tṛṣṇayā sarvagatiṣv aviśeṣeṇātmabhāvābhilāṣayā yadārdrīkṛtaḥ puar bhava utpattāv upayunkte utpattiṃ cāvasthāpayati tat karṣaṇaṃ /

nibandhanāt

original: kena nibandhanāt kva kasya veti praśnāvakāśe svayam evāha upādānair vijñānasyopapattyanukūleṣu kāmādiṣv iti /

original: chandarāgalakṣaṇaiścaturbhir upādānair karmākṣiptaṃ vijñānam utpattyanukūleṣu kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādeṣu nibadhnāti avasthāpayati ca vijñānaṃ hi cchandarāgavaśāt tatra vartate /

original: ābhimukhyādity atrāpi parapraśnāvakāśe svayamevaha bhavena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ punar bhava vipākadānāyābhimukhīkaraṇād iti /
analyzed: ābhimukhyāt iti atra api parapraśna avakāśe svayam eva ha bhavena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ punar bhava vipāka dānāya abhimukhīkaraṇāt iti

original: yathānibandhanaṃ vijñānasya pūrvakṛtaṃ karma paunarbhavikaṃ vāsanāvasthaṃ vipākaphalaṃ prati vṛttilambhanād bhavaḥ sadbhūta ākṣiptabhavaś ca nirvṛttaye'bhimukhībhavati evaṃ bhavenābhimukhīkaraṇāj jagat kliśyate /

duḥkhitāt jātyā jarā maraṇena ca
kim kliśyate jagat iti

original: evaṃ bhavāt punarbhavābhinirvṛttau satyāmādita eva garbhādhāne śukraśoṇite vijñānasammūrcchanāt kliśyate /

original: tathā ca mātubhojanacaryayoḥ sankaṭaghunoraparityāgād api kliśyate /

tathā sambhādhe na aśucinā mārgeṇa nirgacchati

original: kliśyate jagaj jātaṃ punar jarayā khālityapālityādilakṣaṇayā maraṇena ca nāmarūpabhedalakṣaṇena priyābhyāṃ yauvanajīvitābhyāṃ bhraśyamānaṃ /
analyzed: kliśyate jagat jātam punar jarayā khālitya pālitya ādi lakṣaṇayā maraṇena ca nāma rūpa bheda lakṣaṇena priyābhyām yauvana jīvitābhyām bhraśyamānam
kliśyate jagat iti
gacchati iti jagat
sa bhāga avakāśāt kṣaṇa avakāśam gacchati iti arthaḥ

original: kliśYata iti jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādibhis traidhātuke kṣaṇaparamparayā''javañjavībhāvena ca pīḍyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kliśyate iti jāti jarā vyādhi maraṇa ādibhiḥ traidhātuke kṣaṇa paramparayā āja vañjavībhāvena ca pīḍyate iti arthaḥ

original: kliśyata iti na vyavadāyata ity apare /
analyzed: kliśyate iti na vyavadāyate iti apare

original: evam ayaṃ sankleśalakṣaṇo dvādaśāngaḥ pratītyasamutpādaśchādanādyekādaśabhir arthair vyavadānavipakṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam ayam san kleśa lakṣaṇaḥ dvādaśa angaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ chādana ādi ekādaśabhiḥ arthaiḥ vyavadāna vipakṣaḥ
avidyā ādi utpatti kramaḥ pūrva pūrvasya uttara uttara āvāhanāt
tredhā san kleśaḥ kleśa saṃkleśaḥ karma san kleśaḥ janma san kleśaḥ ca
tatra kleśa san kleśaḥ avidyā tṛṣṇā upādānāni
karma san kleśaḥ saṃskārāḥ bhavaḥ ca
janma saṃkleśaḥ śeṣāṇi angāni
dvedhā saṃkleśaḥ hetu saṃkleśaḥ phala saṃkleśaḥ ca
tatra hetu saṃkleśaḥ kleśa karma svabhāvaiḥ angaiḥ
phala saṃkleśaḥ ca śeṣaiḥ

original: saptadhā saṃkleśaḥ saptavidho hetuḥ viparyāsahetuḥ ākṣepahetuḥ upanayahetuḥ parigrahahetuḥ upabhogahetuḥ ākarṣaṇahetuḥ udvegahetuś ca  /
analyzed: saptadhā saṃkleśaḥ saptavidhaḥ hetuḥ viparyāsa hetuḥ ākṣepa hetuḥ upanaya hetuḥ parigraha hetuḥ upabhoga hetuḥ ākarṣaṇa hetuḥ udvega hetuḥ ca
tatra viparyāsa hetuḥ avidyā
ākṣepa hetuḥ saṃskārāḥ
upanaya hetuḥ vijñānam
parigraha hetuḥ nāma rūpa ṣaṣ āyatane
upabhoga hetuḥ sparśa vedane
ākarṣaṇa hetuḥ tṛṣṇā upādāna bhavāḥ
udvega hetuḥ jāti jarā maraṇe
sacas ca eṣa saṃkleśaḥ abhūta parikalpāt pravartate iti

original: katividhaḥ punar anena dvādaśāngena na pratītyasamutpādena samāsataḥ saṃkleśaḥ pradarśita ityata evedam ucyate so'yaṃ dvādaśāngaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ  tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhā iti /
analyzed: katividhaḥ punar anena dvādaśa angena na pratītyasamutpādena samāsatas saṃkleśaḥ pradarśitaḥ iti atas eva idam ucyate saḥ ayam dvādaśa angaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhā iti
ca śabdaḥ samuccaya arthaḥ parivarta arthaḥ ca
kleśaḥ eva saṃkleśaḥ iti kleśa saṃkleśaḥ
evam karma janma saṃkleśau

original: kleśo hi pravartamānaḥ svaparātmanor vyābādhakatvāt saṃkleśaḥ /
analyzed: kleśaḥ hi pravartamānaḥ sva para ātmanoḥ vyābādhaka tvāt saṃkleśaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ sūtre'pi  rakto rāgaparīta ātmavyābādhāyāpi cetayate paravyābādhāyā'pi cetayate /
analyzed: yathā uktam sūtre api raktaḥ rāga parītaḥ ātma vyābādhāya api cetayate para vyābādhāya api cetayate
ubhaya vyābādāya api cetayate
evam dveṣaḥ mohaḥ ca api veditavyaḥ iti
karma janma saṃkleśayoḥ ca utpādaka tvāt saṃkleśaḥ

original: tathā hi kleśādhipatyena karma janmākṣipati dṛṣṭasatyasya satyapi karmaṇi punar bhavākṣepābhāvāt kleśasamudācāreṇa punar bhavabījasya bhavīkaraṇāt kliṣṭacittasya ca punarbhavapratisandhibandhāj janma sankleśenaiva hetunā /
analyzed: tathā hi kleśa ādhipatyena karma janma ākṣipati dṛṣṭa satyasya sati api karmaṇi punar bhava ākṣepa abhāvāt kleśa samudācāreṇa punar bhava bījasya bhavīkaraṇāt kliṣṭa cittasya ca punar bhava pratisandhi bandhāt janma san kleśena eva hetunā
tatas arhataḥ pratisandhi bandha abhāvaḥ kliṣṭa citta abhāvāt

original: karma ca śubhāśubhaṃ tadātve kāyacittayor āyāsanimittatvād āyatyāñca vipākadānāt sankleśaḥ /
analyzed: karma ca śubha aśubham tadātve kāya cittayoḥ āyāsa nimitta tvāt āyatyām ca vipāka dānāt san kleśaḥ
janma api sarva upadrava āspada tvāt san kleśaḥ iti
tredhā san kleśaḥ
hetoḥ dvidhā bhedāt
kleśa san kleśaḥ vidyā tṛṣṇā upādānāni iti tritayam api kleśa ātmaka tvāt

original: karmasankleśaḥ saṃskārā bhavaśceti  dvayam api karmātmakatvāt /
analyzed: karma san kleśaḥ saṃskārāḥ bhavaḥ ca iti dvayam api karma ātmaka tvāt

original: ayantu viśeṣaḥ  svarūpāvasthaṃ karma saṃskārāḥ bījāvasthaṃ bhava iti /
analyzed: ayantu viśeṣaḥ svarūpa avastham karma saṃskārāḥ bīja avastham bhavaḥ iti
janma saṃkleśaḥ śeṣāṇi angāni iti vijñāna nāma rūpa ṣaṣ āyatana sparśa vedanā jāti jarā maraṇāni eṣām janma sangṛhīta tvāt
dvedhā saṃkleśaḥ hetu phalābhyām prabhidyate
hetu saṃkleśaḥ kleśa karma svabhāvaiḥ angaiḥ
phala saṃkleśaḥ ca śeṣaiḥ angaiḥ iti

original: tatra hetusaṃkleśatvaṃ karmakleśānāṃ vijñānādivedanāparyantaṃ jātyātmakaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnavajanma sampādayitum abhipravṛttatvāt /
analyzed: tatra hetu saṃkleśa tvam karma kleśānām vijñāna ādi vedanā paryantam jāti ātmakam jarā maraṇa ādīnava janma sampādayitum abhipravṛtta tvāt
phala saṃkleśaḥ ca śeṣaiḥ vijñāna ādibhiḥ karma kleśa phala tvāt

original: punaḥ sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptadhā saṃkleśa iti viparyāsākṣepopanayaparigrahopabhogākarṣaṇodvegahetutvāt saptavidho hetuḥ /
analyzed: punar saḥ eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptadhā saṃkleśaḥ iti viparyāsa ākṣepa upanaya parigraha upabhoga ākarṣaṇa udvega hetu tvāt saptavidhaḥ hetuḥ
tatra viparyāsa hetuḥ avidyā iti

original: avidyāgato hi tattvasammohād anityādīn nityādirūpeṇa viparyasyatīti /
analyzed: avidyā gataḥ hi tattva sammohāt anitya ādīn nitya ādi rūpeṇa viparyasyati iti

original: ākṣepahetuḥ saṃskārā iti vijñāne caturangātmajanmabījasya pratiṣṭhāpanāt /
analyzed: ākṣepa hetuḥ saṃskārāḥ iti vijñāne catur anga ātma janma bījasya pratiṣṭhāpanāt
upanaya hetuḥ vijñānam iti iha cyutasya upapatti viṣayaḥ upanayanāt

original: parigrahahetur nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatana ity upanītasya nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanābhyāṃ nikāyasabhāgaparigrahāt /
analyzed: parigraha hetuḥ nāma rūpa ṣaṣ āyatanaḥ iti upanītasya nāma rūpa ṣaṣ āyatanābhyām nikāya sa bhāga parigrahāt

original: pūrvaṃ nāmarūpeṇaiva parigraha ukto jarāyujādikāṃ yonim abhipretya idānīm upapādukam adhikṛtya ṣaḍāyatanenā'pi parigraha uktaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam nāma rūpeṇa eva parigrahaḥ uktaḥ jarāyu ja ādikām yonim abhipretya idānīm upapādukam adhikṛtya ṣaṣ āyatanena api parigrahaḥ uktaḥ

original: atha vā nāmarūpeṇa tat prathamata ātmabhāvamātrasya sangraho vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā nāma rūpeṇa tat prathamatas ātma bhāva mātrasya sangrahaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: iha tv aparipūrṇasya paripūrṇasya ceti nāsti virodhaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu a paripūrṇasya paripūrṇasya ca iti na asti virodhaḥ
upabhoga hetuḥ sparśa vedanaḥ iti
sa kāraṇena anubhavena kuśala akuśala karma vipākasya upabhogāt
ākarṣaṇa hetuḥ tṛṣṇā upādāna bhavāḥ iti

original: sa upabhuktakarmavipāko bālas tasyāṃ tasyāṃ vedanāyāṃ tṛṣyati /
analyzed: saḥ upabhukta karma vipākaḥ bālaḥ tasyām tasyām vedanāyām tṛṣyati

original: vivṛddhatṛṣṇaś ca tat saṃyogatṛṣṇayā kāmādīn upādatte /
analyzed: vivṛddha tṛṣṇaḥ ca tat saṃyoga tṛṣṇayā kāma ādīn upādatte

original: tad upādānāc cāsya pūrvabhūtaṃ paunarbhavikaṃ karma vāsanāvasthaṃ pariṇataṃ yathākṣiptavipākadānayā pravṛttiṃ labdhvā bhavo bhavati /
analyzed: tat upādānāt ca asya pūrva bhūtam paunarbhavikam karma vāsanā avastham pariṇatam yathā ākṣipta vipāka dānayā pravṛttim labdhvā bhavaḥ bhavati

original: sa ca tṛṣṇopādānabhavaḥ saṃskārākṣiptaḥ punar bhavābhinirvṛttaya ākṛṣyate abhimukhīkriyata iti tṛṣṇopādānabhavā ākarṣaṇahetuḥ /
analyzed: sa ca tṛṣṇā upādāna bhavaḥ saṃskāra ākṣiptaḥ punar bhava abhinirvṛttaye ākṛṣyate abhimukhīkriyate iti tṛṣṇā upādāna bhavāḥ ākarṣaṇa hetuḥ
atha vā tṛṣṇā vaśena chanda rāga anurūpa anyatara karma vāsanā abhimukhāt tṛṣṇā upādāna bhavā ākarṣaṇa hetuḥ

original: udvegahetur jātijarāmaraṇe ityevamatra jarmākarṣaṇāt tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkham anyacca śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaduḥkham anantaprabhedam anubhavatīti /
analyzed: udvega hetuḥ jāti jarā maraṇe iti evam atra jarma ākarṣaṇāt tasmin tasmin sattva nikāye jāti jarā maraṇa duḥkham anyat ca śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsa duḥkham ananta prabhedam anubhavati iti

original: tatra tridhā sankleśā'bhidhānena kleśakarmaṇo janmanaḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇahetutvaṃ darśitaṃ /
analyzed: tatra tridhā san kleśa abhidhānena kleśa karmaṇaḥ janmanaḥ sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa hetu tvam darśitam
kleśaḥ hi sādhāraṇa kāraṇam bhūmi ādi vat

original: karmatvasādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ ankurasyeva bījaṃ tad bhedena janambhedād iti /
analyzed: karma tva sādhāraṇa kāraṇam ankurasya iva bījam tat bhedena iti

original: atha vā nātra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntāni trīṇi kāṇḍāni kiṃ tarhi karmakleśaphalānīti pradarśayati/
analyzed: atha vā na atra pūrva anta apara anta madhya antāni trīṇi kāṇḍāni kim tarhi karma kleśa phalāni iti pradarśayati

original: dvividhābhidhānena hetuphalamātram evedaṃ nātrānyaḥ sankliśyate kārako vedako veti pradarśayati /
analyzed: dvividha abhidhānena hetu phala mātram eva idam na atra anyaḥ san kliśyate kārakaḥ vedakaḥ vā iti pradarśayati
atha vā atra karma kleśa mātram eva hetuḥ
tayoḥ bhāva abhāvāt janma bhāva abhāva darśanāt
atas tat phalam eva janma

original: tasmānnātra hetuḥ phalaṃ vā sarvatra pañcaskandhikāvastheti pradarśayati /
analyzed: tasmāt na atra hetuḥ phalam vā sarvatra pañca skandhikā avasthā iti pradarśayati

original: saptadhāhetunirdeśena punar dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pradarśitaḥ ākṣepalakṣaṇo'bhinirvṛttilakṣaṇaśceti /
analyzed: saptadhā hetu nirdeśena punar dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pradarśitaḥ ākṣepa lakṣaṇaḥ abhinirvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ ca iti

original: tatrākṣepalakṣaṇaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptyabhir angair nirdiṣṭaḥ yenākṣīpyate yathākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate tat pradarśanāt /
analyzed: tatra ākṣepa lakṣaṇaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptyabhiḥ angaiḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ yena ākṣīpyate yathā ākṣipyate yat ca ākṣipyate tat pradarśanāt

original: abhinirvṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhir angaiḥ tasyākṣiptasya yenābhinirvṛttir yathābhinirvṛttir yā cābhinirvṛttiḥ tasyāñca ya ādīnava iti /
analyzed: abhinirvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ angaiḥ tasya ākṣiptasya yena abhinirvṛttiḥ yathā abhinirvṛttiḥ yā ca abhinirvṛttiḥ tasyām ca yaḥ ādīnavaḥ iti

original: kenākṣīpyate ? avidyāpratyayaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ yathā tattvaṃ mugdhvā viparītaṃ saṃjānāti kuśalākuśalāniñjyān saṃskārānabhisaṃskāroti /
analyzed: avidyā pratyayaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ yathā tattvam mugdhvā viparītam saṃjānāti kuśala akuśalān iñjyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskāroti

original: katham ākṣipyate taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ ? vijñāne bījapoṣaṇād utpattibhavyatāyām avasthāpanāt /
analyzed: katham ākṣipyate taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ vijñāne bīja poṣaṇāt utpatti bhavya tāyām avasthāpanāt

original: kim ākṣipyate ? paunarbhavikaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca yathāyogaṃ /
analyzed: kim ākṣipyate paunarbhavikam nāma rūpam ṣaṣ āyatanam sparśaḥ vedanā ca yathāyogam

original: tadevam ākṣiptaṃ kenābhinirvartyate ? yathoktakrameṇa pūrvākṣiptādihotpannāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya yā tṛṣṇotpannā tat pratyayenopādānena /
analyzed: tat evam ākṣiptam kena abhinirvartyate yathā ukta krameṇa pūrva ākṣiptāt iha utpannām vedanām pratītya yā tṛṣṇā utpannā tat pratyayena upādānena

original: kathaṃ tenābhinirvartyate ? tasya vijñāne vāsanāvasthasya karmaṇas tena bhavīkaraṇāt /
analyzed: katham tena abhinirvartyate tasya vijñāne vāsanā avasthasya karmaṇaḥ tena bhavīkaraṇāt

original: bahuvidhā hi vijñāne karmavāsanā vartate vicitrasaṃskāraparibhāvitatvāt /
analyzed: bahuvidhā hi vijñāne karma vāsanā vartate vicitra saṃskāra paribhāvita tvāt

original: upādānaviśeṣaparigraheṇa yenātra punar bhavatvaṃ vartate so'tra bhava ucyate /
analyzed: upādāna viśeṣa parigraheṇa yena atra punar bhava tvam vartate saḥ atra bhavaḥ ucyate

original: kā punaḥ sa'bhinivruttiḥ ? yā tasyākṣiptasya nāmarūpādiksyāyatyāṃ jātiḥ /

original: tasyaṃ punaḥ satyāṃ ka ādīnavaḥ ? jarāmaraṇaṃ priyayauvanajīvitabhraṃśādīti /

original: atra tūpanayahetur nirarthaṃ iti cet na nirarthakaḥ /

vicchinna maraṇāt bhava upapatti bhava pravṛtti adhigama nirākaraṇa artham

original: sarve caite sankleśā abhūtaparikalpāt pravartanta iti cittacaittāśrayatvāt sankleśasya /
analyzed: sarve ca ete san kleśāḥ abhūta parikalpāt pravartante iti citta caitta āśraya tvāt san kleśasya

original: uktaṃ hi tat  abhūtaparikalpaśca cittacaittās tridhātukāḥ /

original: saṃkleśalakṣaṇaṃ  chādanād ropaṇāc caiva nayanāt samparigrahāt ityādi //
analyzed: saṃkleśa lakṣaṇam chādanāt ropaṇāt ca eva nayanāt samparigrahāt ityādi

original: evam abhūtaparikalpaṃ navaprakāraṃ khyāpayitvā yathā śūnyatā vijñeyā tan nirdeśatīti ko'trābhisambandhaḥ ? dvayam anena pratijñātam abhūtaparikalpaḥ śūnyatā ca /
analyzed: evam abhūta parikalpam nava prakāram khyāpayitvā yathā śūnyatā vijñeyā tat kaḥ atra abhisambandhaḥ dvayam anena pratijñātam abhūta parikalpaḥ śūnyatā ca
saṃkleśa pūrvakam ca vyavadānam

original: dharmāvabodhāśrayañca dharmatāvadhāraṇam ityato'bhūtaparikalpanirdeśānantaraṃ yathā śūnyatā vijñeyā tathā nirdiśati  lakṣaṇañcā'tha paryāya iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: dharma avabodha āśrayam ca dharmatā avadhāraṇam iti atas abhūta parikalpa nirdeśa anantaram yathā śūnyatā vijñeyā tathā nirdiśati lakṣaṇam ca atha paryāyaḥ iti vistaraḥ

original: tatra lakṣaṇaṃ hi bhāvābhāvapratiṣedhātmatā sarvatra śūnyathāprabhedavyāpakatvāt /
analyzed: tatra lakṣaṇam hi bhāva abhāva pratiṣedha ātma tā sarvatra śūnyathā prabheda vyāpaka tvāt
nāma antaram paryāyaḥ
ākāśa vat abhinna lakṣaṇa tvāt nirvikalpa tve api āgantuka upakleśa saṃyoga viyoga avasthā bhedāt bhedaḥ
anyaḥ ca pudgala dharma samāropa bhedāt bhedaḥ ṣoḍaśavidhaḥ
sādhanam śūnyatā prabheda pradarśane yuktiḥ

original: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadebhiḥ prakāraiḥ śūnyatā vijñātavyā ? viśuddhyālambanatvād viśuddhyarthibhir lakṣaṇato vijñeyā /
analyzed: kim punar kāraṇam yat ebhiḥ prakāraiḥ śūnyatā vijñātavyā viśuddhi ālambana tvāt viśuddhi arthibhiḥ lakṣaṇataḥ vijñeyā
sūtra antareṣu paryāya nirdeśeṣu a sammoha artham paryāya arthaḥ
paryāya artha avabodha arthāt śūnyatāyāḥ viśuddhi ālambana tvena niścita tvāt paryāya arthaḥ

original: saṃkleśe nirākṛte sā viśuddheti tat saṃkleśaprahāṇāya yatnotpādanārthaṃ bhedataḥ /
analyzed: saṃkleśe nirākṛte sā viśuddhā iti tat saṃkleśa prahāṇāya yatna utpādana artham bhedataḥ

original: bheda sādhanāvabodhād vikārābhāve saty api bhedaṃ sukhaṃ pratipadyata iti bhedasādhanato'pi vijñeyeti ////
analyzed: bheda sādhana avabodhāt vikāra abhāve sati api bhedam sukham pratipadyate iti bheda sādhanataḥ api vijñeyā iti

original: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate anityatāduḥkhatāvat /
analyzed: pṛthaktve sati dharmāt anyā dharma tā iti na yujyate anitya tā duḥkha tā vat

original: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañca /
analyzed: ekatve sati viśuddhi ālambanam jñānam na syāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam ca
etena tattva a anya tva vinirmuktam lakṣaṇam paridīpitam bhavati

original: kathaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vijñeyam iti lakṣaṇaṃ hi prāg uddiṣṭam ityatas tadeva prathamataḥ pṛṣṭaṃ  dvayā'bhāvo hy abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
analyzed: katham lakṣaṇam vijñeyam iti lakṣaṇam hi prāk uddiṣṭam iti atas tat eva prathamatas pṛṣṭam dvaya abhāvaḥ hi abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇam
iti vijñeyam

original: dvayasya grāhyasya grāhakasya cā'bhūtaparikalpe'bhūtaparikalpena vā parikalpitātmakatvād vasturūpeṇā'bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: dvayasya grāhyasya grāhakasya ca a bhūta parikalpe a bhūta parikalpena vā parikalpita ātmaka tvāt vastu rūpeṇa abhāvaḥ

original: tasya ca dvayābhāvasya yo bhāva etac chūnyatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ /
analyzed: tasya ca dvaya abhāvasya yaḥ bhāvaḥ etat śūnyatāyāḥ lakṣaṇam
kārikā ānuguṇyāt ca atra bhāva pratyaya lupta nirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: abhāvasya bhāva iti kim etat ? abhāvasyātmatvam astitvaṃ /
analyzed: abhāvasya bhāvaḥ iti kim etat abhāvasya ātma tvam astitvam
anyathā dvaya bhāvasya astitvam eva syāt
tat bhāvasya bhāvataḥ a vidyamāna tvāt

original: ata evāha  ity abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati na bhāvarūpalakṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: atas eva āha iti abhāva svabhāva lakṣaṇa tvam śūnyatāyāḥ paridīpitam bhavati na bhāva rūpa lakṣaṇam iti

original: bhāvapratiṣedhavācakatvād abhāvaśabdasya bhāvaśabdābhāve'pyeṣo'rthovagamyata iti bhāvaśabdo'trādhikaḥ nādhikaḥ dvayābhāvaḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇam itīyati nirdiśyamāne dvayābhāvasya svātantryam evātra gamyate śaśaviṣāṇābhāvavat na duḥkhatādivad dharmatārūpatā /
analyzed: bhāva pratiṣedha vācaka tvāt abhāva śabdasya bhāva śabda abhāve api eṣaḥ arthaḥ uvagamyate iti bhāva śabdaḥ atra adhikaḥ na adhikaḥ dvaya abhāvaḥ śūnyatā lakṣaṇam iti iyati nirdiśyamāne dvaya abhāvasya svātantryam eva atra gamyate śaśa viṣāṇa abhāva vat na duḥkhatā ādi vat dharmatā rūpa tā
tasmāt evam ucyate dvaya abhāvaḥ śūnyatā
tasya ca abhāvasya abhūta parikalpe bhāvaḥ śūnyate ati ucyate
abhāvasya bhāva lakṣaṇa parigṛhīta tvāt dharmatā rūpa tā pradarśitā

original: atha vā dvayābhāvaḥ śūnyatety abhāvaśabdasya sāmānyavācitān na vijñāyate katamo'trābhāvo'bhipreta ity atyantā'bhāvapradarśanārtham ucyate  abhūtaparikalpe dvayābhāvasya bhāva iti /
analyzed: atha vā dvaya abhāvaḥ śūnyatā iti abhāva śabdasya sāmānya vācitāt na vijñāyate katamaḥ atra abhāvaḥ abhipretaḥ iti atyanta abhāva pradarśana artham ucyate abhūta parikalpe dvaya abhāvasya bhāvaḥ iti

original: na hi prāg abhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvau svopadānād anyatrākhyātuṃ yujyete /
analyzed: na hi prāk abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvau sva upadānāt anyatra ākhyātum yujyete
na yujyate ubhaya āśrita tvāt

original: tasmād bhāvasyābhāvalakṣaṇopādānād grāhyagrāhakayor atyantābhāva eva śūnyatetyetaj jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt bhāvasya abhāva lakṣaṇa upādānāt grāhya grāhakayoḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ eva śūnyatā iti etat jñāpitam bhavati

original: yady abhāvātmikā śūnyatā kathaṃ paramārtha ucyate ? paramajñānaviṣayatvād anityatāvat na tu vastutvāt /
analyzed: yadi abhāva ātmikā śūnyatā katham paramārthaḥ ucyate parama jñāna viṣaya tvāt anitya tā vat na tu vastu tvāt
api ca abhāva svabhāvaḥ na eṣaḥ

original: yasmādyaśvā'sau tad abhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa  na bhāvo nā'pi cā'bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tat abhāva svabhāvaḥ sa na bhāvaḥ na api ca abhāvaḥ
katham na bhāvaḥ yasmāt dvayasya abhāvaḥ

original: bhāvatve hi na dvayabhāvasyātyantābhāvaḥ syāt nā'bhūtaparikalpadharmatā /
analyzed: bhāva tve hi na dvaya bhāvasya atyanta abhāvaḥ syāt na a bhūta parikalpa dharma tā
katham na abhāvaḥ yasmāt dvaya abhāvasya bhāvaḥ
nahi dvaya abhāvaḥ dvaya abhāva svarūpeṇa abhāvaḥ

original: so'bhāvaśced dvayasyāstitvaṃ syān na ca syād abhūtaparikalpasya dharmatā yathā nityaduḥkhatā /
analyzed: saḥ abhāvaḥ ced dvayasya astitvam syāt na ca syāt abhūta parikalpasya dharma tā yathā nitya duḥkha tā

original: sattvasya viparyāsatvena samāropitasya nityasukhabhāvābhāvasvarūpatvān na bhāvo nāpy abhāva ity ucyate /
analyzed: sattvasya viparyāsa tvena samāropitasya nitya sukha bhāva abhāva svarūpa tvāt na bhāvaḥ na api abhāvaḥ iti ucyate

original: yadi punar abhūtaparikalpasya śūnyatā dharmatāsti kim asau tasmād anyo vaktavya utānanya ity ato bravīti  etac ca śūnyatāyā lakṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: yadi punar abhūta parikalpasya śūnyatā dharmatā asti kim asau tasmāt anyaḥ vaktavyaḥ uta ananyaḥ iti atas bravīti etat ca śūnyatāyāḥ lakṣaṇam iti
abhāvasya svarūpam eva
athavā bhāvaḥ eva abhāva pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ
tasmāt abhūta parikalpāt na pṛthaktva eka lakṣaṇam

original: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate /
analyzed: pṛthaktve sati dharmāt anyā dharma tā iti na yujyate

original: kaḥ punar ayogaḥ ? dharmād vibhinnalakṣaṇatvād dharmatā dharmāntaram eva bhavati tad anyadharmavat /
analyzed: kaḥ punar ayogaḥ dharmāt vibhinna lakṣaṇa tvāt dharmatā dharma antaram eva bhavati tat anya dharma vat

original: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya dharmatā bhavitum arhati tatra punar dharmāntaram anveṣṭavyam ity anavasthāprasangāt /
analyzed: na ca dharma antaram dharma antarasya dharma tā bhavitum arhati tatra punar dharma antaram anveṣṭavyam iti anavasthā prasangāt
anitya tā duḥkha tā vat iti

original: yathā'nityatā'nityebhyo nānyā duḥkhatā ca duḥkhād eva śūnyatā'pi na śūnyād anyeti /
analyzed: yathā anitya tā anityebhyaḥ nā anyā duḥkhatā ca duḥkhāt eva śūnyatā api na śūnyāt anyā iti

original: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañceti /
analyzed: ekatve sati viśuddhi ālambanam na syāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam ca iti

original: viśuddhyate'neneti viśuddhir mārgaḥ dharmasvalakṣaṇād ananyatvān mārgālambanaṃ na syāt dharmasvalakṣaṇavat /
analyzed: viśuddhyate anena iti viśuddhiḥ mārgaḥ dharma sva lakṣaṇāt ananya tvāt mārga ālambanam na syāt dharma sva lakṣaṇa vat
tasmāt ca na sāmānya lakṣaṇam yujyate
sva lakṣaṇāt ananyatvāt

original: tasyāpi dharmasvarūpavat parasparato bheda iti sāmānyatā hīyate /
analyzed: tasya api dharma svarūpa vat parasparataḥ bhedaḥ iti sāmānya tā hīyate

original: atha vā svalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyatvād bhāvasvarūpavad bhedābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā sva lakṣaṇasya tasmāt anya tvāt bhāva sva rūpa vat bheda abhāvaḥ

original: tataś ca sāmānyalakṣaṇasyāpy abhāvaḥ bhedāpekṣatvāt sāmānyalakṣaṇasya /
analyzed: tatas ca sāmānya lakṣaṇasya api abhāvaḥ bheda apekṣa tvāt sāmānya lakṣaṇasya

original: atha vā viśuddhyartham ālambanaṃ viśuddhyālambanaṃ na bhāvasvalakṣaṇam ālambyamānaṃ viśuddhim āvahati sarvasattvaviśuddhiprasangāt /
analyzed: atha vā viśuddhi artham ālambanam viśuddhi ālambanam na bhāva sva lakṣaṇam ālambyamānam viśuddhim āvahati sarva sattva viśuddhi prasangāt

original: yadyanyānanyatvenāvaktavyā kathaṃ nirgranthavādo nā'lambito bhavati ? yo hi bhāvasya satastattvānyatvena vyākaroti tena nirgranthavād ālambyate /
analyzed: yadi anya ananyatvena avaktavyā katham nirgranthavādaḥ na ālambitaḥ bhavati yaḥ hi bhāvasya sataḥ tattva anyatvena vyākaroti tena nirgranthavād ālambyate

original: śūnyatā tu na bhāva iti nāstyayaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: śūnyatā tu na bhāvaḥ iti na asti ayam doṣaḥ

original: etena śūnyatā sallakṣanā'bhāvasvarūpalakṣaṇā'dvayalakṣaṇā tattvānyatva vinirmuktalakṣaṇā ca paridīpitā /
analyzed: etena śūnyatā sat lakṣanā abhāva svarūpa lakṣaṇā advaya lakṣaṇā tattva anyatva vinirmukta lakṣaṇā ca paridīpitā
uktam śūnyatā lakṣaṇam

original: paryāya idānīm ucyate  tathatā bhūtakoṭiścā'nimittaṃ paramārthatā /
analyzed: paryāyaḥ idānīm ucyate tathatā bhūtakoṭiḥ ca animittam paramārtha tā
dharmadhātuḥ ca paryāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsatas
iti

original: paryāyo nāmaikasyārthasya bhinnaśabdaiḥ pratyāyanaṃ paryāyārthābhidhānam iti paryāya ucyate /
analyzed: paryāyaḥ nāma ekasya arthasya bhinna śabdaiḥ pratyāyanam paryāya artha abhidhānam iti paryāyaḥ ucyate
tāni abhidhānāni sūtra antareṣu śūnyatā eva nirdiśyante

original: etac ca paryāyapañcakaṃ yathāpradhānaṃ gāthāyām uktam evam anye'pi paryāyā ihānuktāḥ pravacanād upadhāryāḥ /
analyzed: etat ca paryāya pañcakam yathāpradhānam gāthāyām uktam evam anye api paryāyāḥ iha anuktāḥ pravacanāt upadhāryāḥ

original: tad yathā  advayatā avikalpadhātuḥ dharmatā anabhilapyatā anirodhaḥ asaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇādi ////
analyzed: tat yathā advaya tā a vikalpa dhātuḥ dharmatā an abhilapya tā a nirodhaḥ asaṃskṛtam nirvāṇa ādi
katham paryāya arthaḥ vijñeyaḥ iti etat darśayati

original: naite śabdā gauṇāḥ kiṃ tarhi anvarthā iti  ananyathā'viparyāsatan nirodhāryagocaraiḥ /
analyzed: na ete śabdāḥ gauṇāḥ kim tarhi anvarthāḥ iti ananyathā aviparyāsa tat nirodha ārya gocaraiḥ
hetu tvāt ca ārya dharmāṇām paryāya arthaḥ yathākramam
iti
ananyathā arthena tathatā iti avikāra arthena iti arthaḥ

original: tadeva pradarśanārtham āha nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā /
analyzed: tat eva pradarśana artham āha nityam tathā eva iti kṛtvā
nityam sarvadā asaṃskṛta tvāt na vikriyate iti arthaḥ
bhūtam satyam aviparītam iti arthaḥ

original: koṭiḥ paryanto yataḥ pareṇānyajjñeyaṃ nāstītyato bhūtakoṭir bhūtaparyanta ucyate /
analyzed: koṭiḥ paryantaḥ yatas pareṇa anyat jñeyam na asti iti atas bhūtakoṭiḥ bhūta paryantaḥ ucyate
katham tathatā jñeyam ucyate jñeya āvaraṇa viśodhana jñāna gocara tvāt
a viparyāsa arthā iti an adhyāropa an apavāda arthena
atra eva kāraṇam āha viparyāsa a vastu tvāt iti
viparyāsaḥ hi vikalpaḥ
vikalpa a nālambana tvāt na viparyāsa vastu
nimitta nirodha arthena a nimittam iti
atra a nimitta tvam nimitta nirodhaḥ ucyate

original: etad eva pradarśanārtham āha  sarvanimittābhāvād iti /
analyzed: etat eva pradarśana artham āha sarva nimitta abhāvāt iti

original: sarvair eva saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtanimittaiḥ śūnyatā śūnyety animittam ucyate /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ eva saṃskṛta a saṃskṛta nimittaiḥ śūnyatā śūnyā iti animittam ucyate
sarva nimitta abhāvāt animittaḥ
animittam eva a nimittaḥ

original: āryajñānagocaratvāt paramārtha iti paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ /
analyzed: ārya jñāna gocara tvāt paramārthaḥ iti paramam hi lokottara jñānam
tat arthaḥ paramārthaḥ

original: etad eva pradarśayann āha  paramajñānagocaratvād iti /

analyzed: ārya dharma hetu tvāt dharmadhātuḥ
dharma śabdena atra ārya dharmāḥ samyak dṛṣṭi ādayaḥ samyak vimukti jñāna paryantāḥ ca iti
tad hetu tvāt dhātuḥ

original: tadeva vibhāvayann āha  āryadharmāṇāṃ tad ālambanaprabhatvād iti /
analyzed: tat eva vibhāvayan āha ārya dharmāṇām tat ālambana prabha tvāt iti

original: svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇe'py ayaṃ dhātuśabdo vartata ity āha hetvartho hy atra dhātvarthaḥ /
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa upādāya rūpa dhāraṇe api ayam dhātu śabdaḥ vartate iti āha hetvarthaḥ hi atra dhātvarthaḥ
tat yathā suvarṇa dhātuḥ tāmra dhātuḥ raupya dhātuḥ

original: sūtrāntareṣv anye paryāyā uktā apyanenaiva nyāyena svārthe nirdeṣṭavyāḥ ////
analyzed: sūtra antareṣu anye paryāyāḥ uktāḥ api anena eva nyāyena sva arthe nirdeṣṭavyāḥ

original: śūnyatāyā grāhyagrāhakābhāvarūpatvād bhedam asambhāvayan pṛcchati athavā paryāyārthānantaraṃ bhedo vijñeya ity uktam atas tannirdeśānantaraṃ pṛcchati  kathaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ prabhedo vijñeya iti /
analyzed: śūnyatāyāḥ grāhya grāhaka abhāva rūpa tvāt bhedam asambhāvayan pṛcchati athavā paryāya artha anantaram bhedaḥ vijñeyaḥ iti uktam atas tad nirdeśa anantaram pṛcchati katham śūnyatāyāḥ prabhedaḥ vijñeyaḥ iti

original: abhūtaparikalpo hi saṃkleśaḥ tasya prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir ucyate /
analyzed: abhūta parikalpaḥ hi saṃkleśaḥ tasya prahāṇam viśuddhiḥ ucyate

original: sankleśaviśuddhikāle ca śūnyatāvyatiriktam anyan nāsti yat sankliśyate viśuddhyate vā /
analyzed: san kleśa viśuddhi kāle ca śūnyatā vyatiriktam anyat na asti yat san kliśyate viśuddhyate vā

original: tasmāt saṃkleśaviśuddhikālayoḥ śūnyataiva sankliśyate viśuddhyate ceti pradarśanārtham āha  sankliṣṭā ca viśuddhā ca ity asyāḥ prabhedaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt saṃkleśa viśuddhi kālayoḥ śūnyatā eva san kliśyate viśuddhyate ca iti pradarśana artham āha san kliṣṭā ca viśuddhā ca iti asyāḥ prabhedaḥ

original: kadā sankliṣṭā kadā nirmaletyanavabodhāt pṛcchati  kasyām avasthāyāṃ saṃkliṣṭā kasyāṃ ca viśuddheti  samalā nirmalā ca sā /
analyzed: kadā san kliṣṭā kadā nirmalā iti anavabodhāt pṛcchati kasyām avasthāyām saṃkliṣṭā kasyām ca viśuddhā iti sa malā nirmalā ca sā
iti vistaraḥ

original: āśrayā'parāvṛttiparāvṛttyapekṣayā samalā ca prahīṇamalā ca vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: āśraya a parāvṛtti parāvṛtti apekṣayā sa malā ca prahīṇa malā ca vyavasthāpyate

original: yeṣām aviduṣāṃ grāhyagrāhakā'bhiniveśarāgādikleśamalinānāṃ cittasantānānām apratipattivipratipattidoṣācchūnyatā na prakhyāti tān prati samalā  vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: yeṣām aviduṣām grāhya grāhaka abhiniveśa rāga ādi kleśa malinānām citta santānānām apratipatti vipratipatti doṣāt śūnyatā na prakhyāti tān prati sa malā vyavasthāpyate

original: yeṣām āryāṇāṃ tattvajñānād aviparītacetasāṃ śūnyatā nirantaram ākāśavad virajaskā prakhyāti tān prati prahīṇamaletyucyate /
analyzed: yeṣām āryāṇām tattva jñānāt aviparīta cetasām śūnyatā nirantaram ākāśa vat virajaskā prakhyāti tān prati prahīṇa malā iti ucyate

original: evaṃ śūnyatāyā āpekṣikā saṃkleśaviśuddhir draṣṭavyā na malinasvarūpatvena prakṛtyā prabhāsvaratvāt /
analyzed: evam śūnyatāyāḥ āpekṣikā saṃkleśa viśuddhiḥ draṣṭavyā na malina sva rūpa tvena prakṛtyā prabhāsvara tvāt
yadi sa malā bhūtvā iti vistaraḥ

original: na hy avasthābhedo vikāram antareṇa dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: na hi avasthā bhedaḥ vikāram antareṇa dṛṣṭaḥ
vikāraḥ ca utpāda vināśābhyām anusyūtaḥ iti

original: ata āha  kathaṃ vikāradharmiṇītvādanityā na bhavatīti /
analyzed: atas āha katham vikāra dharmiṇī tvāt anityā na bhavati iti

original: na hi sankliṣṭāvasthātaḥ śūnyatāviśuddhā'vasthāyām anyo vikāraḥ /
analyzed: na hi san kliṣṭa avasthātaḥ śūnyatā viśuddhā avasthāyām anyaḥ vikāraḥ
tattvaḥ tititā tu svabhāva antaram an āpadyamānāyāḥ āgantu ka mala apagamāt
yasmāt ap dhātu kanaka ākāśa śuddhi vat śuddhiḥ iṣyate
tasmāt anityā na bhavati iti
yathā eva hi ap dhātu kanaka ākāśānām atatsvabhāva tvāt mala svabhāva tā abhāve api āgantuka malavat tvam

original: āgantukamalā'pagame ca te viśuddhā eva svabhāvāntarapratipattimantareṇāpi /
analyzed: āgantu kamala apagame ca te viśuddhāḥ eva svabhāva antara pratipattim antareṇa api

original: evaṃ śūnyatāpy āgantukamalaiḥ sankliśyate, avikṛtasvarūpāpi tad vigamāc ca viśuddhyatīti /
analyzed: evam śūnyatā api āgantu kamalaiḥ san kliśyate avikṛta svarūpā api tat vigamāt ca viśuddhi atīti

original: yo hi tameva bhāvaṃ pūrvaṃ sankleśalakṣaṇaṃ paścād viśuddhisvabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayati tasya vikāradharmanivṛttir na bhavati vikārasvabhāvatvāt na tu yatrāpy āgantukaṃ tad ubhayaṃ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi tam eva bhāvam pūrvam san kleśa lakṣaṇam paścāt viśuddhi svabhāvam vyavasthāpayati tasya vikāra dharma nivṛttiḥ na bhavati vikāra svabhāva tvāt na tu yatra api āgantukam tat ubhayam
tasmāt na asau vikāra dharma tām spṛśati iti

original: prabhedanirdeśādhikāre sarve śūnyatāprabhedā vaktavyā ityata āha ayam aparaḥ prabheda iti /
analyzed: prabheda nirdeśa adhikāre sarve śūnyatā prabhedāḥ vaktavyāḥ iti atas āha ayam aparaḥ prabhedaḥ iti
ṣoḍaśavidhā śūnyatā iti vastu bhedena ṣoḍaśavidhā bhavati
dvaya abhāva svarūpe tu bhedaḥ na asti

original: sā ṣoḍaśavidhā śūnyatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ paṭhyate  adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti /
analyzed: sā ṣoḍaśavidhā śūnyatā prajñāpāramitāyām paṭhyate adhyātma śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti
sā eṣā samāsatas veditavyā bhoktṛ bhojana tat deha pratiṣṭhā vastu śūnyatā
iti evam ādi
sāmānya lakṣaṇam śūnyatāyāḥ sarva dharmasya advaya svarūpa tvam

original: nānyathā tan nānātvaṃ śakyate darśayitum ityato vastunānātvena tan nānātvaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: na anyathā tat nānātvam śakyate darśayitum iti atas vastu nānātvena tat nānātvam darśayati

original: pūrvaṃ tāvad bhoktā vibhāvayitavyaḥ tat snehābhiniveśatyājanārthaṃ /
analyzed: pūrvam tāvat bhoktā vibhāvayitavyaḥ tat sneha abhiniveśa tyājana artham
tat sneha abhiniveśaḥ hi buddhatva vimokṣa prāpti pratibandhakaḥ bhavati
tat anantaram tat bhojanam
tat anantaram tayoḥ adhiṣṭhānam śarīram

original: tad anantaraṃ tad adhiṣṭhānasya śarīrasya pratiṣṭhābhājanaloko vibhāvayitavyaḥ bhoktur upakārakatvād ātmīyasnehagrāhavyāvartanārthaṃ /
analyzed: tat anantaram tat adhiṣṭhānasya śarīrasya pratiṣṭhā bhājana lokaḥ vibhāvayitavyaḥ bhoktuḥ upakāraka tvāt ātmīya sneha grāha vyāvartana artham

original: etac catur vidhaṃ vastu tac chūnyatā vastuśūnyatety ucyate /
analyzed: etat catur vidham vastu tat śūnyatā vastu śūnyatā iti ucyate
tatra bhoktṛ śūnyatā ādhyātmikāni āyatanāni ārabhyeti

original: tāni ca cakṣūrādīni yāvan manaḥ paryantāni /
analyzed: tāni ca cakṣūḥ ādīni yāvat manaḥ paryantāni
tat anyasya bhoktuḥ abhāvāt

original: cakṣūrādīnāñca viṣayopabhogapravṛttidarśanāl lokasya cakṣurādiṣt eva bhoktṛbhimāna ity ataścakṣūrādyāyatanaśūnyatā bhoktṛśūnyatety ucyate /
analyzed: cakṣūḥ ādīnām ca viṣaya upabhoga pravṛtti darśanāt lokasya cakṣuḥ ādiṣu eva bhoktṛ abhimānaḥ iti atas cakṣūḥ ādi āyatana śūnyatā bhoktṛ śūnyatā iti ucyate
bhojana śūnyatā bāhyāni iti rūpa ādīni yāvat dharma paryantāni

original: tāni viṣayābhāvena bhujyanta iti bhojanam ato bāhyāyatanaśūnyatā bhojanaśūnyatety ucyate /
analyzed: tāni viṣaya abhāvena bhujyante iti bhojanam atas bāhya āyatana śūnyatā bhojana śūnyatā iti ucyate

original: tayor bhoktṛbhojanayoḥ śarīre parasparā'vinibhāgenā'vasthānāt tad dehaḥ śarīram ityatas tacchūnyatā'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatety ucyate /
analyzed: tayoḥ bhoktṛ bhojanayoḥ śarīre paraspara a vinibhāgena avasthānāt tat dehaḥ śarīram iti atas tat śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti ucyate

original: pratiṣṭhāvastu bhājanalokaḥ sarvatra sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāvastutvena prajānāt /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā vastu bhājana lokaḥ sarvatra sattvānām pratiṣṭhā vastu tvena prajānāt

original: ata evāha  tasya vistīrṇatvāt tacchūnyatā mahāśūnyatocyate iti /
analyzed: atas eva āha tasya vistīrṇa tvāt tad śūnyatā mahāśūnyatā ucyate iti
vastu śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate

original: tasyaivaṃ yogino bodhisattvasya caturvidhajñeyavastuśūnyatāyāṃ savitarkeṇa yoniśomanaskāreṇa manaskriyamāṇāyām ayamanyo nimittagrāha upatiṣṭhate yenedaṃ śūnyatājñānenādhyātmikabāhyāyatanādi śūnyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra yo grāhyagrāhakābhiniśeśo'yam eva cātra paramārthākāro yathā tac chrutājñānena dṛṣṭam iti vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: tasya evam yoginaḥ bodhisattvasya caturvidha jñeya vastu śūnyatāyām sa vitarkeṇa yoniśas manaskāreṇa manaḥ kriyamāṇāyām ayam anyaḥ nimitta grāhaḥ upatiṣṭhate yena idam śūnyatā jñānena ādhyātmika bāhya āyatana ādi śūnyam dṛṣṭam tatra yaḥ grāhya grāhaka abhiniśā īśaḥ ayam eva ca atra paramārtha ākāraḥ yathā tat śruta ajñānena dṛṣṭam iti vikalpaḥ

original: tasya dviprakārasya yogibhūmibhrāntinimittasya vikalpasya vibhāvanārthaṃ śūnyta śūnyata paramārtha śūnyatā ca yathākramaṃ jñanakāralopaṃ kṛutvā nirdiṣṭā /
analyzed: tasya dvi prakārasya yogi bhūmi bhrānti nimittasya vikalpasya vibhāvanā artham paramārtha śūnyatā ca yathākramam nirdiṣṭā

original: śūnyathāviṣayatvād vā taj jñānaṃ śūnyatety uktaṃ /
analyzed: śūnyathā viṣaya tvāt vā tat jñānam śūnyatā iti uktam
tasya grāhya grāhaka bhāvena śūnyatā śūnyatā aśūnyatā

original: ādhyātmikāayatanādikaṃ ca tena śūnyatājñānena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ so'tra paramārtha iti paramārthākāreṇa tasya śūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā /
analyzed: ādhyātmika āayatana ādikam ca tena śūnyatā jñānena yathā dṛṣṭam saḥ atra paramārthaḥ iti paramārtha ākāreṇa tasya śūnyatā paramārtha śūnyatā

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? paramārtho hi śūnyaḥ parikalpitena svabhāveneti /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam paramārthaḥ hi śūnyaḥ parikalpitena svabhāvena iti

original: ayam anyo'pi nimittagrāhaḥ śūnyatābhāvanopaplavabhūtaḥ yadarthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyate tasya bhāvasvarūpatvaṃ samāropayati tad vibhāvanārthaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatādayaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāparyantāḥ śūnyatā nirdiṣṭāḥ ////
analyzed: ayam anyaḥ api nimitta grāhaḥ śūnyatā bhāvanā upaplava bhūtaḥ yad artham bodhisattvaḥ śūnyatām pratipadyate tasya bhāva svarūpa tvam samāropayati tat vibhāvanā artham saṃskṛta śūnyatā ādayaḥ sarva dharma śūnyatā paryantāḥ śūnyatāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ

original: kim arthañca pratipadyate  śubhadvayasya prāptyarthaṃ yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ viśūddhyarthaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyate śūnyatāṃ prabhāvayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: kim artham ca pratipadyate śubha dvayasya prāpti artham yāvat buddha dharmāṇām viśūddhi artham śūnyatām pratipadyate śūnyatām prabhāvayati iti arthaḥ

original: śubhadvayaṃ hi saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtañca mārgo nirvāṇañca /
analyzed: śubha dvayam hi saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaḥ ca mārgaḥ nirvāṇam ca
tābhyām sambadhyate yathākramam saṃskṛta śūnyatā asaṃskṛta śūnyatā ca
sadāsattva hitāya ca

original: iti sarvākāraṃ sarvakālañca mayā sattvahitaṃ kartavyam iti tac chūnyatā'tyantaśūnyatā /
analyzed: iti sarvākāram sarvakālam ca mayā sattva hitam kartavyam iti tat śūnyatā atyanta śūnyatā

original: saṃsārā'tyajanārthañca iti sattvārthaṃ mayā saṃsāro na parityajyaḥ /
analyzed: iti sattva artham mayā saṃsāraḥ na parityajyaḥ

original: saṃsāre hi parityakte'labdhvā bodhisattvabodhi śrāvakabodhau vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: saṃsāre hi parityakte a labdhvā bodhisattva bodhi śrāvaka bodhau vyavatiṣṭhate
tasya śūnyatā an avara agra śūnyatā

original: kim arthaṃ punas tasya śūnyatā deśyata ity ata āha  anavarāgrasya hi saṃsārasya śūnyatām apaśYan khinnaḥ saṃsāraṃ parityajeteti /
analyzed: kim artham punar tasya śūnyatā deśyate iti atas āha an avara agrasya hi saṃsārasya śūnyatām a paśyan khinnaḥ saṃsāram parityajeta iti
kuśalasya a kṣayāya ca
iti

original: mayā kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante nirupādhiśeṣe nirvāṇe'pīti nāvakiratītyetad evācaṣṭe notsṛjatīti /
analyzed: mayā kuśala mūlāni na kṣīyante nirupādhi śeṣe nirvāṇe api iti na avakirati iti etat eva ācaṣṭe na utsṛjati iti

original: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tarhi nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ siddhyati ? sāsravadharmavipākakāyābhāvāt /
analyzed: yadi evam katham tarhi nirupadhi śeṣaḥ nirvāṇa dhātuḥ siddhi ati sa āsrava dharma vipāka kāya abhāvāt

original: anāsravabhūtadharmakāyasya tu buddhasya bhagavato nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātāv api na vyuparamād iti siddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: anāsrava bhūta dharmakāyasya tu buddhasya bhagavataḥ nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau api na vyuparamāt iti siddhāntaḥ
atas tat śūnyatā anavakāra śunyatā iti ucyate

original: gotrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ tasya śūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā /
analyzed: gotrasya ca viśuddhi artham tasya śūnyatā prakṛti śūnyatā

original: atraiva kāraṇamāha  gotraṃ hi prakṛtir iti /
analyzed: atra eva kāraṇam āha gotram hi prakṛtiḥ iti
kutas etat
atas āha svābhāvika tvāt iti
svabhāvikam anādikālikam anāgantukam iti arthaḥ

original: yathā'nādau saṃsāre kiṇcic cetanaṃ kiñcid acetanam evam ihāpi kiñcit ṣaḍāyatanaṃ buddhagotraṃ kiñcic chrāvakādigotram iti /
analyzed: yathā anādau saṃsāre kiṇcid cetanam kiñcid acetanam evam iha api kiñcid ṣaṣ āyatanam buddha gotram kiñcid śrāvaka ādi gotram iti

original: na cākasmikatvaṃ gotrasya anādiparamparāgatatvāt cetanācetanaviśeṣavad iti /
analyzed: na ca ākasmika tvam gotrasya anādi paramparā gata tvāt cetana acetana viśeṣa vat iti

original: sarvasattvasya tathāgatagotratvād atra gotram iti tathātvaṃ jñeyam ity anye /
analyzed: sarva sattvasya tathāgata gotra tvāt atra gotram iti tathātvam jñeyam iti anye
lakṣaṇa vyañjana āptaye

original: ity ataḥ sānuvyañjanānāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ śūnyatā lakṣaṇaśūnyatety ucyate /
analyzed: iti atas sa anuvyañjanānām mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānām śūnyatā lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti ucyate
kiñca śuddhaye buddha dharmāṇām bodhisattvaḥ prapadyate

original: ante prapadyata ity abhidhānāt sarvatra śubhadvayasya prāptyarthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prapadyate /
analyzed: ante prapadyate iti abhidhānāt sarvatra śubha dvayasya prāpti artham bodhisattvaḥ prapadyate

original: sadā sattvahitāya ca bodhisattvaḥ prapadyata iti yojyaṃ /
analyzed: sadā sattva hitāya ca bodhisattvaḥ prapadyate iti yojyam

original: katareṣāṃ buddhadharmāṇām ity ato bravīti balavaiśāradyāveṇikādīnām iti /
analyzed: katareṣām buddha dharmāṇām iti atas bravīti bala vaiśāradya āveṇika ādīnām iti

original: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ prāptaye mayā prayatitavyam iti pratipadyate /
analyzed: saṃkṣepataḥ sarva buddha dharmāṇām prāptaye mayā prayatitavyam iti pratipadyate
tasmāt śūnyatā vibhāvanayā sarva dharma śūnyatā ucyate
kīdṛśī vibhāvanā iti jñeye jñānasya avyāvahita pravṛttiḥ

original: evaṃ tāvac caturdaśānānām adhyātmaśūnyatādīnāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāparyantānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ ////
analyzed: evam tāvat caturdaśa anānām adhyātma śūnyatā ādīnām sarva dharma śūnyatā paryantānām vyavasthānam veditavyam

original: kā punar atra bhoktrādau śūnyatā katamat svarūpam ityata āha  pudgalasyā'tha dharmāṇām abhāvaḥ śūnyatā'tra hi /
analyzed: kā punar atra bhoktṛ ādau śūnyatā katamat svarūpam iti atas āha pudgalasya a atha dharmāṇām abhāvaḥ śūnyatā atra hi
tat abhāvasya sadbhāvaḥ tasmin sā śūnyatā aaparā
iti

original: tatra yathoktānāṃ bhoktrādīnāṃ pudgaladharmā'bhāvaś ca śūnyatā /
analyzed: tatra yathā uktānām bhoktṛ ādīnām pudgala dharma abhāvaḥ ca śūnyatā
tat abhāvasya ca sadbhāvaḥ śūnyatā
tatra pudgala dharmayoḥ asadbhāvaḥ abhāva śūnyatā
tat abhāvasya sadbhāvaḥ abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: kim arthaṃ punar eṣā dvividhā śūnyatā'nte vyavasthāpyate ? ata āha  śūnyatālakṣaṇakhyāpanārtham iti /
analyzed: kim artham punar eṣā dvividhā śūnyatā ante vyavasthāpyate atas āha śūnyatā lakṣaṇa khyāpana artham iti

original: kim arthaṃ punaḥ śūnyatākhyāpanamata āha  pudgaladharmasamāropasya tac chūnyatā'pavādasya ca parihārārthaṃ yathākramaṃ /
analyzed: kim artham punar śūnyatā khyāpanam atas āha pudgala dharma samāropasya tat śūnyatā apavādasya ca parihāra artham yathākramam
pudgala dharma samāropasya parihāra artham abhāva śūnyatām vyavasthāpayati
tat śūnyatā apavāda parihāra artham ca abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām

original: yady abhāvaśūnyatā nocyeta parikalpitasvarūpayor dharmapudgalayor astitvam eva prasajyeta /
analyzed: yadi abhāva śūnyatā nā ucyeta parikalpita svarūpayoḥ dharma pudgalayoḥ astitvam eva prasajyeta

original: yady abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā nocyeta śūnyatāyā abhāva eva prasajyeta /
analyzed: yadi abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā nā ucyeta śūnyatāyāḥ abhāvaḥ eva prasajyeta

original: tad abhāvāc ca pudgaladharmayoḥ pūrvavad bhāvaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tad abhāvāt ca pudgala dharmayoḥ pūrva vat bhāvaḥ syāt

original: tatrādhyātmikeṣvāyataneṣu vipākavijñānasvabhāveṣu bālānāṃ bhoktṛsammateṣu bhoktṛpudgalasya kalpitalakṣaṇānāṃ ca cakṣurādīnām abhāvas tad abhāvasya ca sadbhāvo'dhyātmaśūnyatā /
analyzed: tatra ādhyātmikeṣu āyataneṣu vipāka vijñāna svabhāveṣu bālānām bhoktṛ sammateṣu bhoktṛ pudgalasya kalpita lakṣaṇānām ca cakṣuḥ ādīnām abhāvaḥ tat abhāvasya ca sadbhāvaḥ adhyātma śūnyatā

original: bāhyeṣv āyataneṣu rūpādivijñapty ābhāsasvabhāveṣu bālānāṃ bhogyasammateṣu bhojanasyātmīyasya parikalpitalakṣaṇānāṃ ca rūpādīnām abhāvas tad abhāvasya ca sadbhāvo bahirdhāśūnyatā /
analyzed: bāhyeṣu āyataneṣu rūpa ādi vijñapti ābhāsa svabhāveṣu bālānām bhogya sammateṣu bhojanasya ātmīyasya parikalpita lakṣaṇānām ca rūpa ādīnām abhāvaḥ tat abhāvasya ca sadbhāvaḥ bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: tad dehe śarīre bhoktṛpudgalasya bālajanaparikalpitānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ dehasya cā'bhāvas tad abhāvasya ca bhāvo'dhyātmabahirdhā śūnyatā /
analyzed: tat dehe śarīre bhoktṛ pudgalasya bāla jana parikalpitānām rūpa ādīnām dehasya ca abhāvaḥ tat abhāvasya ca bhāvaḥ adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: bhājanaloke sattvalokā'bhāvas tat parikalpitasvarūpābhāvas tad abhāvas tad abhāvasadbhāvaś ca mahāśūnyatā /
analyzed: bhājana loke sattva loka abhāvaḥ tad parikalpita svarūpa abhāvaḥ tad abhāvaḥ tad abhāva sadbhāvaḥ ca mahāśūnyatā

original: śūnyatājñāne paramārthakāre ca jñātur ākāragrahītṛpudgalasya parikalpitalakṣaṇaśunyatā paramārthākārasya cā'bhāvas tad abhāvas tad abhāvasya ca sadbhāvo yathākramaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā ca /
analyzed: śūnyatā jñāne paramārthakāre ca jñātuḥ ākāra grahītṛ pudgalasya parikalpita lakṣaṇa śunyatā paramārtha ākārasya ca abhāvaḥ tat abhāvaḥ tat abhāvasya ca sadbhāvaḥ yathākramam śūnyatā aśūnyatā paramārtha śūnyatā ca

original: yad arthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratipadyate teṣu saṃskṛtādiṣu sarvabuddhadharmaparyanteṣu  bodhisattvapratipattavyeṣu pudgalasya parikalpitalakṣaṇānāṃ ca dharmāṇām abhāvas tad abhāvasya ca sadbhāvo yathākramaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatā yāvat sarvadharmaśūnyateti /
analyzed: yat artham bodhisattvaḥ pratipadyate teṣu saṃskṛta ādiṣu sarva buddha dharma paryanteṣu bodhisattva pratipattavyeṣu pudgalasya parikalpita lakṣaṇānām ca dharmāṇām abhāvaḥ tat abhāvasya ca sadbhāvaḥ yathākramam saṃskṛta śūnyatā yāvat sarva dharma śūnyatā iti

original: tathāhi nāsti saṃskṛtasya svāmī vā prayoktā vā pudgalo nāpi saṃskṛtaṃ bālajanaparikalpitenātmanā /
analyzed: tathā hi nā asti saṃskṛtasya svāmī vā prayoktā vā pudgalaḥ nā api saṃskṛtam bāla jana parikalpitena ātmanā

original: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvavikalpagrāhapratipakṣārthaṃ sarvasūtrāntābhisandhivyākaraṇārthaṃ caitā bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakair asādhāraṇāḥ ṣoḍaśaśūnyatā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: saṃkṣepataḥ sarva vikalpa grāha pratipakṣa artham sarva sūtrānta abhisandhi vyākaraṇa artham ca etāḥ bodhisattvānām śrāvakaiḥ asādhāraṇāḥ ṣoḍaśa śūnyatāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ

original: atra ca bhagavatā śūnyatāviṣayaḥ śūnyatāsvabhāvaḥ śūnyatābhāvanāprayojanañca darśitaṃ /
analyzed: atra ca bhagavatā śūnyatā viṣayaḥ śūnyatā svabhāvaḥ śūnyatā bhāvanā prayojanam ca darśitam
tatra śūnyatā viṣayaḥ bhoktṛ ādi arthaḥ yāvat buddha dharma paryantaḥ
tat pradarśanam punar śūnyatāyāḥ sarva dharma vyāpaka tva jñāpana artham
śūnyatā svabhāvaḥ abhāva svabhāvaḥ abhāva bhāva svabhāvaḥ ca
śūnyatā svabhāva pradarśanam punar sarva dṛṣṭi niḥsaraṇa ātmaka tva jñāpana artham

original: śūnyatābhāvanāprayojanaṃ śubhadvayasya paraptyartham ityārabhya buddhadharmāṇāṃ prāptaya iti paryantaṃ /
analyzed: śūnyatā bhāvanā prayojanam śubha dvayasya parapti artham iti ārabhya buddha dharmāṇām prāptaye iti paryantam

original: tat pradarśanaṃ punaḥ svaparātmano rūpadharmakāyasampat prakarṣaḥ śūnyatābhāvanād eva prāpya iti pradarśanārtham iti /
analyzed: tat pradarśanam punar sva para ātmanaḥ rūpa dharma kāya sampad prakarṣaḥ śūnyatā bhāvanāt eva prāpyaḥ iti pradarśana artham iti

original: evaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ prabhedo vijñeya iti samalāvasthāyāṃ saṃkliṣṭā nirmalāvasthāyāṃ viśuddhety adhyātmaśūnyatādiṣoḍaśaprakārabhedo'nantarokto veditavyaḥ ////
analyzed: evam śūnyatāyāḥ prabhedaḥ vijñeyaḥ iti sa mala avasthāyām saṃkliṣṭā nirmala avasthāyām viśuddhā iti adhyātma śūnyatā ādi ṣoḍaśa prakāra bhedaḥ anantara uktaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: bhedoddeśānantaraṃ tat sādhanam uddiṣṭam ityatas tannirdeśānantaraṃ pṛcchati  kathaṃ sādhanaṃ vijñeyam iti /

iti

original: athotpanne'pi pratipakṣe apiśabdhād anutpanna iva na viśuddhā bhaved evaṃ sati mokṣārtha ārambho niṣphalo bhavet pratipakṣabhāvanayāpi tanmalasyā'vigamāt samalasya vimokṣānupapatteś ca /

original: yadā ca śūnyatā ca kliṣṭā pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ śuddhā cāryāvasthāyāṃ bhavati ata evedaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati  na kliṣṭā nāpi cā'kliṣṭā śuddhā'śuddhā na caiva sā /

iti
katham na kliṣṭā na a api ca a śuddhā

original: atraivāgamam āha prakṛtyaiva  prabhāvasvaratvāc cittasya iti /

original: sankliṣṭaviśuddhatayā dvidhā bheda ukte kimarthaṃ punarścaturdhā bheda ucyate ? laukikāl lokottarāc ca mārgād viśeṣārtham ityekaḥ /

original: evaṃ na'pi sā kliṣṭeti cheduchyate  na ṣuddheti kuśalasāsravāt viśeṣaṇārthamāḥ /

iṣta vipāka tvāt ca śuddham nā eva dharmatā

original: evaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ sankleśaviśuddhyoddiṣṭaḥ prabhedaḥ sādhito bhavati ////

original: tatra lakṣaṇato 'bhāvalakṣaṇato bhāvalakṣaṇataś ceti dvayābhāvo hītivacanād abhāvalakṣaṇataḥ abhāvasya ca bhāva iti vacanād bhāvalakṣaṇataḥ /

original: etayā catuḥprakāradeśanayā caturvidhopakleśapratipakṣeṇa svalakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ sankleśavyavadānalakṣaṇaṃ yuktilakṣaṇañcodbhāvitaṃ bhavati /

original: kathaṃ sakalaṃ vyāpnotīti jñāyata iti cet  sākalyādāvaraṇaṃ vyāpītyucyate iti hetunirdeśāt /
analyzed: katham sakalam vyāpnoti iti jñāyate iti ced sākalyāt āvaraṇam vyāpi iti ucyate iti hetu nirdeśāt

original: atha vā vyāpiśabdo niravaśeṣārtha iti pradarśanāya sākalyādivacanam /
analyzed: atha vā vyāpi śabdaḥ niravaśeṣa arthaḥ iti pradarśanāya sākalya ādi vacanam

original: prādeśikaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ śrāvakādigotrakāṇām iti svārthamātrāvaraṇādupacārādavyāpitvāc ca prādeśikākhyā /
analyzed: prādeśikam kleśa āvaraṇam śrāvaka ādi gotrakāṇām iti svārtha mātra āvaraṇāt upacārāt avyāpi tvāt ca prādeśika ākhyā

original: kiṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām akliṣṭamajñānaṃ nāsti yasmāt teṣāṃ kleśāvaraṇam eva vyavasthāpyata iti? bhavatu, na tu tadāvaraṇaṃ teṣām, tasmin vidyamāne śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhiprāpteḥ /
analyzed: kim śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām akliṣṭam ajñānam na asti yasmāt teṣām kleśa āvaraṇam eva vyavasthāpyate iti bhavatu na tu tad āvaraṇam teṣām tasmin vidyamāne śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bodhi prāpteḥ
tatas teṣām api dvaya āvaraṇam bhavet

original: tasmān na vaktavyaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ śrāvakādigotrakāṇām iti /
analyzed: tasmāt na vaktavyam kleśa āvaraṇam śrāvaka ādi gotrakāṇām iti

original: naitadevam, ajñānaṃ hi kleṣṭaṃ jñānapratipakṣabhūtaṃ saṃsāramūlaṃ ca kleśṣāvaraṇameveti vyavasthāpyate, na tu jñeyāvaraṇaṃ, saṃśaya iva /
analyzed: na etat evam ajñānam hi kleṣṭam jñāna pratipakṣa bhūtam saṃsāra mūlam ca kleśṣa āvaraṇam eva iti vyavasthāpyate na tu jñeya āvaraṇam saṃśayaḥ iva

original: yathā vimatir hi duḥkhādisatyaviṣaye vicikitsā kleśaścocyate na tu viṣayāntare /
analyzed: yathā vimatiḥ hi duḥkha ādi satya viṣaye vicikitsā kleśaḥ ca ucyate na tu viṣaya antare

original: viṣayāntare hi saṃśaya eva, na kleśo na vicikitsā /
analyzed: viṣaya antare hi saṃśayaḥ eva na kleśaḥ na vicikitsā

original: evavṃ duḥkhasatyādiviṣaye evā'jñānamavidyā kleśaścocyate, na tu viṣayāntare /
analyzed: duḥkha satya ādi viṣaye eva ajñānam avidyā kleśaḥ ca ucyate na tu viṣaya antare

original: viṣayāntare tvajñānam eva, na cā'vidyā naiva kleśaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya antare tu ajñānam eva na ca avidyā na eva kleśaḥ

original: tasmāt tasya jñeyajñānamātrapravṛttāvāvaraṇatvāt tajñeyāvaraṇam ucyate na hi kleśakarmajanmanāmapi, tāni cotpadyanta evāvidyāyā eva /
analyzed: tasmāt tasya jñeya jñāna mātra pravṛttau āvaraṇa tvāt ucyate na hi kleśa karma janmanām api tāni ca utpadyante eva avidyāyāḥ eva
yadi evam bodhisattvānām āvaraṇam na vyavasthāpyate

original: naitadevam, bodhisattvānāṃ hi śrutasambhāraprabhāvitatvāt teṣāmāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇam /
analyzed: na etat evam bodhisattvānām hi śruta sambhāra prabhāvita tvāt teṣām āvaraṇam jñeya āvaraṇam

original: taduktam  āryho'pyagyūḥ pañca vidyāpadāni nārabhya syāt kadāpi sarvajñaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam pañca vidyā padāni na ārabhya syāt kadāpi sarvajñaḥ

original: tato'nyeṣāṃ nigrahā'nugrahārthaṃ svajñānārthaṃ vā'rabhet tatra yatnam //
analyzed: tatas anyeṣām nigraha anugraha artham sva jñāna artham vā ārabhet tatra yatnam
iti

original: udṛktaṃ tu mṛdvapi rāgādivastu teṣām eva bodhisattvagotrakāṇāṃ rāvakādigotrakāṇañcā'dhimātramabhīkṣṇaṃ ca pravartitaṃ rāgādicaritānām āvaranam iti /
analyzed: tu mṛdu api rāga ādi vastu teṣām eva bodhisattva gotrakāṇām rāvaka ādi gotrakāṇam ca adhimātram abhīkṣṇam ca pravartitam rāga ādi caritānām āvaranam iti

original: yeṣāṃ  mṛdāvapi viṣaye rāgādīnām anyatamat adhimātramabhīkṣṇyaṃ ca pravartate te rāgādicaritāḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām mṛdau api viṣaye rāga ādīnām anyatamat adhimātram abhīkṣṇyam ca pravartate te rāga ādi caritāḥ
samam punar teṣām eva bodhisattva gotra kāraṇam śrāvaka ādi gotrakāṇām ca āvaraṇam
samam hi prakāra dvit tva abhāvāt

original: samabhāgacaritānām āvaraṇam iti yeṣāṃ viṣayasādṛśye {sāmīpye?} kleśa utpadyate na tvabhīkṣṇaṃ te samabhāgacaritāḥ /
analyzed: sama bhāga caritānām āvaraṇam iti yeṣām viṣaya sādṛśye sāmīpye kleśaḥ utpadyate na tu abhīkṣṇam te sama bhāga caritāḥ

original: bhodisattvo hi kāruṇyādhipattyāt saṃsāramupādatte, prajñādhipattyāc ca saṃsāradoṣaṃ yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tyajati /
analyzed: bhodisattvaḥ hi kāruṇya ādhipattyāt saṃsāram upādatte prajñā ādhipattyāt ca saṃsāra doṣam yathābhūtam dṛṣṭvā tyajati

original: tataḥ kleśābhāve'pi sattvākicanāj janmaparigraho'pratiṣṭhataṃ nirvāṇam, saṃsāranirvāṇayor dvayorapratiṣṭhitatvāt /
analyzed: tatas kleśa abhāve api janma parigrahaḥ apratiṣṭhatam nirvāṇam saṃsāra nirvāṇayoḥ dvayoḥ apratiṣṭhita tvāt

original: tadāvaraṇantu kleśābhibhūtena yathā saṃsāramupādāya yathābhūtadoṣādarśanāccā'kṛpayā parityajanam /
analyzed: tad āvaraṇam tu kleśa abhibhūtena yathā saṃsāram upādāya yathā bhūta doṣa adarśanāt ca a kṛpayā parityajanam
ajñānam iha āvaraṇam ucyate kṛpā prajñayoḥ pratibandhaka tvāt iti anye

original: athavā yathoktaṃ mahāratnakūṭe  sa āśayena nirvāṇe tiṣṭhati, saṃsāre ca prayogeṇa tiṣṭhatīti /
analyzed: athavā yathā uktam mahāratnakūṭe saḥ āśayena nirvāṇe tiṣṭhati saṃsāre ca prayogeṇa tiṣṭhati iti
etat hi bodhisattvānām a pratiṣṭhitam nirvāṇam

original: tatra nirvāṇapṛṣṭhībhāvād āśayaprayogābhyāṃ saṃsāramupādatte, agotrasthasattva iva /
analyzed: tatra nirvāṇa pṛṣṭhībhāvāt āśaya prayogābhyām saṃsāram upādatte a gotra stha sattvaḥ iva

original: tathā ca saṃsārapṛṣṭhībhāvānnirvāṇagatābhyāmāśayaprayogābhyāṃ saṃsāraṃ tyajati, śrāvakādigotrakā iva /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃsāra pṛṣṭhībhāvāt nirvāṇa gatābhyām āśaya prayogābhyām saṃsāram tyajati śrāvaka ādi gotrakāḥ iva
evam saṃsāra ādānam tad parityajanam ca bodhisattva gotrakāṇām a pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇa āvaraṇam saṃsāra nirvāṇayoḥ ekānta patita tvāt

original: bodhisattvās tu tathāgatatvaprāptikāle kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇāt saṃsāre na tiṣṭhanti nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇe ca, dharmakāyaprabandhān na tiṣṭhanti nirvāṇe śrāvakādivat /
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ tu tathāgata tva prāpti kāle kleśa jñeya āvaraṇa prahāṇāt saṃsāre na tiṣṭhanti nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇe ca dharmakāya prabandhāt na tiṣṭhanti nirvāṇe śrāvaka ādi vat
tatas saṃsāra nirvāṇayoḥ ubhayhatra api na pratiṣṭhanti iti

original: atra bodhisattvasya śrāvakādīnāñca mārge, teṣāṃ prayoge, phale, apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ ca pratibandhakatvādetāni pañcavidhānyāvaraṇānyākhyātāni /
analyzed: atra bodhisattvasya śrāvaka ādīnām ca mārge teṣām prayoge phale apratiṣṭhita nirvāṇam ca pratibandhaka tvāt etāni pañcavidhāni āvaraṇāni ākhyātāni
iti etat yathāyogam iti yathāsambhavam
tatra prathamam antyam ca bodhisattva gotrakāṇām āvaraṇam

itarat dvayam punar ubhayeṣām āvaraṇam ākhyātam

original: tatra ca jñeyāvaraṇaṃ bodhisattvānām āvaraṇam uktam /
analyzed: tatra ca jñeya āvaraṇam bodhisattvānām āvaraṇam uktam
tat ca akliṣṭam ajñānam iti
nava saṃyojanāni kleśa āvaraṇam
kasya etāni āvaraṇam
anunaya saṃyojanam saṃvegasya āvaraṇam

original: pratighasaṃyojanam upekṣāyāḥ tena hi  pratikūlam api pratighavastu upekṣituṃ na śaknoti /
analyzed: pratigha saṃyojanam upekṣāyāḥ tena hi pratikūlam api pratigha vastu upekṣitum na śaknoti
śeṣāṇi tattva darśanasya āvaraṇam
katham kṛtvā
tāni hi yathākramam
saṃkleśasya parijñāne saṃyojanāni āvaraṇam bhavanti

original: mānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñāne bahvaty āvaraṇaṃ abhisamayakāle sāntaravyantarā'smimānasamudācāravaśena tad aprahāṇāt /
analyzed: mānam saṃyojanam hi satkāya dṛṣṭi parijñāne bahu ati āvaraṇam abhisamaya kāle sa antara vyantara asmimāna samudācāra vaśena tat a prahāṇāt
avidyā saṃyojanam satkāya dṛṣṭi vastu parijñāne tena upādāna skandha a parijñānāt

original: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ nirodhasatyaparijñāne satkāyā'ntagrāhadṛṣṭibhyāntad uttrāsāt mithyādṛṣṭyā cāpavādāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭi saṃyojanam nirodha satya parijñāne uttrāsāt mithyādṛṣṭyā ca apavādāt
parāmarśa saṃyojanam mārga satya parijñāne anyathā a praśuddhi parāmarśanāt
vicikitsā saṃyojanam ratnatraya parijñāne tat guṇa a an abhiśraddhānāt
īrṣyā saṃyojanam lābha satkāra parijñāne tat doṣa a darśanāt
mātsarya saṃyojanam saṃlekha parijñāne pariṣkāra a adhyavasānāt māna ādi bhedena

original: ātmātmīyagrāhyagrāhakatvavivekena bālajanaparikalpitadharmasvabhāvavivekena ca yat satkāyadrṣṭir darśanaṃ tat satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñānaṃ /
analyzed: ātma ātmīya grāhya grāhaka tva vivekena bāla jana parikalpita dharma svabhāva vivekena ca yat sat kāya drṣṭiḥ darśanam tat sat kāya dṛṣṭi parijñānam

original: tasya mānasaṃyojanaṃ bhavaty āvaraṇaṃ tad utpattivibandhāt /
analyzed: tasya māna saṃyojanam bhavati āvaraṇam tat utpatti vibandhāt

original: kutra katham ityāha  abhisamyakāle sāntaravyantarā'smimānasamudācāravaśena tad aprahāṇād iti /
analyzed: kutra katham iti āha abhisamya kāle tat a prahāṇāt iti
satya abhisamaya kāle nirvedha bhāgīya avasthāyām
tatra sāntaraḥ pratipakṣa vyavahitaḥ vyantaraḥ pratipakṣa avyavahitaḥ

original: sa cādhimātre mṛdau ca pratipakṣe veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca adhimātre mṛdau ca pratipakṣe veditavyaḥ

original: yāvat sāntareṇa vyantareṇa cāsmimānena samudācarati na tāvat satkāyadṛṣṭEḥ prahāṇam asti /
analyzed: yāvat sāntareṇa vyantareṇa ca asmimānena samudācarati na tāvat satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇam asti

original: satkāya dṛṣṭer vastu pañcopādānaskandhāḥ tad ālambanataḥ /
analyzed: satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ vastu pañca upādāna skandhāḥ tat ālambanataḥ

original: yathoktaṃ sūtre  ye kecicchramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā ātmā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśYanti abhiniviśamānā abhiniviśante ta imān eva pañcopādānaskandhānupādāyeti /
analyzed: yathā uktam sūtre ye kecid śramaṇāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vā ātmā ātmā iti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti abhiniviśamānāḥ abhiniviśante te imān eva pañca upādāna skandhān upādāya iti
kim punar tat parijñānam

original: ātmanyātma śūnyatāyāḥ skandheṣu bālajanaparikalpitadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca yad darśanam anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato'nātmataḥ samudāyādito vā yad darśanaṃ tat teṣāṃ parijñānaṃ /
analyzed: ātmani ātma śūnyatāyāḥ skandheṣu bāla jana parikalpita dharma svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ ca yat darśanam anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ samudāya āditaḥ vā yat darśanam tat teṣām parijñānam
atra eva kāraṇam āha tena upādāna skandha a parijñānāt iti

original: avidyayā hi nityādiprakārāvṛteṣu skandheṣu tat parijñānā'bhāvād avidyā skandhaparijñānāvaraṇaṃ /

dṛṣṭi saṃyojanam hi tisraḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ sat kāya anta grāha mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ

original: tatra satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣvātmata ātmīyato veti darśanaṃ /
analyzed: tatra satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ pañcasu upādāna skandheṣu ātmataḥ ātmīyataḥ vā iti darśanam

original: antagrāhadṛṣṭir hi tasminnevātmābhikalpitabhāve śāśvatadarśanam ucchedadarśanaṃ vā /
analyzed: anta grāha dṛṣṭiḥ hi tasmin eva ātma abhikalpita bhāve śāśvata darśanam uccheda darśanam vā

original: yena darśanena hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā kriyā vā sad vā vastu apavadate mithyā vā parikalpayati tan mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: yena darśanena hetum vā phalam vā kriyā vā sat vā vastu apavadate mithyā vā parikalpayati tat mithyādṛṣṭiḥ
nirodha satya parijñānam śānta ādibhiḥ ākaraiḥ

original: katham punas tat tasyāvaraṇam ityata āha  satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭibhyāntaduttrāsāt mithyādṛṣṭyā cā'pavādād iti /

original: tatra satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭibhyām ahaṃ tatra na bhaviṣyāmīti nirodhād uttrasyati mithyādṛṣṭyā cā'pavadate nāstyeva nirodha iti /

original: tatra satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭibhyāṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato nissaraṇataś ca na parijānāti mithyādṛṣṭyā nirodhato na parijānāti /
analyzed: tatra satkāya anta grāha dṛṣṭibhyām śāntataḥ praṇītataḥ nissaraṇataḥ ca na parijānāti mithyādṛṣṭyāḥ nirodhataḥ na parijānāti
evam dṛṣṭi saṃyojanam nirodha parijñāne āvaraṇam

original: tatra dṛṣṭiparāmarśo dṛṣṭau dṛṣṭyāśrayeṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yad utkarṣādito darśanaṃ /
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭi parāmarśaḥ dṛṣṭau dṛṣṭi āśrayeṣu ca pañcasu upādāna skandheṣu yat utkarṣa āditaḥ darśanam

original: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ śīlaṃ vrataṃ tad ubhayaṃ tadāśrayān vā pañcopādānaskandhān śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikato vā samanupaśyato yad darśanaṃ tacchīlavrataparāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: śīla vrata parāmarśaḥ śīlam vratam tat ubhayam tad āśrayān vā pañca upādāna skandhān śuddhitaḥ muktitaḥ nairyāṇikataḥ vā samanupaśyataḥ yat darśanam tad śīla vrata parāmarśaḥ
mārgasya parijñānam punar nairyāṇika ādibhiḥ ākāraiḥ

original: katham punaḥ parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ mārgaparijñāna āvaraṇam ityata āha  anyathā 'praśuddhiparāmarśanād iti /
analyzed: katham punar parāmarśa saṃyojanam mārga parijñāne āvaraṇam iti atas āha anyathā a praśuddhi parāmarśanāt iti

original: śīlavratamātrakeṇa vā kāmasukhālayena vā duṣkaracaryayā vā sāṃkhyādijñānena vā śuddhiparāmarśanāt /
analyzed: śīla vrata mātrakeṇa vā kāma sukha ālayena vā duṣkara caryayā vā sāṃkhya ādi jñānena vā śuddhi parāmarśanāt

original: dṛṣṭiparāmarśena tu yenaiva śuddhiṃ pratyeti tadevā'grataḥ parāmṛśati /
analyzed: dṛṣṭi parāmarśena tu yena eva śuddhim pratyeti tat eva agratas parāmṛśati

original: evaṃparāmarśasaṃyojanena mārgaṃ tyajati anyathā ca śuddhimparāmṛśatīti /
analyzed: evam parāmarśa saṃyojanena mārgam tyajati anyathā ca śuddhim parāmṛśati iti

original: katham ityato bravīti  tad guṇā'nabhiśraddhānād iti /
analyzed: katham iti atas bravīti tat guṇa a na abhiśraddhānāt iti
vicikitsā saṃyojanam satī aratneṣu vimatiḥ
prakarṣeṇa a apanīta sarva guṇa doṣasya paryanta āśraya tvena buddha ratne parijñānam

original: saṃsārasāgarottarakatvena sarvasahetukaduḥkhā'tyantaviyogātmakatvena tat pratipādakatvena ca dharmaratne parijñānaṃ /
analyzed: saṃsāra sāgara uttaraka tvena sarva sa hetuka duḥkha a tyanta viyoga ātmaka tvena tad pratipādaka tvena ca dharmaratne parijñānam
śrāmaṇya pahala stha tvena anuttara dakṣiṇīya kṣetra tvena ca asangha ratne parijñānam

original: satyadarśanāt prahīṇavicikitsaścā'vetya prasādalābhena ratnatrayaguṇe'bhiśraddatte nā'prahīṇavicikitsa iti /
analyzed: satya darśanāt prahīṇa vicikitsaḥ ca avetya prasāda lābhena ratnatraya guṇe abhiśraddatte na a prahīṇa vicikitsaḥ iti
atas vicikitsā saṃyojanam ratnatraya parijñāne āvaraṇam uktam
īrṣyā saṃyojanam lābha satkāra parijñāne āvaraṇam

original: atraiva kāraṇam āha  tad doṣā'darśanād iti /
analyzed: atra eva kāraṇam āha tat doṣa adarśanāt iti
īrṣyā saṃyojanam hi lābha satkāra raktaḥ anya sampad pratigha aṃśikaḥ cetasaḥ vyāroṣaḥ
sarva anartha āśraya tva avabodhaḥ lābha satkāra parijñānam

original: īrṣyayā tu lābhasatkāraṃ sarvaguṇavipakṣabhūtatvena vividhā'narthamūlatvena ca na parijānātītyato lābhasatkāra parijñāna āvaraṇam irṣyāsaṃyojanaṃ /
analyzed: īrṣyayā tu lābha satkāram sarva guṇa vipakṣa bhūta tvena vividha anartha mūla tvena ca na parijānāti iti atas lābha satkāra parijñāne āvaraṇam irṣyā saṃyojanam
mātsarya saṃyojanam saṃlekha parijñāne āvaraṇam iti
katham iti atas āha pariṣkāra a adhyavasānāt iti

original: mātsaryaṃ pariṣkāre'ṣv avyavasito rāgāṃśikaścetasa upakaraṇeṣv āgrahaḥ /
analyzed: mātsaryam pariṣkāre a su a vyavasitaḥ rāga āṃśikaḥ cetasaḥ upakaraṇeṣu āgrahaḥ
saṃlekhaḥ pariṣkāraiḥ vivekaḥ
tasya sarva guṇa āśraya vastu tvena avabodhaḥ parijñānam

original: na tu mātsaryeṇa pariṣkārā'dhyavāsānāt sarvaguṇāśrayetvena parijānātītyataḥ saṃlekhaparijñāne mātsaryāvaraṇatvam uktaṃ /
analyzed: na tu mātsaryeṇa pariṣkāra a dhyavāsānāt sarva guṇa āśraya itvena parijānāti iti atas saṃlekha parijñāne mātsarya āvaraṇa tvam uktam
tatra anunaya pratigha saṃyojane tattva adhigama prayoga āvaraṇe

original: śeṣāṇi tu prayuktasya tattvadarśanasyāvaraṇāni tasmād eva teṣām anukramaḥ /
analyzed: śeṣāṇi tu prayuktasya tattva darśanasya āvaraṇāni tasmāt eva teṣām anukramaḥ

original: tadyathā'vaśyaṃ prathamam eva mumukṣūṇāṃ saṃsārāc citttam udvejayitavyaṃ /
analyzed: tat yathā avaśyam prathamam eva mumukṣūṇām saṃsārāt cittam udvejayitavyam
tatas sarvatas upekṣeṇa bhavitavyam
tatas sarva anartha mūla tvāt satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ parijñeyā

original: tad anantaraṃ dukḥ samudayātmakatvena tadvastu parijñeaṃ/
analyzed: tat anantaram samudaya ātmaka tvena tat vastu
tatas tad nirodhaḥ vijñeyaḥ
tat anantaram lābha mārgaḥ vijñeyaḥ

original: tataḥ satyadarśanād ratnatraye tad guṇā'vabodhād avetya prasādalābhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas satya darśanāt ratnatraye tat guṇa avabodhāt avetya prasāda lābhaḥ

original: satyadarśanabalenaiva ca lābhasatkārasaṃlekhayor doṣaguṇadarśī bhavatītyevam āvaraṇīyadharmakramahetunā tadāvaraṇakramo veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: satya darśana balena eva ca lābha satkāra saṃlekhayoḥ doṣa guṇa darśī bhavati iti evam āvaraṇīya dharma krama hetunā tad āvaraṇa kramaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: nanu sarvasyāpi sarvatrāvaraṇatvena saṃbhavād vastupratiniyamenāvaraṇanirdeśo na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: nanu sarvasya api sarvatra āvaraṇa tvena saṃbhavāt vastu pratiniyamena āvaraṇa nirdeśaḥ na yuktaḥ

original: naivā'tra vastupratiniyamaḥ kriyate kintarhi pratyāsattitaḥ prādhānyaiṣa nirdeśaḥ //
analyzed: na eva atra vastu pratiniyamaḥ kriyate kin tarhi pratyāsattitaḥ nirdeśaḥ
bodhisattva āvaraṇam kim etat eva āvaraṇam

śubha ādau daśadhā aparam
āvaraṇam

iti evamādi āvaraṇam
śubha ādayaḥ punar

bodhiḥ tu tat phalam

original: tatra śubhaṃ sāmānyata uddiṣṭaṃ prabhedataḥ svabhāvataś ca na vijñāyata ity atas tat pratipādanārtham ārabhyate  samādānaṃ dhīmattā'bhrāntyanāvṛtī /
analyzed: tatra śubham sāmānyatas uddiṣṭam prabhedataḥ svabhāvataḥ ca na vijñāyate iti atas tat pratipādana artham ārabhyate samādānam

original: nānyatrāso'matsaritvaṃ vaśitvaṃ ca ityetac chubham iti /
analyzed: na anyatra asaḥ amatsari tvam vaśi tvam ca iti etat śubham iti

original: bodhir api vacanamātreṇa svabhāvato na vijñāyata ityasyā vibhutvaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: bodhiḥ api vacana mātreṇa svabhāvataḥ na vijñāyate iti asyāḥ vibhu tvam darśayati

original: śubhasya bodheś ca samādānādīnām iva svātantryeṇāvaraṇanirdeśāt svātantryam evā'tra vijñāyate na tad deśanirdeśabhāva ityeke /
analyzed: śubhasya bodheḥ ca samādāna ādīnām iva svātantryeṇa āvaraṇa nirdeśāt svātantryam eva a atra vijñāyate na tat deśa nirdeśa bhāve iti eke

original: utpattyāvaraṇaṃ hi śūbhe vyavasthāpyate tac ca bodhicittādīnāṃ sāmānyaṃ tasyāḥ śubhotpādyatvāt /
analyzed: utpatti āvaraṇam hi śūbhe vyavasthāpyate tat ca bodhi citta ādīnām sāmānyam tasyāḥ śubha utpādya tvāt

original: dhṛtyādyāvaraṇantu samādānādyāvaraṇaṃ samādānādiṣu vṛttyādyarthabhedāt bodhirapyekopyā prāptavyā cetyatas tasyāḥ sthityāvaraṇaṃ prāptyāvaraṇaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: dhṛti ādi āvaraṇam tu samādāna ādi āvaraṇam samādāna ādiṣu vṛtti ādi artha bhedāt bodhiḥ api ekā ūpyā prāptavyā ca iti atas tasyāḥ sthiti āvaraṇam prāpti āvaraṇam ca vyavasthāpyate
tasmāt na asti atra svātantrya prasangaḥ iti

original: kramaś ca teṣāṃ samāsataḥ  kuśalamūlaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ niṣpādya bodhiḥ prāptavyā /
analyzed: kramaḥ ca teṣām samāsatas kuśala mūlam niravaśeṣam niṣpādya bodhiḥ prāptavyā

original: vyāsataḥ punaḥ prathamata eva bodhicittam utpādayitavyaṃ svaparārthasampadādhārabhūtatvāt /
analyzed: vyāsataḥ punar prathamatas eva bodhi cittam utpādayitavyam sva para artha sampad ādhāra bhūta tvāt

original: tataścittotpādanā'nurūpā dānādiṣu pratipattiḥ yayā bodhisattva ityākhyāṃ labhate /
analyzed: tatas citta utpādana anurūpā dāna ādiṣu pratipattiḥ yayā bodhisattvaḥ iti ākhyām labhate
tatas asaṃkhyeya kalpena abhyasyataḥ puṇya jñāna sambhāra sañcayāt āśaya viśodhana artham pudgala dharma bhrānti pratipakṣeṇa a bhrānti ātmakaḥ darśana mārgaḥ utpādayitavyaḥ
tatas ca āvaraṇa vigama prabhāvitaḥ bhāvanā mārgaḥ prakarṣam netavyaḥ viśuddhi viśeṣa yoga artham

original: tataḥ śrāvakādyatikramaṇaprayogeṇa yathopacitāni sarvāṇyetāni laukikakalokottarāṇi kuśalamūlāni bodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni /
analyzed: tatas śrāvaka ādi atikramaṇa prayogeṇa yathā upacitāni sarvāṇi etāni laukikaka lokottarāṇi kuśala mūlāni bodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni

original: tataś ca nāmavasthāmāgato mahābodhyāśayatvād buddhabodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrodāreṣu nirdeśeṣu na trasyati /
analyzed: tatas ca nāma avasthām āgataḥ mahā bodhyāśaya tvāt buddha bodhisattvānām gambhīra udāreṣu nirdeśeṣu na trasyati

original: tato bahuśrutapratipattiyukta udāraṃ dharmaṃ nirdiśati sattvaparipācanārthaṃ /
analyzed: tatas bahu śruta pratipatti yuktaḥ udāram dharmam nirdiśati sattva paripācana artham

original: tataḥ paripakvavineyeṣu tadvimocanārthaṃ vaśitvaṃ buddhatvam avāpnotīti /
analyzed: tatas paripakva vineyeṣu tad vimocana artham vaśitvam buddhatvam avāpnoti iti

original: atra hi triṃśadāvaraṇāny uktāni āvaraṇīyārthāḥ śubhādayo daśa cetyataḥ pṛcchati  eṣāṃ tu śubhādīnāṃ kasya katyāvaraṇāni vijñeyānīti /
analyzed: atra hi triṃśat āvaraṇāni uktāni āvaraṇīya arthāḥ śubha ādayaḥ daśa ca iti atas pṛcchati eṣām tu śubha ādīnām kasya kati āvaraṇāni vijñeyāni iti

original: ata āha  trīṇi trīṇi ca eteṣāṃ jñeyānyavaraṇāni hi /

original: svabhāvena śrāvakādigotrakebhyamtīkṣṇendriyatvāt sarvathā sarvajñeyopaparīkṣādhikāritvāt gambhīrodāradharmā'dhimukteś ca bodhisattva eva dhīmān nā'nyaḥ /

original: kujano hi pratipattiyuktam api bodhisattvopamitaṃ na jānīte /
