original: anyetvāhuḥ nirvikalpā'tra prajñā vimuktiparipācinī tat prayogikā ca dvitīyā /
analyzed: anye tu āhuḥ nirvikalpā atra prajñā vimukti paripācinī tat prayogikā ca dvitīyā

original: tayor aparipakvatā tattvādhigamā'yogyatā tad upaniṣadbhāvā'yogyatā cā'paripūrṇaṃbhāratvād yathākramam iti /
analyzed: tayoḥ aparipakva tā tattva adhigama ayogya tā tat upaniṣad bhāva ayogya tā ca a paripūrṇaṃbhāra tvāt yathākramam iti

original: kim atrāvaraṇaṃ ? darśanaheyakleśasya puṣṭavāsanākleśāvaraṇādīnām anyatamā'vaśiṣṭatā prajñāparipākavibandhabhūtam ajñānaṃ sambhārā'paripūrṇatā ca /
analyzed: kim atra āvaraṇam darśana heya kleśasya puṣṭa vāsanā kleśa āvaraṇa ādīnām anyatamā a vaśiṣṭa tā prajñā paripāka vibandha bhūtam ajñānam sambhāra a paripūrṇa tā ca
āvaraṇa prahāṇam anāvaraṇam iti

original: āvaraṇaṃ prahīyate 'nenety āvaraṇāprahāṇam āvaraṇapratipakṣād anāvaraṇaṃ bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
analyzed: āvaraṇam prahīyate anena iti āvaraṇa aprahāṇam āvaraṇa pratipakṣāt anāvaraṇam bhāvanā mārgaḥ
tasya trīṇi
sahajam dauṣṭhulyam bhāvanā heya kleśāḥ anuśayaḥ
sahajam vā ātma dṛṣṭi ādīnām dharmadhātu sparśa artha ādi prativedha vibandhakasya akliṣṭasya ajñānasya ālayavijñāna sanniviṣṭam paripuṣṭa bījam
kausīdyam moha aṃśikāt ālasyāt citta anabhyutsāhaḥ
pramādaḥ ca viṣaya vyāsangaḥ kuśale ca anavadhānam
samādheḥ āsvādinā atra pramādaḥ iti eke

original: tatra dauṣṭhulyāc ca mārgaṃ na bhāvayati /
analyzed: tatra dauṣṭhulyāt ca mārgam na bhāvayati
pramādāt akuśalāt cittām na rakṣati
kim atra āvaraṇam etat eva trayam

original: pariṇātes trīṇi yair anyatra cittaṃ pariṇāmayatīti /
analyzed: pariṇāteḥ trīṇi yaiḥ anyatra cittam pariṇāmayati iti

original: tatra pariṇatirutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ buddhatvaṃ eva cittena niyamanaṃ /
analyzed: tatra pariṇatiḥ utpannānām kuśala mūlānām buddha tvam eva cittena niyamanam
tasyāḥ trīṇi āvaraṇāni

original: katamāni trīṇi yair anyatra buddhatvāt saṃsāre śrāvakādibodho vā cittaṃ pariṇāmayati nā'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambandhau /
analyzed: katamāni trīṇi yaiḥ anyatra buddha tvāt saṃsāre śrāvaka ādi bodhaḥ vā cittam pariṇāmayati na a anuttarāyām samyaksambandhau
tāni punar bhava saktiḥ bhoga sakti līna citta tā ca
bhavaḥ pañca upādāna skandhāḥ
bhujyante iti bhogāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ
tayoḥ abhiṣvangaḥ saktiḥ

original: līnacittatā'nudāracittatā kva buddhatvaṃ kva ca madvidha ityātmanyasambhāvanā /
analyzed: līna citta tā anudāra citta tā kva buddha tvam kva ca madvidhaḥ iti ātmani asambhāvanā

original: tatra ca bhavasaktyā bhogasaktyā ca sugatau cittaṃ pariṇāmayati līnacittatatyā śrāvakādiyāne pariṇāmayati kimatrāvaraṇaṃ ? bhavabhogatṛṣṇā kausīdyam akāruṇyañca /
analyzed: tatra ca bhava saktyā bhoga saktyā ca sugatau cittam pariṇāmayati līna citta tatyā śrāvaka ādi yāne pariṇāmayati kim atra āvaraṇam bhava bhoga tṛṣṇā kausīdyam akāruṇyam ca
atrāsasya trīṇi

original: ko'yam atrāsaḥ ? śūnyatāyāṃ gambhīrodāreṣu ca buddhabodhisattvadharmeṣv adhimuktir abhīrutā /
analyzed: kaḥ ayam a trāsaḥ śūnyatāyām gambhīra udāreṣu ca buddha bodhisattva dharmeṣu adhimuktiḥ abhīru tā

original: asambhāvanā pudgale mahāyānanayābhidhyāyinaḥ pudgalasya bhrāntyā'vagamo vacanañca, śīlasamādhiprajñādiguṇasya vā'sampratyayaḥ /
analyzed: asambhāvanā pudgale mahāyāna naya abhidhyāyinaḥ pudgalasya bhrāntyā avagamaḥ vacanam ca śīla samādhi prajñā ādi guṇasya vā asampratyayaḥ
an adhimuktiḥ dharme gambhīra udāra naya pratipādake buddha vacana tvena a viparīta arthena ca a sampratyayaḥ
yathāruta vicāraṇā arthe

original: anutpannā'niruddhādiśāntādyartha yathāśabdam eva pratipadyate na cābhiprāyikārthatattvam avagacchati /
analyzed: yathāśabdam eva pratipadyate na ca ābhiprāyika artha tattvam avagacchati
tasmāt anutpanna ādi arthā an adhimuktiḥ
kim atra āvaraṇam vicikitsā prajñā samādhi vipakṣa bhūta jñānam ābhiprāyika artha miti rūta vicāraṇā vipakṣa bhūtam ca iti
amātsaryasya trīṇi
amātsaryam yatas saddharma sthitaye anya anugraha artham vā dharma deśanā
saddharme agauravam acitrīkāraḥ
tena anya santāna a prāpaṇāt cirasthitikam saddharmam na karoti

original: lābhasatkārapūjāyāṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ saddharmagaurave mā'nyo'pi mattulyo'dhiko vā bhaviṣyatītyāśankā /
analyzed: lābha satkāra pūjāyām gauravam citrīkāraḥ saddharma gaurave mā anyaḥ api mad tulyaḥ adhikaḥ vā bhaviṣyati iti āśankā

original: tasmāl lābhādivyavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhītyā dharmaṃ na deśayati /
analyzed: tasmāt lābha ādi vyavadhānam bhaviṣyati iti bhītyā dharmam na deśayati

original: lābhasatkārādhyavasāne'vidyamāne'pi sattveṣvakāruñañceti sattveṣu karuṇābhāvān na deśayati /
analyzed: lābha satkāra adhyavasāne a vidyamāne api sattveṣu a kāruñam ca iti sattveṣu karuṇā bhāvāt na deśayati
na hi akāruṇikaḥ sattva duḥkhena apakriyate
kim atra āvaraṇam a gauravam lābha sakāra saktiḥ a kāruñam ca iti
vaśitvasya trīṇi āvaraṇāni iti arthaḥ
vaśitvam hi sarveṣām citta vaśitvānām prāptiḥ buddhatvam

original: tasya trīṇyāvaṇāni punar na jñāyanta ityata āha  yair vibhutvaṃ na labhate iti /
analyzed: tasya trīṇi āvaṇāni punar na jñāyante iti atas āha yaiḥ vibhu tvam na labhate iti

original: cittavaśitvapratibandhād vaśitvasya yair vaśitvaṃ na labhate tānyeva vaśītvasyāvaraṇānītyāha /
analyzed: citta vaśitva pratibandhāt vaśitvasya yaiḥ vaśitvam na labhate tāni eva vaśītvasya āvaraṇāni iti āha
vibhu tvam punar jñāna prahāṇa prabhāva sampanna tā

original: atha vā vaśitvaparyāye nirdiṣṭatvādyair vaśitvaṃ na labhata iti vṛddhatvaṃ na labhata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā vaśitva paryāye nirdiṣṭa tva ādyaiḥ vaśitvam na labhate iti vṛddha tvam na labhate iti arthaḥ
śruta vyasanam saddharma śravaṇena atyanta viyogaḥ
bandhubhiḥ atyanta viyogaḥ bandhu vyasanam
tat punar śruta vyasanam saddharma vyasana samvartanīya karma prabhavanāt bhavati

original: svadarśanaparāmarśasthitatvād akalyāṇamitrāśritatvād vā yair avipratisārair mahāyānasūtrāntaḥ pratikṣipto mārabhāṣito'yam apāyahetuśca nā'pyambuddhabhāṣita iti anyān api tasmād vicchindayanti  likhitaṃ conmṛṣanti dāhayanti pāvayantītyādiprakāraiḥ saddharmavyasanasamvartanīyakarmotpadyate saddharmaśravaṇavidhurātmabhāvaparipuṣṭitaḥ /
analyzed: sva darśana parāmarśa sthita tvāt akalyāṇa mitra āśrita tvāt vā yaiḥ a vipratisāraiḥ mahāyāna sūtrāntaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ māra bhāṣitaḥ ayam apāya hetuḥ ca na a api ambuddha bhāṣitaḥ iti anyān api tasmāt likhitam ca unmṛṣanti dāhayanti pāvayanti ityādi prakāraiḥ saddharma vyasana samvartanīya karmā utpadyate saddharma śravaṇa vidhura ātmabhāva paripuṣṭitaḥ

original: asati śrutavyasane'lpaśrutatvaṃ jñānasambhārasyā'paripūritā āvaraṇam iti prakṛtaṃ /
analyzed: asati śruta vyasane alpaśruta tvam jñāna sambhārasya a paripūri tā āvaraṇam iti prakṛtam

original: alpaśruto he na śaknoti dharmān pravivektum /
analyzed: alpa śrutaḥ he na śaknoti dharmān pravivektum
bahu śrutasya api samādheḥ iti sambandhaḥ

original: chandādīnām anyatamā'bhāvāt aparipūrṇatvād bhāvanāyāṃ vā'ṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇām anyatamābhāvāt samādher aparikarmitatvaṃ /
analyzed: chanda ādīnām anyatama abhāvāt a paripūrṇa tvāt bhāvanāyām vā aṣṭānām prahāṇa saṃskārāṇām anyatama abhāvāt samādheḥ a parikarmita tvam
vajra upama ādīnām vā buddha samādhīnām a pariniṣpanna tvam a parikarmita tvam

original: kimatrāvaraṇaṃ ? dharmavyasanasamvartanīyakarma alpaśrutatvaṃ duṣprajñatā samādhipratyanīkaścopakleśo layauddhatyādika iti //
analyzed: kim atra āvaraṇam dharma vyasana samvartanīya karma alpa śruta tvam duṣprajña tā samādhi pratyanīkaḥ ca upakleśaḥ laya auddhatya ādikaḥ iti
daśa kāraṇāni tat punar etat āvaraṇam aprayoga ādikam

original: yatrā'rthe daśa kāraṇāni bhavantīti  utpattyādau prāptiparyante yasminn arthe tadāvaraṇaviparyayeṇa prayogādīni samādhiparikarmitatvā'vasānāni daśakāraṇāni bhavanti /
analyzed: yatra arthe daśa kāraṇāni bhavanti iti utpatti ādau prāpti paryante yasmin arthe tad āvaraṇa viparyayeṇa prayoga ādīni samādhi parikarmita tva avasānāni daśa kāraṇāni bhavanti

original: atra cotpattyādikāraṇatvā'viśeṣād bhinnasyā'pi pratyekam apy abhedanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca utpatti ādi kāraṇa tva a viśeṣāt bhinnasya api pratyekam api abheda nirdeśaḥ

original: tad arthādhikāreṇety utpattyyādyarthādhipatyenetyarthaḥ teṣāṃ hi śubhādīnām utpattyādikāraṇavibandhaṃ vartamānam utpattyādyāvaraṇam ucyate tadyathā kuḍyādikam ālokamāvṛnvat kāryasya cakṣur vijñānasyāvaraṇam ucyate /
analyzed: tat artha adhikāreṇa iti utpatti yādi artha ādhipatyena iti arthaḥ teṣām hi śubha ādīnām utpatti ādi kāraṇa vibandham vartamānam utpatti ādi āvaraṇam ucyate tat yathā kuḍya ādikam ālokam āvṛnvat kāryasya cakṣuḥ vijñānasya āvaraṇam ucyate

original: evaṃ kṛtvaiṣāṃ daśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ triṃśad āvaraṇaviparyayeṇa triṃśat kāraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā eṣām daśānām dharmāṇām triṃśat āvaraṇa viparyayeṇa triṃśat kāraṇam veditavyam

original: tatra śubhotpattikāraṇaṃ trīṇi  prayoga āyatanaprayogo yoniśaḥ prayogaś ca /
analyzed: tatra śubha utpatti kāraṇam trīṇi prayogaḥ āyatana prayogaḥ yoniśas prayogaḥ ca

original: tad yathā cakṣur ādaya ityatraiva dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti atra eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ vijñānasya utpatti kāraṇam eva sthiti ādi kāraṇam

original: tatrā'prayogādayaḥ prayogādīnāṃ sākṣād vibandhe vartamānāḥ paramparayā śubhotpatter api pratibandhakāḥ /
analyzed: tatra a prayoga ādayaḥ prayoga ādīnām sākṣāt vibandhe vartamānāḥ paramparayā śubha utpatteḥ api pratibandhakāḥ

original: evam utpattyāvaraṇaṃ śubhe draṣṭavyam ityāha tasyotpādanīyatvād iti śubhe sthityādyasambhavād utpattyāvaraṇam evaitad iti darśayati /
analyzed: evam utpatti āvaraṇam śubhe draṣṭavyam iti āha tasya utpādanīya tvāt iti śubhe sthiti ādi asambhavāt utpatti āvaraṇam eva etat iti darśayati
sthiti kāraṇam bodhau
āśraya parāvṛttiḥ bodhiḥ āśrayaḥ nirmala tathatā
atra kāraṇam āha akopya tvāt iti

original: yāval lokas tāvad avasthānād akopyatvaṃ, nā'nyathā bhavati vinivartate vā /
analyzed: yāvat lokaḥ tāvat avasthānāt akopya tvam na a anyathā bhavati vinivartate vā

original: śrāvakādīnān tu bodhiḥ svasantāna eva kṛtārthatvād vyāvartate /
analyzed: śrāvaka ādīnām tu bodhiḥ sva santāne eva kṛtārtha tvāt vyāvartate

original: bodhisattvā hi sarvasattvahitasukhādhyāśayena sambhāreṣu pravartamānā  āśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇatvād bodher yāvat sattvās tāvad avatiṣṭhantīty ucyate na tv anutpattimātratvāc chrāvakādivat /
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ hi sarva sattva hita sukha adhyāśayena sambhāreṣu pravartamānāḥ āśraya parāvṛtti lakṣaṇa tvāt bodheḥ yāvat sattvāḥ tāvat avatiṣṭhanti iti ucyate na tu anutpatti mātra tvāt śrāvaka ādi vat

original: utpattiṃ vinā bhāvitatvāt tu sthiter utpattir apyatra bhavati /
analyzed: utpattim vinā bhāvita tvāt tu sthiteḥ utpattiḥ api atra bhavati
tasmāt bodhi sthiti kāraṇam eva ucyate na utpatti kāraṇam

original: na cā'nyat tad vyatirekeṇa sthitikāraṇam astītyata etad evoktaṃ /
analyzed: na ca anyat tat vyatirekeṇa sthiti kāraṇam asti iti atas etat eva uktam
viśuddha tathatā vā bodhiḥ

original: na tathātāyāḥ svabhāvavuśuddhātvād utpattir asti kintarhyāgantukamlā'pagamād anyantam ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sthitirevocyate notpattiḥ /
analyzed: na tathātāyāḥ utpattiḥ asti kintarhi āgantuka mlā apagamāt anyantam ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sthitiḥ evā ucyate na utpattiḥ

original: sthitikāraṇāni punar bodheḥ kuśalotpādo manasikāraḥ paripūrṇasambhāraś ca /
analyzed: sthiti kāraṇāni punar bodheḥ kuśala utpādaḥ manasikāraḥ paripūrṇa sambhāraḥ ca

original: atra ca śubhānutpattyādayaḥ kuśalotpatyādivibandhe vartamānā bodheḥ sthitiṃ kurvantīti sthityāvaraṇam uktāḥ /
analyzed: atra ca śubha anutpatti ādayaḥ kuśala utpati ādi vibandhe vartamānāḥ bodheḥ sthitim kurvanti iti sthiti āvaraṇam uktāḥ

original: tadyathā catvāra āhārāḥ sattvānām ityatraiva nidarśanaṃ /
analyzed: tat yathā catvāraḥ āhārāḥ sattvānām iti atra eva nidarśanam

original: na hi kavaḍākārādibhir āhārair apūrvāḥ sattvā utpadyante purvotpannās tu vyavasthāpyanta eva /
analyzed: na hi kavaḍa ākāra ādibhiḥ āhāraiḥ apūrvāḥ sattvāḥ utpadyante purva utpannāḥ tu vyavasthāpyante eva
dhṛti kāraṇam iti
dhṛtiḥ bodhi cittam sarva kuśala dharma ādhāra bhūta tvāt

original: atraiva nidarśanaṃ yadyasyādhārabhūtan tatra tasya dhṛtiḥ dhāryate'neneti kṛtvā /
analyzed: atra eva nidarśanam tatra tasya dhṛtiḥ dhāryate anena iti kṛtvā
tat yathā bhājana lokaḥ sattva lokasya iti

original: tat kāraṇaṃ gotraṃ kalyāṇamitrasampannatā cittā'parikhedatā ca /
analyzed: tat kāraṇam gotram kalyāṇa mitra sampanna tā citta a parikheda tā ca
tatra dhṛti kāraṇa viruddha tvāt gotra vaidhurya ādi kandhṛteḥ api āvaraṇam uktam

original: etad evāha  dhṛtyāvaraṇaṃ samādāna āvaraṇaṃ bodhicittasyādhārabhūtatvād iti /
analyzed: etat eva āha dhṛti āvaraṇam samādāne āvaraṇam bodhi cittasya ādhāra bhūta tvāt iti
abhivyakti kāraṇam dhīmattve bodhisattvasya prakāśanīya tvāt
tat ca pratipatti sampad su jana vāsaḥ duṣṭa jana a vāsaḥ ca
atra dhīmattve pratipatti vaidhuryāt ayaḥ abhivyakti āvaraṇa tvena ucyante

original: ata evāha  abhivyaktyāvaraṇaṃ dhīmattve tasya prakāśanīyatvād iti /
analyzed: atas eva āha abhivyakti āvaraṇam dhīmat tve tasya prakāśanīya tvāt iti
tat yathā ālokaḥ rūpasya iti atra eva nidarśanam
ālokaḥ hi rūpa mātrasya abhivyakti kāraṇam eva na utpatti ādi kāraṇam
vikāraṇam abhrāntau
samāropa a apavāda bhrānti parivṛtti ātmaka tvāt abhrāntiḥ darśana mārgaḥ abhrānteḥ vikāraḥ ucyate
tat yathā bhasma ādayaḥ kāṣṭhā ādīnām

original: tasya trīṇi kāraṇāni  viparyāsadauṣṭhulyopaghātaḥ kleśādyāvaraṇānāṃ trayāṇām abhāvo  vimuktiparipācinyāḥ prajñāyāḥ paripakvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasya trīṇi kāraṇāni viparyāsa dauṣṭhulya upaghātaḥ kleśa ādi āvaraṇānām trayāṇām abhāvaḥ vimukti paripācinyāḥ prajñāyāḥ paripakva bhāvaḥ
tat yathā agni ādayaḥ pākyā ādīnām iti
pākyaḥ hi odana ādikaḥ taṇḍula ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ tat santāna antarbhūtaḥ
tat kāraṇam ca agni ādi
viśleṣa kāraṇam anāvaraṇe

original: darśanamārgapraheyādāvaraṇāc cheṣam āvaraṇam anena prahīyata ityanāvaraṇaṃ bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
analyzed: darśana mārga praheyāt āvaraṇāt śeṣam āvaraṇam anena prahīyate iti anāvaraṇam bhāvanā mārgaḥ

original: tasya trīṇi kāraṇāni  sahajadauṣṭhulyopaghāto vīryam apramādaś ca /
analyzed: tasya trīṇi kāraṇāni sahaja dauṣṭhulya upaghātaḥ vīryam apramādaḥ ca
teṣām ca viśleṣa kāraṇa pratipakṣa tvāt
atas eva āha viśleṣa āvaraṇam anāvaraṇe
etat api viśleṣa kāraṇa pratipakṣa bhāvena eva āvaraṇam
atra eva kāraṇam āha tasya āvaraṇa viṣam yoga tvāt iti
visaṃyujyate anena iti viśleṣaḥ
pariṇati kāraṇam natau
tasya mahā bodhau kuśala mūla prayojaka lakṣaṇa tvāt
tat punar bhava bhoga vaimukhyam līna citta tā abhāvaḥ ca
tatas ca pariṇati āvaraṇam pariṇati kāraṇa vibandhena draṣṭavyam

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? nater mahābodhau cittapariṇatilakṣaṇatvād iti /

original: kaḥ sa dauṣṭhulyadoṣaḥ ? vyāsataḥ satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī sahaje sasamprayoge tadālambanā viṣayālambanāś ca rāgādayaḥ kleśopakleśāḥ sasamprayogāḥ /

original: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmau śīlapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati viśiṣṭārthaprārthanayā sutarām ātmamātrīkaraṇāt /
analyzed: tasmāt tasyām bhūmau śīla pāramitā atiriktatarā bhavati viśiṣṭa artha prārthanayā sutarām ātma mātrīkaraṇāt
tṛtīyayā tat nisyanda agra artham
pratividhyati iti prakṛtam
dharmadhātu prativedha prabhāvita tvāt buddha vacanasya

original: yasmāt sarvākārapariśuddhadharmakāyasaṃjñakena dharmadhātuvaśena prabhāvito dharmadhātuniṣyandaḥ sūtrādiko deśanādharmaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt sarva ākāra pariśuddha dharmakāya saṃjñakena dharmadhātu vaśena prabhāvitaḥ dharmadhātu nisyandaḥ sūtra ādikaḥ deśanā dharmaḥ
dharmadhātu agra tayā tad nisyanda deśanā dharma agra tayā dharmadhātu pariśuddhi nimitta tvāt ca
tena dharmadhātu nisyandasya śrutasya agra tām viditvā iti vistaraḥ
tena iti pratividhha dharmadhātunā

original: śrutasyeti śrutasūtrādidharmasya tasyā'gratā viditveti nirvikalpena jñānena tathā pratyātmaṃ jñātvetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: śrutasya iti śrutasūtra ādi dharmasya tasya agra tā viditvā iti nirvikalpena jñānena tathā pratyātmam jñātvā iti arthaḥ
tat artham iti buddha vacana śravaṇa artham

original: trisāhasramahāsāhasrapramāṇāyām apy agnikaṇḍāyām ātmānaṃ prakṣiped iti /
analyzed: tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra pramāṇāyām api agnikaṇḍāyām ātmānam prakṣipet iti

original: uktaṃ hi sūtre  sa ced idaṃ kaścidevaṃ brūyāt  evam ahaṃ tubhyam idaṃ dharmapadaṃ samyak sambuddhopanītaṃ bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanaṃ saṃśrāvayeyaṃ sa cet tvaṃ mahatyām agnikhaḍāyāṃ samprajvalitāyām ekajvālībhūtāyām ātmānaṃ prapātayeḥ mahāntaṃ ca duḥkhavedanopakramaṃ svaśarīreṇopādadyāḥ /
analyzed: uktam hi sūtre sa ced idam kaścid evam brūyāt evam aham tubhyam idam dharma padam samyak sambuddha upanītam bodhisattva caryā pariśodhanam saṃśrāvayeyam sa ced tvam mahatyām agni khaḍāyām samprajvalitāyām ekajvālībhūtāyām ātmānam prapātayeḥ mahāntam ca duḥkha vedanā upakramam sva śarīreṇa upādadyāḥ

original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati  utsahe'ham ekasyāpi dharmapadasya samyaksambuddhopanītasya bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanasyārthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāv agniparipūrṇe brahmalokād ātmānam utsraṣṭuṃ /
analyzed: tasya evam bhavati utsahe aham ekasya api dharma padasya samyaksambuddha upanītasya bodhisattva caryā pariśodhanasya arthāya tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātau agni paripūrṇe brahma lokāt ātmānam utsraṣṭum
kim punar prākṛtāyām agni khaḍāyām

original: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvair nirayāpāyaduḥkhasaṃvāsair apy asmābhis sarvabuddhadharmāḥ paryeṣitavyāḥ kiṃ punar manuṣyaduḥkhasaṃvāsair iti /
analyzed: api tu khalu punar sarvaiḥ niraya apāya duḥkha saṃvāsaiḥ api asmābhiḥ sarva buddha dharmāḥ paryeṣitavyāḥ kim punar manuṣya duḥkha saṃvāsaiḥ iti

original: ata evāsyāmbhūmau kṣāntipāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati śrutārthaṃ sarvakleśasahanādibhir apy abhedyatvāt /

caturthyā niṣparigraha artham dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati iti prakṛtam

original: caturthyam bhūmau samatvād anātmīyatvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati yasmān na dharmadhātoḥ kasyacit samatāstīti /
analyzed: caturthyam bhūmau sama tvāt anātmīya tvam dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati yasmāt na dharmadhātoḥ kasyacid sama tā asti iti
athavā sarva viparyāsa aviṣaya tvāt na kasyacid parigrahaḥ
svayam aviṣaya tvāt na a atra kaścid parigrahaḥ
yasmāt dharma tṛṣṇā api vyāvartate iti āgama vacanam

original: evam arciṣmatyāṃ niṣprapañcena jñānena dharmadhātvadhigamād bodhipakṣadharmaprātpiḥ /
analyzed: evam arciṣmatyām niṣprapañcena jñānena dharmadhātu adhigamāt bodhi pakṣa dharma prātpiḥ

original: bodhisattvasya yā'pi sūtrādidharmatṛṣṇā pūrvam āsīt sā'pi vyāvartate /
analyzed: bodhisattvasya yā api sūtra ādi dharma tṛṣṇā pūrvam āsīt sā api vyāvartate
dhyāna samādhi samāpattiḥ dharma tṛṣṇā iti anye

abhīkṣṇam vāc manaḥ jalpa samatikrānte bodhi pakṣaiḥ viharaṇāt
pañcamyā santāna abheda artham
dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati iti adhikṛtam

original: atītā'nāgatavartamānānāṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ paramparato bodhisattvānāñca santānair ātmanaḥ  santānā'bhedaṃ paśyati /

daśabhiḥ citta āśaya viśu uddhi sama tābhiḥ iti āgamam darśayati

original: atītabuddhadharmaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca anāgatabuddhadharmaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca pratyutpannabuddhadharmaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca śīlaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca cittaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca dṛṣṭikānkṣāvimativilekhā'panayanaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca mārgā'mārgajñānaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca pratipatprahāṇajñānaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca sarvabodhipākṣika dharmottarottaravibhāvanaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca sarvasattvaparipācanaviśuddhyāśayasamatayā ca /
analyzed: atīta buddha dharma viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca anāgata buddha dharma viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca pratyutpanna buddha dharma viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca śīla viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca citta viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca dṛṣṭi kānkṣā vimati vilekhā apanayana viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca mārga amārga jñāna viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca pratipad prahāṇa jñāna viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca sarva bodhi pākṣika dharma uttarottara vibhāvana viśuddhi āśaya samatay
ābhiḥ samatābhiḥ sarva buddhānām santāna abhedam pratividhyati ālayavijñāna parāvṛtti lakṣaṇa dharmakāyasya a bhinna tvāt

original: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmau dhyānapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati paramārthataḥ satyākārabhāvanābahulatvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt tasyām bhūmau dhyāna pāramitā atiriktatarā bhavati paramārthataḥ satya ākāra bhāvanā bahula tvāt
ṣaṣṭhyā
dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati iti sambadhyate

original: pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaḥ sankleśaḥ tasminnāgantukāt prakṛtyā na sankliśyate /
analyzed: pratītyasamutpāda lakṣaṇaḥ san kleśaḥ tasmin āgantukāt prakṛtyā na san kliśyate
prākṛtika viśuddheḥ na viśuddhi ati

original: evaṃ svasaṃvedyākāreṇa nirvikalpena jñānena dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyatītyatraivāgamaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: evam sva saṃvedya ākāreṇa nirvikalpena jñānena dharmadhātum pratividhyati iti atra eva āgamam darśayati

original: pratītyasamutpāde nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yaḥ sankliśyate vā viśuddhyate veti prativedhāt /
analyzed: pratītyasamutpāde na asti sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ san kliśyate vā viśuddhyate vā iti prativedhāt
ṣaṣṭhyām bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādam vidhyati

original: tatra na kasyacid dharmasya sankleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ vā pratividhyati dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratvāt pratītyasamutpādāngañca sankleśamātratvāt na ca tad vyatirikto'nya ātmā'styātmīyo vā yasmin sankleśaḥ sankalpyate viśuddhir vā /
analyzed: tatra na kasyacid dharmasya san kleśam vyavadānam vā pratividhyati dharmadhātoḥ prakṛti prabhāsvara tvāt pratītyasamutpādān gan ca san kleśa mātra tvāt na ca tat vyatiriktaḥ anyaḥ ātmā asti ātmīyaḥ vā yasmin san kleśaḥ san kalpyate viśuddhiḥ vā

original: tasmād vā'syāṃ bhūmau prajñāpāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati nissankleśa viśuddhyarthena pratītyasamutpādagāmbhīryā'vabodhād iti /
analyzed: tasmāt vā asyām bhūmau prajñāpāramitā atiriktatarā bhavati nissat kleśa viśuddhi arthena pratītyasamutpāda gāmbhīrya a avabodhāt iti
saptamyā a nānā artha tvam
dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati iti adhikṛtam

original: tasyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvo'bhibhavati sarvanimittasamudācārābhāvāt nimittasamudācāradvārakaṃśca nānātvasamudācāra iti /
analyzed: tasyām bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ abhibhavati sarva nimitta samudācāra abhāvāt nimitta samudācāra dvārakan ca nānātva samudācāraḥ iti

original: ato nimittasamudācārā'bhāvāt saptamyā'nānātvārthaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyatīty ucyate /

original: imam evārthaṃ pradarśayann āha  nirnimittatayā sūtrādidharmanimittanānātvā'samudācārād iti /
analyzed: imam eva artham pradarśayan āha nirnimitta tayā sūtra ādi dharma nimitta nānātva a samudācārāt iti

original: yaiḥ sūtrādidharmanimittair dharmadhātuṃ praviśati  tāni balān nānātvena tat praveśatat pṛṣṭalabdhayor abhimukhībhavanti yāvat ṣaṣṭhī bhūmiḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ sūtra ādi dharma nimittaiḥ dharmadhātum praviśati tāni balāt nānātvena tat praveśa tat pṛṣṭa labdhayoḥ abhimukhībhavanti yāvat ṣaṣṭhī bhūmiḥ

original: saptamyāntu bhūmau sarvanimittaikarasākāreṇa jñanena dharmadhātor nimitttābhāvatvaṃ pratividhyatīti tāni tāni nimittāni na samudācaranti /
analyzed: saptamyām tu bhūmau sarva nimitta eka rasa ākāreṇa jñanena dharmadhātoḥ nimitta abhāva tvam pratividhyati iti tāni tāni nimittāni na samudācaranti

original: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmāv upāyaparamitā'tiriktatarā bhavati yataḥ sarvanimittāny animittatvena pratividhyati nimittakṛtaṃ ca vyavahāraṃ na virodhayati /

original: tat prativedhāc ca tasyām eva vaśitvaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: tad prativedhāt ca tasyām eva vaśi tvam pratilabhate
aṣṭamyā ahi in adhika artham
dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati iti sambadhyate

original: ata evā'sau nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā tathatetyucyate /
analyzed: atas eva asau nityam tathā eva iti kṛtvā tathatā iti ucyate
nimitta a abhāve kvacid api hīna tā na asti

original: tathā hi nimittam evā'nimittam iti kiñcid anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhād ityatraiva kāraṇaṃ /

original: aṣṭamyāṃ hi bhūmau bodhisattvo'nutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambhād dharmadhātor abhyuccayā'bhāvatvam apacayā'bhāvatvaṃ caivaṃ pratividhyati /

san kleśe vyavadāne vā kasyacid dharmasya hāni vṛddhi adarśanāt iti apūrva dharma anutpādāt

original: caturthā vaśitā  nirvikalpavaśitā kṣetrapariśuddhivaśitā jñānavaśitā karmavaśitā ca /
analyzed: caturthā vaśitā nirvikalpa vaśitā kṣetra pariśuddhi vaśitā jñāna vaśitā karma vaśitā ca
tatra nirvikalpa vaśitā āśraya tvam dharmadhātoḥ veditavyam anābhogena sarva nimitta samudācāra abhāvāt
saptamyām api nimitta samudācāra abhāvaḥ sambhavati abhisaṃskāreṇa
iha tu an abhisaṃskāreṇa iti viśeṣaḥ
kṣetra pariśuddhi vaśitā āśraya tvam ca aṣṭamyā a pratividhyati iti prakṛtam
kṣetra pariśuddhi vaśitā āśraya tvam dharmadhātoḥ yathā iṣṭam buddhakṣetra parṣad maṇḍala sandarśana śakti pratilambhāt

original: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmau praṇidhānapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati nirvikalpakṣetravaśitālābhena kuśalanirantaraprayogāt /
analyzed: tasmāt tasyām bhūmau praṇidhāna pāramitā atiriktatarā bhavati nirvikalpa kṣetra vaśitā lābhena kuśala nirantara prayogāt

dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati iti

original: kathame tad vijñayate navamyā jñanavaṣitāśrayatvaṃ pratividhyatīti ? ata āha  pratisaṃvil lābhāt /
analyzed: katham e tat vijñayate navamyā pratividhyati iti atas āha
asyām hi bhūmau dharma artha nirukti pratibhāna pratisaṃvidaḥ anyaiḥ a paryāntāḥ pratilabhate

original: ato'tra jñānavaśitāśrayatvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividdham iti vijñāyate /

original: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmau balapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati prajñābalaviśeṣayogāt /
analyzed: tasmāt tasyām bhūmau bala pāramitā atiriktatarā bhavati prajñā bala viśeṣa yogāt

original: kartam etad gamyate ? ata āha  yathecchaṃ nirmāṇaiḥ sattvārthakaraṇād iti /
analyzed: kartam etat gamyate atas āha yatheccham nirmāṇaiḥ sattva artha karaṇāt iti

original: niścayenā'nena daśamyām bhūmau dharmadhātoḥ karmavaśitāśrayatvaṃ pratividhyati tena tathāgatakarma svādhipatyaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: niścayena a anena daśamyām bhūmau dharmadhātoḥ karma vaśitā āśraya tvam pratividhyati tena tathāgata karma svādhipatyam pratilabhate

original: tathā hi sugatatvād daśadiganantalokadhātusthitānāṃ sattvānāṃ nirmāṇakāyair yatheṣṭaṃ yasya yathā yasmin kāle yat kartavyaṃ tasya tathā tasmin kāle tat karoti /

tasmāt asyām bhūmau jñāna pāramitā atiriktatarā bhavati
dharma paribhoga sattva paripāka viśeṣa yogāt iti

original: evam āsāṃ yathoktānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnāṃ daśavidhadharmadhātuprativedhasarvākārapariṣodhanavibhandhabūtaṃ yad akliṣṭam ajñānam ekaikāyām api bhūmyām āvaraṇaṃ tat pratipakṣā bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bhūmayo vyavasthitāḥ navamyā daśamyāśca bhūmeḥ phalena viśeṣaḥ paridīpito nāvaraṇabheda prativedhaviśeṣeṇa tad vihārasya kāmapyanirūpyā'vasthāṃ gatatvāt /
analyzed: evam āsām yathā uktānām bodhisattva bhūmīnām daśavidha dharmadhātu prativedha sarva ākāra pariṣodhana vibhandha būtam yat akliṣṭam ajñānam ekaikāyām api bhūmyām āvaraṇam tat pratipakṣāḥ bodhisattvānām daśa bhūmayaḥ vyavasthitāḥ navamyāḥ daśamyāḥ ca bhūmeḥ phalena viśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ na āvaraṇa bheda prativedha viśeṣeṇa tat vihārasya kām api anirūpyā avasthām gata tvāt

original: sarvatragādyarthaprativedhaprayojanaṃ daśabhūmiṣu daśānām pāramitānāṃ viśeṣagatir yathākramaṃ /
analyzed: sarvatraga ādi artha prativedha prayojanam daśa bhūmiṣu daśānām pāramitānām viśeṣa gatiḥ yathākramam

original: tasmād etad evoktaṃ  bhūmyāvaraṇaṃ pāramitāviśeṣagatyāvaraṇam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt etat eva uktam bhūmi āvaraṇam pāramitā viśeṣa gati āvaraṇam iti

original: athavā sūtroktam eva samādhisamāpattyādikam uttarottarabhūmiviśiṣṭam sarvākāraṃ nānā'vasānaṃ phalaṃ sarvatragādyarthaprativedhaprayojanam iti ////
analyzed: athavā sūtra uktam eva samādhi samāpatti ādikam uttara uttara bhūmi viśiṣṭam sarva ākāram nānā avasānam phalam sarvatrag ādi artha prativedha prayojanam iti

original: { āvaraṇasamāsaḥ } prāg uktāni bahuvidhāni sarvāvaraṇāni dvayāvaraṇāntar gatānīti pradarśanārtham āha  samāsena punaḥ  kleśāvaraṇam ākhyātaṃ jñeyāvaraṇam eva ca /
analyzed: āvaraṇa samāsaḥ prāk uktāni bahuvidhāni sarva āvaraṇāni dvaya āvaraṇa antar gatāni iti pradarśana artham āha samāsena punar kleśa āvaraṇam ākhyātam jñeya āvaraṇam eva ca

original: katham etad gamyate ? samāsato dvayam eva na punas tṛtīyam apy astīti /
analyzed: katham etat gamyate samāsatas dvayam eva na punar tṛtīyam api asti iti
atas āha sarvām āvaraṇāni iha iti
atra antargatāni iti vākya śeṣaḥ

original: sarvāvaraṇāni dvayāvaraṇāntargatāni nānyat tṛtīyam astīti gamyate /
analyzed: sarva āvaraṇāni dvaya āvaraṇa antargatāni na anyat tṛtīyam asti iti gamyate

original: yataś ca sarvāvaraṇānyatraivāntargatānyatasyaiva sarvāvaraṇasangrāhakasya kleśajñeyāvaraṇadvayasya kṣayāt sarvāvaraṇebhyo mukhtiriṣyate sarvāvaraṇānā prahāṇa mityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas ca sarva āvaraṇāni atra eva antargatāni atasya eva sarva āvaraṇa sangrāhakasya kleśa jñeya āvaraṇa dvayasya kṣayāt sarva āvaraṇebhyaḥ mukhtiḥ iṣyate sarva āvaraṇānām prahāṇam miti arthaḥ

original: buddhabūmyā varaṇe'nākhyāte katham atraivāntar bhāvaḥ ? na hy abhidhānād antarbhāvaḥ kin tarhi svabhāvāt /
analyzed: buddha būmyāḥ varaṇe an ākhyāte katham atra eva antar bhāvaḥ na hi abhidhānāt antarbhāvaḥ kin tarhi svabhāvāt

original: api ca vyāpyāvaraṇavacanāt tad apy uktam eva /

tasya pratyaya utpādya tvāt vināśe ca a hetuka tvāt
sa mala amala tā artha lakṣaṇena āgantukena a nitya arthena a nityaḥ avikāra dharmaḥ api pariniṣpanna svabhāvaḥ iti
iti vistaraḥ

original: duḥkham api trividhaṃ  upādānaduḥkhaṃ lakṣaṇaduḥkhaṃ sambandhaduḥkhañca /
analyzed: duḥkham api trividham upādāna duḥkham lakṣaṇa duḥkham sambandha duḥkham
tatra kalpita svabhāvaḥ upādānataḥ duḥkham

original: aparijñātenehā'mutra vā duḥkham upādīyata iti duḥkhaṃ /
analyzed: a parijñātena iha a amutra vā duḥkham upādīyate iti duḥkham

original: yathā ca tenā'parijñātena duḥkham upādīyate tat pradarśayann āha   śaśaviṣāṇādisvarūpavad bhrāntyā na kenacit prakāreṇa yenāpi sattvaṃ grāhyaṃ nāsti ityabhāva evā'sya śūnyateti /
analyzed: yathā ca tena a parijñātena duḥkham upādīyate tat pradarśayan āha śaśaviṣāṇa ādi svarūpa vat bhrāntyā na kenacid prakāreṇa yena api sattvam grāhyam na asti iti abhāvaḥ eva asya śūnyatā iti
a tad bhāva śūnyatā paratantrasya

original: etad eva pratipādayann āha  paratantralakṣaṇaṃ tathā nāsti yathā bālair dvayātmanā parikalpyate /
analyzed: etat eva pratipādayan āha paratantra lakṣaṇam tathā na asti yathā bālaiḥ dvaya ātmanā parikalpyate

original: na tu sarvathā nāsti yathā cā'sti tathā śuddhalaukikajñānenādhigamyate /
analyzed: na tu sarvathā nā asti yathā ca asti tathā śuddha laukika jñānena adhigamyate
tasya a tad bhāvaḥ śūnyatā iti
prakṛti śūnyatā pariniṣpannasya

original: ata evāha  pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ dvayābhāvasvabhāvatvāc chūnyatāsvabhāvam eveti /
analyzed: atas eva āha pariniṣpanna lakṣaṇam dvaya abhāva svabhāva tvāt śūnyatā svabhāvam eva iti

original: tasmāt prakṛtir eva svabhāva evā'sya śūnyatā /
analyzed: tasmāt prakṛtiḥ eva svabhāvaḥ eva asya śūnyatā
alakṣaṇam ca nairātmyam iti vistaraḥ
trividham nairātmyam alkṣaṇa nairātmyam vilakṣaṇa nairātmyam sva lakṣaṇa nairātmyam ca

original: tatra parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇā'bhāvād alakṣaṇam eva nairātmyaṃ /
analyzed: tatra parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇa abhāvāt alakṣaṇam eva nairātmyam

original: ata evāha  parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva nāstītyalakṣaṇam evāsya nairātmyaṃ nānyena prakāreṇeti darśayati /
analyzed: atas eva āha parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva na asti iti alakṣaṇam eva asya nairātmyam na anyena prakāreṇa iti darśayati

original: paratantrasya vilakṣaṇanairātmyaṃ yasmāt paratantrasyāsti lakṣaṇaṃ vasturūpaṃ /
analyzed: paratantrasya vilakṣaṇa nairātmyam yasmāt paratantrasya asti lakṣaṇam vastu rūpam

original: na tu tad yathā bālaiḥ parikalpyate dvayatvena /
analyzed: na tu tat yathā bālaiḥ parikalpyate dvaya tvena
tat vilakṣaṇam iti parikalpita lakṣaṇena a sadṛśam
paratantra lakṣaṇam tat nairāmyam

original: evaṃ parikalpitenātmanā nairātmyam asya darśītaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam parikalpitena ātmanā nairātmyam asya darśītam bhavati
sva lakṣaṇam nairātmyam pariniṣpannasya

original: yataḥ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakābhāvarūpatvān nairātmyam eveti svalakṣaṇam asya nairātmyam iti pariniṣpannasya dharmasya nairātmyasvabhāvatāṃ darśayati /
analyzed: yatas pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ grāhya grāhaka abhāva rūpa tvāt nairātmyam eva iti sva lakṣaṇam asya nairātmyam iti pariniṣpannasya dharmasya nairātmya svabhāva tām darśayati

original: kaḥ punar anayoḥ śūnyatā'nātmatayor viśeṣaḥ ? yadyatra nāsti tat tena śūnyaṃ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar anayoḥ śūnyatā anātmatayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat yatra na asti tat tena śūnyam

original: yat tu yasyātmā svabhāvo na bhavati tat tenā'nātmetyayam anayor viśeṣa ity eke /
analyzed: yat tu yasya ātmā svabhāvaḥ na bhavati tat tena anātmā iti ayam anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti eke

original: arthataḥ ko'pi viśeṣo nāsti vyavasthānabhedena tu bhedaḥ /
analyzed: arthataḥ kaḥ api viśeṣaḥ nā asti vyavasthāna bhedena tu bhedaḥ

original: yasmādyadyatra nāsti tena tasya niḥsvabhāvatām upādāya nairātmyam itarasya tu tatrā'niṣpannasvabhāvatām upādāya śūnyatvam iti /
analyzed: yasmāt yat yatra na asti tena tasya niḥsvabhāva tām upādāya nairātmyam itarasya tu tatra a niṣpanna svabhāva tām upādāya śūnyatvam iti

original: trividhe mūlatattve samāropāpavādāntayoḥ pratipakṣeṇāgantukamalapradarśanena ca yathākramaṃ trividhā'nityatā paridīpitā /
analyzed: trividhe mūla tattve samāropa apavāda antayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa āgantu kamala pradarśanena ca yathākramam trividhā anitya tā paridīpitā
sā asat artha anitya tā utpāda bhanga anitya tā sa mala nirmala anitya tā ca

original: evaṃ yāvat trividhaṃ nairātmyam ityuktam aviparyāsatattvaṃ ////
analyzed: evam yāvat trividham nairātmyam iti uktam aviparyāsa tattvam

original: { phalahetutattvaṃ } tad anantaraṃ phalahetutattvaṃ vaktavyam ityata āha  phalahetumayantattvaṃ mūlatattvaṃ iti vistaraḥ /

analyzed: tatra san kleśa pakṣam adhikṛtya duḥkha satyam phala tattvam

original: samudayasatyaṃ hetutattvaṃ vyavadānapakṣe'pi nirodhasatyaṃ phalatattvaṃ mārgasatyaṃ hetutattvaṃ /
analyzed: samudaya satyam hetu tattvam vyavadāna pakṣe api nirodha satyam phala tattvam mārga satyam hetu tattvam
evam duḥkha ādīni catvāri satyāni phala hetu tattvam
mūlatattve duḥkha samudaya nirodha mārga satyam iti uktam

original: tac ca na vijñāyate kathaṃ mūlatattvaṃ duḥkhādisatyasvabhāvam ityataḥ pṛcchati  kathaṃ trividhaṃ mūlatattvaṃ duḥkhādisatyam iti ? ata āha  yatas tad anityādilakṣaṇaṃ  duḥkhasatyaṃ tato mataṃ /
analyzed: tat ca na vijñāyate katham mūlatattvam duḥkha ādi satya svabhāvam iti atas pṛcchati katham trividham mūlatattvam duḥkha ādi satyam iti atas āha yatas tat anitya ādi lakṣaṇam duḥkha satyam tatas matam
iti

original: anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmatāyā duḥkhasatyalakṣaṇatvāt tac ca samastaṃ pratyekaṃ kalpitādiṣv astīti vistareṇoktaṃ /

analyzed: atas kalpita ādayaḥ pratyekam duḥkha satya tvena abhipretāḥ iti
trividhena samudaya arthena mūla tattvam samudaya satyam yathākramam

original: sa eva samudayo na jñāyata ityata āha  trividhaḥ samudayārthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva samudayaḥ na jñāyate iti atas āha trividhaḥ samudaya arthaḥ
vāsanā atha samutthānam avisaṃyogaḥ eva ca
iti

original: trividhaḥ samudayo vāsanāsamudayaḥ samutthānasamudayaḥ avisaṃyogasamudayaś ca /
analyzed: trividhaḥ samudayaḥ vāsanā samudayaḥ samutthāna samudayaḥ avisaṃyoga samudayaḥ ca
tatra vāsanā samudayaḥ parikalpita svabhāvaḥ veditavyaḥ
atas āha parikalpita svabhāva abhiniveśa vāsanā iti

original: asti hi parikalpite svabhāve'stītyabhiniveśam upādāya laukikā dharmā vikalpakleśavāsanāṃ vyavasthāpayanti na tu vigatābhiniveśā lokottarā /
analyzed: asti hi parikalpite svabhāve asti iti abhiniveśam upādāya laukikāḥ dharmāḥ vikalpa kleśa vāsanām vyavasthāpayanti na tu vigata abhiniveśā lokottarā
tatas parikalpita svabhāvaḥ vāsanā samudayaḥ ucyate
samutthāna samudayaḥ paratantraḥ
samutthāne ātmalābhaḥ

original: sa yato bhavati sa samutthānasamudayaḥ  samudetyasmād iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: sa yatas bhavati sa samutthāna samudayaḥ samudeti asmāt iti kṛtvā

original: sa punaḥ kiṃsvarūpa ityata āha  karmakleśā iti /
analyzed: sa punar kiṃsvarūpaḥ iti atas āha karma kleśāḥ iti
te ca vastu svarūpa tvāt paratantra svabhāvaḥ
a visaṃyoga samudaya stha tāyāḥ iti
katham iti atas āha āvaraṇa a visaṃyoge iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati  yāvadāvaraṇair na visaṃyuktā tathatā tāvat samudeti duḥkham iti /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yāvat āvaraṇaiḥ na visaṃyuktā tathatā tāvat samudeti duḥkham iti

original: āvaraṇair avisaṃyuktā vā tathatā samudayadharmateti samudayanāmmlābha iti ////
analyzed: āvaraṇaiḥ avisaṃyuktā vā tathatā samudaya dharma tā iti samudaya nāma lābhaḥ iti
trividhena nirodhena mūla tattvam nirodha satyam

original: tac ca na vijñāyata ityata āha  trividho nirodhaḥ  svabhāvadvayanotpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ mataṃ /
analyzed: tat ca na vijñāyate iti atas āha trividhaḥ nirodhaḥ svabhāva dvayana utpattiḥ mala śānti dvayam matam
iti

original: tatra svabhāvā'nutpattiḥ parikalpitasya yasya hi niḥsvabhāvatvād ātyantikyanutpattir vandhyāputravat /
analyzed: tatra svabhāva a anutpattiḥ parikalpitasya yasya hi niḥsvabhāva tvāt ātyantikī anutpattiḥ vandhyā putra vat
grāhya grāhakayoḥ anutpattiḥ paratantrasya
tasya api grāhya grāhaka svarūpābhyām atyanta rahita tvāt dvaya bhrānti ātmanā anutpattiḥ
ca śabdaḥ samuccaya arthaḥ

original: tat punar na vijñāyata ityata āha  pratisaṃkhyānirodhatathatākhyam iti /
analyzed: tat punar na vijñāyate iti atas āha pratisaṃkhyā nirodha tathatā ākhyam iti
malam dvividham rāga ādi āvaraṇam parikalpitaḥ ca

original: tatrā'nāsveṇa jñānenāśrayād bīja uddhṛte rāgādimalānām atyantam anutpādātmikā śāntiḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra anāsveṇa jñānena āśrayāt bīje uddhṛte rāga ādi malānām atyantam anutpāda ātmikā śāntiḥ pratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ
tathatā gocareṇa a dvaya jñānena parikalpita malasya a nutpāda ātmikā śāntiḥ tathatā
etat hi dvayam pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: eṣa trividho nirodhaḥ kalpitādau mūlatattve yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñeyaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa trividhaḥ nirodhaḥ kalpita ādau mūlatattve yathāsaṃkhyam vijñeyaḥ

original: anye tu tathatāprativedhena kleśaparikalpitamaladvayaśāntir iti malaśāntistathatety ucyate dvayanirodhaḥ prakṛtinirodhaśceti vacanāt /
analyzed: anye tu tathatā prativedhena kleśa parikalpita mala dvaya śāntiḥ iti mala śāntiḥ tathatā iti ucyate dvaya nirodhaḥ prakṛti nirodhaḥ ca iti vacanāt
prakṛtiḥ iti tathatā prakṛti prabhāsvara tvāt cittasya iti

original: atas tathatālambanādyo nirodhaḥ sa prakṛtinirodha ity ucyate /
analyzed: atas tathatā ālambana ādyaḥ nirodhaḥ sa prakṛti nirodhaḥ iti ucyate
niruddha mātram pratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ
nirodhyate asyām iti nirodhaḥ tathatā iti apare

original: nirodhasya punar anutpādātmakatvāt sarve svabhāvānutpattyādikaṃ saṃkṣipya nirodhasatyam ity ucyate /
analyzed: nirodhasya punar anutpāda ātmaka tvāt sarve svabhāva anutpatti ādikam saṃkṣipya nirodha satyam iti ucyate
uktaḥ nirodha satyasya mūla tattve antarbhāvaḥ

original: tad anantaraṃ tu mārgasatyam antarbhāvayitavyam ityataḥ pṛcchati  mārgasatyaṃ trividhamūlatattve kathaṃ vyavasthāpyata ityata  parijñāyāṃ prahāṇe ca ityādi /
analyzed: tat anantaram tu mārga satyam antarbhāvayitavyam iti atas pṛcchati mārga satyam trividha mūla tattve katham vyavasthāpyate iti atas parijñāyām prahāṇe ca ityādi
parikalpitasya parijñāne iti

original: parikalpitato'tyantam asanneveti tasya parijñānam eva na prahāṇaṃ /
analyzed: parikalpitataḥ atyantam asan eva iti tasya parijñānam eva na prahāṇam
na hi asataḥ prahāṇam yujyate
paratantrasya parijñāne prahāṇe ca

original: paratantro hi yathā khyāti tathā'sattvaṃ vijñeyaṃ na tu sarvātmatvenāsattvaṃ kalpitavat /
analyzed: paratantraḥ hi yathā khyāti tathā asattvam vijñeyam na tu sarva ātmatvena asattvam kalpita vat
karma kleśayoḥ bhāva ātma tvāt prahātavyaḥ ca
pariniṣpannasya praijñāne prāpti sākṣātkaraṇe ca iti

original: pariniṣpanno hi bhāvābhāvavinirmuktalakṣaṇam ataḥ parijñeyaḥ āśrayaparāvṛttitāyāś ca /
analyzed: pariniṣpannaḥ hi bhāva abhāva vinirmukta lakṣaṇam atas parijñeyaḥ āśraya parāvṛtti tāyāḥ ca
āśaya parāvṛtti tā vinirmukta dharmakāya tvena sākṣātkartavyā iti śūnyatā parijñeyā
nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ prāpti sākṣātkriyayā
ubhayam ca ubhathā iti anye

original: dvividhā hi parijñā  jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca /
analyzed: dvividhā hi parijñā jñāna parijñā prahāṇa parijñā ca
tatra jñāna parijñāya parijñeyam prathamam tṛtīyam ca
dvitīyam tu ubhaya parijñeyam
sākṣātkriyā api dvidhā jñāna sākṣātkriyā prāpti sākṣātkriyā ca iti
tatra jñāna sākṣātkriyayā trayam api sākṣātkartavyam
prāpti sākṣātkriyayā tu tṛtīyam eva

original: evam atra mūlatattve parijñā prahāṇasākṣātkriyāyāṃ mārgasatya vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ na tu tatrāntarbhāvāt /
analyzed: evam atra mūla tattve parijñā prahāṇa sākṣātkriyāyām mārga satya vyavasthānam veditavyam na tu tatra antarbhāvāt

original: atra ca satyacatuṣṭayena yaḥ sankleśo yataś ca tayoś ca viśuddhir yā yataśca tat paridīpitaṃ /
analyzed: atra ca satya catuṣṭayena yaḥ san kleśaḥ yatas ca tayoḥ ca viśuddhiḥ yā yatas ca tat paridīpitam
anukramaḥ tu eṣām yathā abhisamayam iti
audārika sūkṣma tattvam audārika sūkṣma tattvam ca iti
audārika tattvam saṃvṛti satyam sūkṣma tattvam tu paramārtha satyam

original: yata ādāvaudārikeṇa sattvān paripācayati paripakvāṃs tu sūkṣmeṇa vimocayati ataḥ pūrvam audārikaṃ paścāt sūkṣmaṃ /
analyzed: yatas ādau audārikeṇa sattvān paripācayati paripakvān tu sūkṣmeṇa vimocayati atas pūrvam audārikam paścāt sūkṣmam
tatra asamāhita jñāna viṣaya tvāt saṃvṛti satyam audārika tattvam
samāhita jñāna viṣaya tvāt paramārtha satyam sūkṣma tattvam
athavā vijñāna viṣaya tvāt audārikam
jñāna viṣaya tvāt sūkṣmam

original: sarvatattvānāṃ mūlatattve'ntarbhāvaḥ pratijñāta ityataḥ pṛcchati  tan mūlatattve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ ? ityata āha  prajñaptipratipattitaḥ /
analyzed: sarva tattvānām mūlatattve antarbhāvaḥ pratijñātaḥ iti atas pṛcchati tat mūlatattve katham veditavyam iti atas āha prajñapti pratipattitaḥ
tathā udbhāvanayā audāram iti

original: prajñaptiḥ pratipatīr udbhāvanā caudārikatattvaṃ mūlatattve veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: prajñaptiḥ udbhāvanā ca audārika tattvam mūla tattve veditavyam

original: etad eva pratipādayann āha  trividhā hi saṃvṛtir iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: etat eva pratipādayan āha trividhā hi saṃvṛtiḥ iti vistaraḥ

original: asato'rthasya rūpaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭaśceti vyavasthānaṃ prajñaptisaṃvṛtiḥ /
analyzed: asataḥ arthasya rūpam ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ ca iti vyavasthānam prajñapti saṃvṛtiḥ
rūpa vedanā saṃjñā ādi svabhāva viśeṣeṇa nāma abhilāpaḥ prajñapti saṃvṛtiḥ iti anye

original: abhilāpāpekṣayā yad vyavahriyate rūpaṃ vedaneti vā tat prajñaptisaṃvṛtir iti kecit /
analyzed: abhilāpa apekṣayā yat vyavahriyate rūpam vedanā iti vā tat prajñapti saṃvṛtiḥ iti kecid
tat ca etat asattvāt parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: pratipattisaṃvṛtir vikalpena yena rūpādayo ghaṭādayaś ca  vijñānanirbhāsād abahirbhūtam api bahirbhūtam iva vasturūpeṇa yathā vyavasthānam abhiniviśate sa vikalpaḥ pratipattisaṃvṛtiḥ /
analyzed: pratipatti saṃvṛtiḥ vikalpena yena rūpa ādayaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ ca vijñāna nirbhāsāt abahirbhūtam api bahirbhūtam iva vastu rūpeṇa yathā vyavasthānam abhiniviśate sa vikalpaḥ pratipatti saṃvṛtiḥ
udbhāvanā saṃvṛtiḥ ca iti
caśabdaḥ samuccaya arthaḥ

original: vikalpā'bhilāpātikrāntasyāpi pariniṣpannasya śūnyatā tathatā samalā nirmaletyevam ādibhiḥ paryāyaiḥ sandarśanam udbhāvanāsaṃvṛtiḥ /
analyzed: vikalpa a abhilāpa atikrāntasya api pariniṣpannasya śūnyatā tathatā sa malā nirmalā iti evam ādibhiḥ paryāyaiḥ sandarśanam udbhāvanā saṃvṛtiḥ

original: tayā trividhayā saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ mūlatattve yathākramaṃ veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: tayā trividhayā saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛti satya tvam mūla tattve yathākramam veditavyam
saṃvṛtiḥ vyavahāraḥ
prajñaptiḥ iti abhidhānam
artha abhāve abhidhāna mātreṇa vyavahāraḥ prajñapti saṃvṛtiḥ
atas eva artha abhāvāt prajñapti saṃvṛtyā parikalpitaḥ saṃvṛti satyam
a vidyamāne arthe artha abhiniveśaḥ pratipattiḥ tayā vyavahāraḥ pratipatti saṃvṛtiḥ
sā punar abhiniveśa vikalpaḥ
tasmāt pratipatti saṃvṛtyā saṃvṛtti satyam paratantraḥ

original: yadātmatvādīnām ātmakriyāsvarūpaṃ tat sarvam api pravartate skandhādiṣvevetyataḥ skandhādaya evātmagrāhanibandhanam iti pratīyate /

original: yad uta ekatvagrāha iti pañcopādānaskandheṣu piṇḍātmagrāhataḥ tat pratipakṣeṇa skandhakauśalyaṃ /

original: yasya veṣṭam aniṣṭañceha janmani phalaṃ tasya śubhāśubhasya karmaṇa ātmā hetur iti cetanā hetutvagrāhaḥ /

original: svatantragrāha iti yat svairaṃ vaśitvaṃ sa ātmā yo'dhikāraḥ sa ātmeti yo grāhaḥ /

analyzed: yathā rūpam tridhā bhittvā triṣu svabhāveṣu antarbhāvitam evam vedanā ādayaḥ skandha dhātu ādayaḥ ca yojyāḥ iti vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñāna skandhāḥ dhātu āyatanāni pratītyasamutpāda angāni āyatana anāyatanāni indriyāṇi adhva trayam satya catuṣṭayam yāna trayam saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtam ca iti etat api vedanā ādikam dhātu ādikam ca pratyekam parikalpita vikalpita dharmatā svabhāva bhedataḥ tridhā bhittvā triṣu svabhāveṣu antarbhāvayita

original: tatra pratibhāseṣu vedanādiṣu yo'tyantam asadbhūto grāhyagrāhakabhāvo rūpapratibhāseṣu yathā grāhyabhāvaḥ parikalpyate sā parikalpitā vedanā yāvat parikalpitaṃ vijñānaṃ /
analyzed: tatra pratibhāseṣu vedanā ādiṣu yaḥ atyantam asat bhūtaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ rūpa pratibhāseṣu yathā grāhya bhāvaḥ parikalpyate sā parikalpitā vedanā yāvat parikalpitam vijñānam

original: yasmin grāhyagrāheka vikalpaḥ kriyate sā vikalpitā vedanā yāvad vikalpitaṃ vijñānaṃ /
analyzed: yasmin vikalpaḥ kriyate sā vikalpitā vedanā yāvat vikalpitam vijñānam
dharmatā vedanā yaḥ vedanāyāḥ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ
evam yāvat dharmatā vijñānam veditavyam

original: evaṃ dhātvāyatanādiṣv api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vistareṇa vaktavyaṃ /

original: rūpavedane yāvat saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtam iti yo nāmābhidheyo bhāvaḥ so'pi porikalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannasvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: rūpa vedane yāvat saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtam iti yaḥ nāma abhidheyaḥ bhāvaḥ saḥ api porikalpita paratantra pariniṣpanna svabhāvaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: kathaṃ ? tatra rūpādisvabhāvaprajñaptatvāt parikalpitaḥ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānabhāvāt paratantraḥ pratyayaparatantratvāt tasyaiva rūpādibhāvātyantavigatatvaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ /

original: nanu paratantra eva manuṣyādibhāvena nāmnocyate na parikalpita ity anarthaka  eva parikalpitavikalpaḥ /

arthasya api nāma svarūpa a vyatirekāt vācya tvam vihīyate niyama hetu abhāvāt

original: yad uktaṃ cakṣuāradyāyatanānām anugrahopaghātāt tad adhiṣṭhāna eva bhoktṛtvavyavahāra iti tad ayuktaṃ /

original: rūpapratiṣedhena cakṣurādīnām āyatanānām apy asattvādātmavad iti naiṣa  upālambhaḥ /
analyzed: rūpa pratiṣedhena cakṣuḥ ādīnām āyatanānām api asattvāt ātma vat iti na eṣa upālambhaḥ

original: yasmāt parikalpitarūpasyaivātra pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate na vikalpatārūpasya /
analyzed: yasmāt parikalpita rūpasya eva atra pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate na vikalpa tā rūpasya
tatra cakṣuḥ ādi prapañca paribhāvita karma ākṣipta tvena ālayavijñānam pariṇāma viśeṣa prāptam ādhyātmikam āyatanam
tat nimittasya pravṛtti vijñānasya rūpa ādi pratibhāsam bāhya āyatanam

original: ya ālayavijñānasya sādhāraṇārthapratibhāso yaś ca sattvapratibhāsaḥ so'pi grāhyagrāhakapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasyotpattāvadhipatipratyayatvād bāhyam āyatanam ucyate na tu tad viṣayatvād iti /
analyzed: yaḥ ālayavijñānasya sādhāraṇa artha pratibhāsaḥ yaḥ ca sattva pratibhāsaḥ saḥ api grāhya grāhaka pratibhāsasya pravṛtti vijñānasya utpattau adhipati pratyaya tvāt bāhyam āyatanam ucyate na tu tat viṣaya tvāt iti

original: nanvevaṃ dvayam āśritya cakṣur vijñānādaya utpadyanta iti sūtravacanena virudhyate /
analyzed: nanu evam dvayam āśritya cakṣuḥ vijñāna ādayaḥ utpadyante iti sūtra vacanena virudhyate

original: rūpādipratibhāso vijñānād bhinnaḥ  na ca tadeva tasyaivotpattipratyayo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: rūpa ādi pratibhāsaḥ vijñānāt bhinnaḥ na ca tat eva tasya eva utpatti pratyayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: utpannānutpannāvasthayor bhāvād abhāvāc ca svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
analyzed: utpanna anutpanna avasthayoḥ bhāvāt abhāvāt ca svātmani vṛtti virodhāt

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ vijñānanirbhāsād bhinnā rūpādayo'bhyupagantavyā iti /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam vijñāna nirbhāsāt bhinnāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ abhyupagantavyāḥ iti
na eṣaḥ api upālambhaḥ

original: yasmād pādinirbhāsavijñānṃ sabhāgavijñānotpattaye pratyayavijñāne vāsanām ādhatte /
analyzed: yasmāt sa bhāga vijñāna utpattaye pratyaya vijñāne vāsanām ādhatte

original: vasanāpariṇāmāc ca rūpādyābhāsaṃ punar vijñānaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: vasanā pariṇāmāt ca rūpa ādi ābhāsam punar vijñānam jāyate

original: evaṃ vijñānanirbhāsātmakatvena vāsanāhito vijñānapratyaya ukta iti na sūtravirodhaḥ /
analyzed: evam vijñāna nirbhāsa ātmaka tvena vāsanā āhitaḥ vijñāna pratyayaḥ uktaḥ iti na sūtra virodhaḥ

original: evaṃ rūpādinirbhāsasyālambanārtho'py upapannaḥ svanirbhāsākārasya vijñānasya pratyayatvāt /
analyzed: evam rūpa ādi nirbhāsasya ālambana arthaḥ api upapannaḥ sva nirbhāsa ākārasya vijñānasya pratyaya tvāt

original: athavā yathā bāhyārthavādibhir vijñānena sahaja ālambanapratyayo vyavasthāpyate janyajanakavad abhāve'pi tad bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vijñānabhāvābhāvāvadhikṛtya evam ihāpi rūpādinirbhāsasya vijñānasya vā'satyapi janyajanakabhāve tad bhāvābhāvayor vijñānabhāvābhāvavyabhicārāt pratyayapratyayitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: athavā yathā bāhya artha vādibhiḥ vijñānena sahajaḥ ālambana pratyayaḥ vyavasthāpyate janya janaka vat abhāve api tat bhāva abhāvābhyām vijñāna bhāva abhāvau adhikṛtya evam iha api rūpa ādi nirbhāsasya vijñānasya vā asati api janya janaka bhāve tat bhāva abhāvayoḥ vijñāna bhāva abhāva vyabhicārāt pratyaya pratyayi tvam vyavasthāpyate

original: rūpanirbhāsavijñānayor abhinnatvād dṛṣṭāntena mukhyato'sādṛśyam iti na bhedopacārāt /
analyzed: rūpa nirbhāsa vijñānayoḥ abhinna tvāt dṛṣṭāntena mukhyatas asādṛśyam iti na bheda upacārāt

original: tadyathā grāhyagrāhakavikalpādhiṣṭḥānatvāt svapnamāyāgandharvanagarādivijñānaṃ paramārthato'abhinnam api grāhyagrāhakākāreṇa bhinnam iva vyavasthāpyata ālambyālambakabhāvatvena tathā'nyatrāpi nāsti virodhaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā svapna māyā gandharvanagara ādi vijñānam paramārthataḥ aabhinnam api grāhya grāhaka ākāreṇa bhinnam iva vyavasthāpyate ālambya ālambaka bhāva tvena tathā anyatra api nā asti virodhaḥ

original: api cālambyālambakabhāvaḥ sarvatropacaryata eva na mukhyo'sti /
analyzed: api ca ālambya ālambaka bhāvaḥ sarvatra upacaryate eva na mukhyaḥ asti

original: nahi vijñānam utpannam anutpannaṃ vā viṣayam ālambate /
analyzed: nahi vijñānam utpannam anutpannam vā viṣayam ālambate
utpatti anantara vināśi tvāt kriyā kāle anavasthānāt asattvāt ca
viṣayaḥ ca utpannaḥ anutpannaḥ vā ubhayathā api ālambana tvena ayogyaḥ
utpannasya a navasthānāt anutpannasya ca asattvāt
nahi nirādhāra ālambana kriyā yujyate

original: yasyāpi sattāmātreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāva evālambyālambakabhāvas tasyāpi vartamānasya vijñānasyālambanaṃ nirarthakaṃ  bhavati tadātmatvena siddheḥ /
analyzed: yasya api sattā mātreṇa kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva ālambya ālambaka bhāvaḥ tasya api vartamānasya vijñānasya ālambanam nirarthakam bhavati tad ātma tvena siddheḥ
utpadyamānasya api nirarthakam asattvāt

original: notpadyamānasya nirarthakaṃ yasmād viṣayasadbhāve vijñānaṃ tan nirbhāsam ātmānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: na utpadyamānasya nirarthakam yasmāt viṣaya sadbhāve vijñānam tat nirbhāsam ātmānam pratilabhate

original: yadi viṣayanirbhāso vijñānasya bāhyārthanimittaḥ evam atītānāgatasvapnādivijñānasya nirākāratvaṃ vartate /
analyzed: yadi viṣaya nirbhāsaḥ vijñānasya bāhya artha nimittaḥ evam atīta anāgata svapna ādi vijñānasya nirākāra tvam vartate
tad artha abhāvāt vā sattvam

original: na vikalaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kāryam utpadyate atiprasangāt /
analyzed: na vikalaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kāryam utpadyate atiprasangāt
na ca asataḥ pratyaya tvam yujyate

original: na ca bāhyārtha ālambanapratyayo vijñānasya tena vināpi bhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca bāhya arthe ālambana pratyayaḥ vijñānasya tena vinā api bhāvāt

original: tasmāt sarvam eva vijñānaṃ taimirikādīnām iva bāhyārthālambananirapekṣam evābhyupagantavyaṃ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvam eva vijñānam taimirika ādīnām iva bāhya artha ālambana nirapekṣam eva abhyupagantavyam

original: { pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ } āyatanā'rthānantaraṃ pratītyasamutpādārtho vaktavya ityata āha  pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ /

analyzed: punar hetu phala āyāsa anāropa anapavādataḥ
nirīha anitya samartha pratyaya utpādana arthaḥ
yathā uktam sūtre api etat asmin sati idam bhavati

original: asyotpādādidam utpadyate yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: asya utpādāt idam utpadyate yat uta avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ iti vistaraḥ

original: ayaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādo hetupahalakriyāṇāṃ samāropāpavādapratiṣedheneṣyata iti pratipādayann āha  hetuphalakriyāṇām asamāropavādārthaḥ pratītyasamutpādārtha iti /
analyzed: ayam ca pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāropa apavāda pratiṣedhena iṣyate iti pratipādayan āha hetu phala kriyāṇām a samāropa vāda arthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda arthaḥ iti
āyāsa śabdena tu kriyā uktā

original: tatra hetusamāropaḥ avidyādīn hitvā puruṣeśvarāṇupradhāṇādīnāṃ hetutvakalpanāt /
analyzed: tatra hetu samāropaḥ avidyā ādīn hitvā puruṣa īśvara aṇu pradhāṇa ādīnām hetu tva kalpanāt

original: etad eva pratipādayann āha  saṃskārādīnāṃ jarāmaraṇaparyantānāṃ viṣamahetukalpnād iti /
analyzed: etat eva pratipādayan āha saṃskāra ādīnām jarā maraṇa paryantānām iti

original: saṃskārādīnāṃ hy anityānāṃ nityaḥ puruṣādiko hetur viṣamo visadṛśa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saṃskāra ādīnām hi anityānām nityaḥ puruṣa ādikaḥ hetuḥ viṣamaḥ visadṛśaḥ iti arthaḥ
athavā hetuḥ svarūpa vikriyā apekṣaḥ bīja ādikaḥ an kura ādīnām dṛṣṭaḥ

original: na ca nityasya svarūpavikriyā'stīti viṣamahetau hetutvakalpanād hetusamāropaḥ /
analyzed: na ca nityasya svarūpa vikriyā asti iti viṣama hetau hetu tva kalpanāt hetu samāropaḥ

original: hetvapavādo nirhetukatvakalpanād iti saṃskārādīnāṃ nirhetukotpādābhyupagamād avidyādīnāṃ saṃskārādihetutvam apoḍhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: hetu apavādaḥ nirhetuka tva kalpanāt iti saṃskāra ādīnām nirhetuka utpāda abhyupagamāt avidyā ādīnām saṃskāra ādi hetu tvam apoḍham bhavati
phala samāropaḥ sātmakānām saṃskāra ādīnām avidyā ādi pratyaya pravṛtti kalpanāt iti

original: satyātmani saṃskārādīnām avidyādipratyayapravṛttitvaṃ na tv astīti saṃskārādiphaleṣv ātmasamāropa ityeke /
analyzed: sati ātmani saṃskāra ādīnām avidyā ādi pratyaya pravṛtti tvam na tu asti iti saṃskāra ādi phaleṣu ātma samāropaḥ iti eke

original: ātmadravyasamavāyitvena tad anugrahopaghātakartṛtvena vā sātmakānāṃ saṃskārādīnām avidyādipratyayapravṛttikalpanāt phalasamāropa ityapare /
analyzed: ātma dravya samavāyi tvena tat anugraha upaghāta kartṛ tvena vā sātmakānām saṃskāra ādīnām avidyā ādi pratyaya pravṛtti kalpanāt phala samāropaḥ iti apare

original: phalāpavādo na santy avidyādipratyayāḥ saṃskāradaya iti kalpanād iti /
analyzed: phala apavādaḥ na santi avidyā ādi pratyayāḥ saṃskāra daye iti kalpanāt iti

original: tad yathā  sucaritaduścaritaparalokāpavādināṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritaṃ nāsti paraloka iti /
analyzed: tat yathā su carita duścarita para loka apavādinām na asti su caritam na asti duścaritam na asti para lokaḥ iti

original: yadi vasturūpam arthāntarabhūtaṃ saṃskārādyutpattāv avidyādayaḥ kurvantīti kalpyeta evaṃ kriyāsamāropaḥ /
analyzed: yadi vastu rūpam artha antara bhūtam saṃskāra ādi utpattau avidyā ādayaḥ kurvanti iti kalpyeta evam kriyā samāropaḥ
kriyā apavādaḥ nissāmarthya kalapanāt iti

original: avidyādīnāṃ sattāmātreṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ hy utpādanasamarthānām api niḥsāmarthyakalpanāt kriyāpavādaḥ /
analyzed: avidyā ādīnām sattā mātreṇa saṃskārāṇām hi utpādana samarthānām api niḥsāmarthya kalpanāt kriyā apavādaḥ
tat abhāvāt a samāropa anapavādaḥ veditavyaḥ iti
tasya hetu phala kriyāṇām samāropa apavādasya abhāvāt a samāropa anapavādaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: evam idaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam avidyādivyatirekeṇātmanyanyasmin vā yaḥ kartṛtvagrāhas tasyaṃ pratipakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: evam idam pratītyasamutpāda kauśalyam avidyā ādi vyatirekeṇa ātmani anyasmin vā yaḥ kartṛ tva grāhaḥ pratipakṣeṇa veditavyam

original: na hy atrātmānyo vā'vidyāvyatirekeṇa śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā /
analyzed: na hi atra ātmā anyaḥ vā avidyā vyatirekeṇa śubha aśubhānām karmaṇām kartā
anyaḥ saṃskāra vyatirekeṇa vijñānasya kartā na asti

original: evaṃ sarvatrāpi yathāyogaṃ vaktavyaṃ nirīhebhyo'nityebhyaḥ samarthebhyaścāvidyādibhyaḥ saṃskārādyutpattitaḥ ////
analyzed: evam sarvatra api yathāyogam vaktavyam nirīhebhyaḥ anityebhyaḥ samarthebhyaḥ ca avidyā ādibhyaḥ saṃskāra ādi utpattitaḥ

original: { sthānā'sthānārthaḥ }  pratītyasamutpādānantaraṃ sthānā'sthānārtho vaktavya ityata āha  aniṣṭeṣṭaviśuddhīnāṃ iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: sthāna a sthāna arthaḥ   pratītyasamutpāda anantaram sthāna a sthāna arthaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti atas āha aniṣṭa iṣṭa viśuddhīnām iti vistaraḥ
sthāna asthānam saptavidha pāratantrya arthena veditam iti
tatra sthānam hetuḥ asthānam ahetuḥ

original: yathoktaṃ gāthāyāṃ  satyaṃ vaden na ca kruddhed dadyād alpoo'pi yācitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā uktam gāthāyām satyam vadet na ca kruddhā id dadyāt yācitaḥ

original: ebhis tribhir iha shtānair devānāṃ samitiṃ vrajet //
analyzed: ebhiḥ tribhiḥ iha shtānaiḥ devānām samitim vrajet
hetubhiḥ iti gamyate

original: athavā sthānaṃ sambhavaḥ asthānaṃ punar asambhavaḥ /
analyzed: athavā sthānam sambhavaḥ asthānam punar asambhavaḥ
tat kauśalyam sthāna asthāna kauśalyam
paratantrasya bhāvaḥ pāratantryam
parāyatta tā iti arthaḥ

original: tac ca saptavidham api triṣvantarbhavati karmakleśajanmapāratantryeṣu /
analyzed: tat ca saptavidham api triṣu antarbhavati karma kleśa janma pāratantryeṣu
tatra aniṣṭe pāratantryam iti
aniṣṭāḥ duargatayaḥ

original: tatra gamanaṃ duścaritāyatattvaṃ pāratantryañceti pradarśayann āha  duśaritena prāṇātipātādinā kāyavānmanaḥkarmasaṇggṛhītena saprayogapṛṣṭhenā'nicchato'pi durgatigamād iti /
analyzed: tatra gamanam duścaritāya tattvam pāratantryam ca iti pradarśayan āha duśaritena prāṇa atipāta ādinā kāyavān manaḥ karma saṇggṛhītena sa prayoga pṛṣṭhena a n icchataḥ api durgati gamāt iti
durgatayaḥ narakāḥ pretāḥ tiryañcaḥ ca

original: teṣām ekāntena duḥkhatvān na kasyacit tatra gamanecchā bhavati /
analyzed: teṣām ekāntena duḥkha tvāt na kasyacid tatra gamana icchā bhavati

original: karmaṇāṃ balavattvād durgatigetutvāc ca duścaritasyānicchato'pi tatra karmavaśād eva gamanaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: karmaṇām balavat tvāt durgati getu tvāt ca duścaritasya an icchataḥ api tatra karma vaśāt eva gamanam bhavati
iṣṭe pāratantryam su caritena sugati gamanāt iti
iṣṭam sugati gamanam
sugatiḥ devāḥ manuśyāḥ ca

original: sucaritaṃ saprayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyo viratiḥ dānamānasatkārādikriyā śāstṛguruṇānvitādiṣu maitrīkaruṇādayaś ca guṇaviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: su caritam sa prayoga pṛṣṭhebhyaḥ prāṇa atipāta ādibhyaḥ viratiḥ dāna māna satkāra ādi kriyā śāstṛ guruṇā anvita ādiṣu maitrī karuṇā ādayaḥ ca guṇa viśeṣāḥ
pāratantryam su caritam antareṇa anyathā prārthayatām api sugati gamana abhāvāt
su carita pratibaddha tā eva sugati utpatteḥ
viśūddhau pāratantryam iti vistaraḥ
viśuddhiḥ kleśa prahāṇam

original: pañca nivaraṇāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca /
analyzed: pañca nivaraṇāni kāmacchandaḥ vyāpādaḥ styānam iddham auddhatya kaukṛtyam vicikitsā ca
styānam iddham ekīkṛtya auddhatya kaukṛtyam ca pañca bhavati

original: abhedena kuśalapakṣaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni bhedena punar yathākramaṃ pravrajatyābhiratiṃ tad anurūpe kāyavākkarmāṇi sabrahmacāribhiḥ samyak coditasya samyak pratipattiṃ śamathakāle'līnatāṃ pragrahakāle'vikṣepaṃ śamathavipaśyanākāle svarasavāditāṃ chādayantīti nivaraṇāni /
analyzed: abhedena kuśala pakṣam nivṛṇvanti iti nivaraṇāni bhedena punar yathākramam pravrajatyā abhiratim tat anurūpe kāya vāc karmāṇi sa brahmacāribhiḥ samyak coditasya samyak pratipattim śamatha kāle alīna tām pragraha kāle avikṣepam śamatha vipaśyanā kāle sva rasa vādi tām chādayanti iti nivaraṇāni
tāni a prahāya a tyaktvā yāvat sapta bodhi angāni a bhāvayitvā iti

original: yāvad iti paryantopadeśāt smṛtyupasthānasamyak prahāṇarddhipādendriyabalānām api grahaṇaṃ /
analyzed: yāvat iti paryanta upadeśāt smṛti upasthāna samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya balānām api grahaṇam
duḥkhasya anta akaraṇāt iti

original: duḥkhasyānto  yatra duḥkhaṃ nāsti tac ca nirvāṇaṃ tasyākaraṇam aprāptir nirvāṇaṃ na prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkhasya antaḥ yatra duḥkham na asti tat ca nirvāṇam tasya akaraṇam aprāptiḥ nirvāṇam na prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: athavā duḥkhasyānto yasmād duḥkhādanyaduḥkhaṃ na sandhīyate tat tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ na karotītyapratisandhikaṃ duḥkham na karotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: athavā duḥkhasya antaḥ yasmāt duḥkhāt anya duḥkham na sandhīyate tat tādṛśam duḥkham na karoti iti apratisandhikam duḥkham na karoti iti arthaḥ
pañca nivaraṇa prahāṇa pratibaddha tā viśuddhau pāratantryam

original: samotpattau pāratantryaṃ dvayor apūrvācaramayor iti sahitayor ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sama utpattau pāratantryam dvayoḥ apūrva acaramayoḥ iti sahitayoḥ iti arthaḥ
tathāgatayoḥ cakravartinoḥ ca ekasmin lokadhātau anutpādāt iti
tathāgatayoḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ abhipretaḥ

original: cakravartinos tu cātur dvīpaka iti kecit /

analyzed: evam ca sa hetuka duḥkha anutpāda lakṣaṇa tvāt nirodhaḥ dvividhaḥ uktaḥ samudaya śama arthena sa upadhi śeṣaḥ duḥkha upaśama arthena nirupādhi śeṣaḥ iti tayoḥ eva adhikṛtayoḥ duḥkha samudayayoḥ pratipakṣa arthena duḥkha samudaya nirodha gāminī pratipad mārga satyam

original: tadevaṃ satyakuśalasya sankleśavyavadānamātrāvagatatvāt tadanyaḥ sankleśavyavadānagraho vyāvartate tasyābhāvād iti ////
analyzed: tat evam satya kuśalasya san kleśa vyavadāna mātra avagata tvāt tad anyaḥ san kleśa vyavadāna grahaḥ vyāvartate tasya abhāvāt iti

original: { yānatrayā'rthaḥ }  satyārthānantaraṃ yānatrayārthaṃ pratipādyata ityata āha  guṇadoṣā'vikalpena jñānena iti vistaraḥ /

analyzed: jñāna śabdaḥ ubhayatra sambadhyate
guṇa doṣa jñānena a vikalpa jñānena ca iti
athavā antare vikalpa śabdaḥ luptaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: tatra guṇadoṣajñānena parataḥ svayañceti ata evāha  vṛttau yathāyogam iti /
analyzed: tatra guṇa doṣa jñānena paratas svayam ca iti atas eva āha vṛttau yathāyogam iti
tatra nirvāṇa saṃsārayoḥ guṇa doṣa jñānena iti
nirvāṇa śabdena atra mārga nirodhau san gṛhītau yathā praśānta śabdaḥ

original: tatra nirodhe śāntādyākāraiḥ mārge nairyāṇikādyākārair jñānaṃ nirvāṇe guṇajñānaṃ /

original: tatrā'py anityaduḥkhādyākāraiḥ samudayapratyayādyākāraiś ca jñānaṃ saṃsāre doṣajñānaṃ /

original: parataḥ śrutveti buddhabodhisattvādibhyo nirvāṇasaṃsārayor guṇānyathokān doṣāṃś ca śrutveti /
analyzed: paratas śrutvā iti buddha bodhisattva ādibhyaḥ nirvāṇa saṃsārayoḥ guṇān yathā ukān doṣān ca śrutvā iti

original: śrāvakayānam iti paradghoṣasaṃniśrayeṇa niryāṇāt śrāvakāyanm iti pratyekabuddhayānād viśeṣaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: śrāvakayānam iti paradghoṣa saṃniśrayeṇa niryāṇāt iti pratyekabuddha yānāt viśeṣam darśayati

original: tenaiveti nirvāṇasaṃsārayor guṇadoṣajñānena svayam aśrutvā parato buddhabodhasattvebhyo niryāṇārthena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ /

original: avikalpena jñāneneti saṃsāranirvāṇayor anabhilāpyadharmatāprativedhād avikalpaṃ jñānaṃ /

atra hi jñānena iti pratyekabuddha yānāt viśeṣaḥ

original: anye tvāhuḥ  pudgalanairātmyaviṣayeṇa guṇadoṣā'vikalpena jñānena parataḥ śrutvā niryāṇaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ /
analyzed: anye tu āhuḥ pudgala nairātmya viṣayeṇa guṇa doṣa avikalpena jñānena paratas śrutvā niryāṇam śrāvaka yānam

original: evaṃ yānatrayakuśalasya yogamātradarśanād ātmā yogīti grāho vyāvartate //

original: etat saprajñapti sahetukaṃ nimittaṃ sasamprayogaṃ paratantrasvabhāvasangṛhītatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ veditavyaṃ /

original: tat saṃskṛtaṃ na kevalaṃ tadeveti darśayati /
analyzed: tat saṃskṛtam na kevalam tat eva iti darśayati
kasya punar tat nimittam nāma kāya ādīnām

original: teṣāṃ tat svabhāvaviśeṣasaṃsūcakatvāt tadanusāreṇa ca svabhāvaviśeṣābhiniveśināṃ cittacaittānāṃ manaudgrahavikalpākhyānāṃ nimittaṃ /

manā odgraha vikalpaḥ ca ālayavijñānasya nimittam

original: anye tu manyante  svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñāpanāt prajñapter nimittaṃ saṃjñāṃ nimittodgrahaṇātmiketi vacanāt /

original: tatra mano yan nityaṃ manyanākāram iti /

original: tac ca samprayuktam ātmamohātmadṛṣṭyātmasnehātmamānaiḥ pañcabhiś ca sarvatragair vedanāsaṃjñācetanāsparśamanaskārair iti /

original: udgrahaḥ pañca vijñānakāyā iti viṣayasvarūpagrahaṇalakṣaṇatvāt svasaṃvedyā ityākhyātum aśakyatvād udgraha ucyate /

original: etatsarvaṃ saprajñaptisahetukaṃ nimittaṃ karmakleśābhyām abhisaṃskṛtatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ /

original: kathaṃ tathatā praśamārtham ucyata iti ? praśamasyārtha iti kṛtvā /

original: nanu ca nirodhena tathatayā na kaścit sambandho'sti kathaṃ praśamārthatvaṃ ? tathatāyā mārgālambanatvāt /

original: evaṃ vigrahabhedād ekābhidhānena nirvāṇamārgayor grahaṇaṃ praśama iti /

original: ityetenārthena skandhādiṣu jñānaṃ skandhādikauśalyaṃ veditavyam iti /

iti vistareṇa sarvatra vācyam

original: ataḥ samāsato dvividham ityāha  ādarśatattvaṃ dṛśyatattvañca /

original: kimarthaṃ tad dṛṣyatattvam ity ucyate ? tasya mūlatattve darśanāt nirabhimānadṛśyatattvaṃ lakṣaṇatattvaṃ /

original: pudgaladharmayor grāhyagrāhakayor bhāvābhāvayoś cā'samāropānapavādaviparyāsa dṛśyatattvam aviparyāsalakṣaṇaṃ /

tat hi nitya ādi viparyāsa pratipakṣa bhūtam

original: katham ityata āha  dṛṣṭānasanniśrayeṇa yuktyā nigrahād iti /

original: tac ca pañca vastūni tatra sarvajñeyānupraveśāt /

original: āgamānusāriṇyāṃ madhyāntavibhāgaṭīkāyām ācāryabhadantasthi ramatyuparacitāyāṃ tattvaparicchedastṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ //

original: %pratipakṣabhāvanā'vasthāphalaparicchedaścaturthaḥ  { pratipakṣabhāvanā }  tattvapratipādanānantaraṃ pratipakṣabhāvanā vaktavyā tatrā'vasthā phalaprāptiś ca /

original: tattvānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt pratipakṣabhāvanāpratibaddhatvāc ca tad avasthāphalaprāptyor uddeśaḥ /

original: sūtre pratipakaṣatvena bodhipakṣo'numata iti pradarśanārtham āha  pratipakṣabhāvanā bodhipakṣyabhāveneti /

original: te hi yathoktāvaraṇavipakṣaprahāṇāya bhāvyamānaḥ prabhavantīti pratipakṣā ucyante /

original: te punaḥ saptatriṃśat  catvāri smṛtypasthānāni yāvadāryāṣṭānga mārgāḥ /

original: tad bhāvanā bṛṃhaṇāropaṇā abhyāso bahulā kriyeti paryāyāḥ /

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanaiva pūrvam ucyate nānyā bodhipakṣabhāvanā ? āha  tatra tāvadādau  dauṣṭhulyāt tarṣahetutvāt iti vistaraḥ /

tāvat śabda arthaḥ krama arthaḥ
ādau tāvat smṛti upasthāna bhāvanā ucyate
paścāt anyeṣām api iti
nirvāṇa saṃsāryoḥ guṇa doṣa anavabodhāt

original: saṃskāreṣu sukhaśucinityātmābhiniveśena bālānāṃ bhavabhoge'bhivacanaṃ  nirvāṇārthaṃ trāsaḥ /

original: sa ca guṇadoṣānavabodhaḥ sukhādyabhiniveśaś ca satyadarśanād vinivartata ityataḥ saṃsārād udvajanārthaṃ nirvāṇe cābhimukhīkaraṇārthaṃ catuḥsatyāvatārāya smṛtyupasthānabhāvanaivādāv uktā /

kāyena hi dauṣṭhulyam prabhāvyate iti
dauṣṭhulyam duḥsthita tā

original: tathā hi pratidinam abhisaṃskriyamāṇo vikriyata eva kāya iti kāyena dauṣṭhulyaṃ prabhāvyate /
analyzed: tathā hi pratidinam abhisaṃskriyamāṇaḥ vikriyate eva kāyaḥ iti kāyena dauṣṭhulyam prabhāvyate

original: kim artham etad ityāha  tasya sadauṣṭhulyasaṃskāralakṣaṇatvād iti /
analyzed: kim artham etat iti āha tasya sat auṣṭhulya saṃskāra lakṣaṇa tvāt iti

original: yasmād duḥkhasatyasya sadauṣṭhulyāḥ saṃskārāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāyena ca dauṣṭhulyaṃ prabhāvyate tasmāt kāyaparīkṣayā duḥkhasatyam avatarati /
analyzed: yasmāt duḥkha satyasya sa dauṣṭhulyāḥ saṃskārāḥ lakṣaṇam svabhāvaḥ kāyena ca dauṣṭhulyam prabhāvyate tasmāt kāya parīkṣayā duḥkha satyam avatarati

original: dauṣṭhulyaṃ na vijñāyata ityata āha  dauṣṭhulyaṃ hi saṃskāraduḥkhateti /
analyzed: dauṣṭhulyam na vijñāyate iti atas āha dauṣṭhulyam hi saṃskāra duḥkha tā iti

original: sa ca sarvaviplavastv iti dauṣṭhulyamāryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvāc ca duḥkhatā /

original: yathoktaṃ  anartho janmedaṃ sati hi janane santi ripavo jarāmṛtyuvyādhivyasanabandhaprabhṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā uktam anarthaḥ janma idam sati hi janane santi ripavaḥ jarā mṛtyu vyādhi vyasana bandha prabhṛtayaḥ

original: anarthās te na syur yadi na bhavato nāśavibhavā vajāte vṛkṣe syān na hi dahanadavavāyucyutir api //
analyzed: anarthāḥ te na syuḥ yadi na bhavataḥ nāśa vibhavāḥ vajāte vṛkṣe syāt na hi dahana dava vāyu cyutiḥ api

original: tayeti saṃskāraduḥkhatayā na vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāduḥkhaduḥkhatābhyāṃ tayor āvyāpitvāt saṃskāraduḥKhatānimittatvāc ca /

original: sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastvāryā duḥkhatā paśyanti nā'nāsavaṃ mārgasatyasya janmotpattipratipakṣatvāt na tu pṛthagjanā viparyāsasthānāśrayatvāt /

original: sūtre'py uktaṃ  samāsataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham iti /

na dauṣṭhulyam

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? akarmaṇyātāyāḥ sāsravatvād avaśyaṃ sāsravatāṃ bījakāraṇotpannā'bhyupagantavyā /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam akarmaṇyātāyāḥ sa āsrava tvāt avaśyam sa āsrava tām bīja kāraṇa utpannā abhyupagantavyā

original: sā tv abījāpyarthasantāne kadācid āhārādyapacārād bhavati /

original: na cāsau dauṣṭhulyaṃ bhavitum arhatya nāsravatvād iti /

original: tasmāt sukhādyavakāśasahitena kāyena pratikṣaṇabhāvinā tad dauṣṭhulyaṃ prabhāvyate pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sukha ādi avakāśa sahitena kāyena pratikṣaṇa bhāvinā tat dauṣṭhulyam prabhāvyate pratīyate iti arthaḥ
tat yathā khalavila antargatam bījam ankureṇa iti

original: atra kāraṇam āha   tasya sadauṣṭhulyasaṃskāralakṣaṇatvād iti sabījasaṃskārātmakatvād ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra kāraṇam āha   tasya sat auṣṭhulya saṃskāra lakṣaṇa tvāt iti sa bīja saṃskāra ātmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: saṃskāraduḥkhatā hi vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāduḥkhaduḥkhatādauṣṭhulyābhyām anugatatvāt kāraṇatvāc ca dauṣṭhulyam ityktā /

original: tṛṣṇāhetur vedanā  avidyāsaṃsparśajetyabhiprāyāt anāsravāyā atad hetutvāt /

original: tatra sukhā vedanā tat saṃyogāviyogatṛṣṇāyā hetuḥ /

original: aduḥkhasukhā tad avasthābhir atitṛṣṇāyās tat saṃyogāviyogatṛṣṇāyāś ca kasyāṃcit samāptau hetur iti /

original: sa duḥkhavedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ kāmasukham abhinandatīti vacanāt duḥkhāpi vedanā sukhāyāḥ tṛṣṇayā hetur bhavati /

original: sa hi vedanāṃ svarūpataḥ kāraṇataḥ kāryato'nityato duḥkhataścopaparīkṣamāṇaḥ samudayasatyam avatarati tṛṣṇāṃ tat kāryatvenāvagacchatītyarthaḥ /

tṛṣṇā hi sūtre samudaya satyam iti uktā

original: ko duḥkhasamudayaḥ ? paṭhyate  tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikānandā rāgasahagateti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ duḥkha samudayaḥ paṭhyate tṛṣṇā paunarbhavika ānandā rāga sahagatā iti vistaraḥ
evam vedanā smṛti upasthānena samudaya satyam avatarati
ātma abhiniveśa vastu cittam iti
anyasya nitya ādi guṇa viśiṣṭasya ātmanaḥ abhāvāt ātma abhiniveśa ālambanam cittam eva

original: tasmāt tat parīkṣayā nirodhasatyam avatarati śāntatvena /
analyzed: tasmāt tat parīkṣayā nirodha satyam avatarati śānta tvena
atra eva kāraṇam āha ātma uccheda bhaya apagamāt iti

original: citte hy anityatvādiparīkṣayā'tmābhiniveśo vyāvartate duḥkhasaṃjñā pravartate /
analyzed: citte hi anitya tva ādi parīkṣayā ātma abhiniveśaḥ vyāvartate duḥkha saṃjñā pravartate
atas ca ātma uccheda bhaya apagamāt duḥkha mātrasya ucchedāt nirodha satyam śānta tvena avatarati iti
evam citta smṛti upasthānena nirodha satyam avatarati iti
dharma parīkṣayā sānkleśika vyāvadānika dharma asaṃmohāt mārga satyam avatarati iti
tatra sānkleśikāḥ dharmāḥ kleśa upakleśāḥ
vyāvadānikāḥ tu kleśa upakleśa pratipakṣa bhūtāḥ prema maitrī ādayaḥ

original: teṣāṃ sānkleśikānāṃ vyāvadānikānāñca vipakṣapratipakṣabhāvaṃ buddhvā sarvopadravātyantaprahāṇopāye mārgasatye'bhimukhībhavati /
analyzed: teṣām sānkleśikānām vyāvadānikānām ca vipakṣa pratipakṣa bhāvam buddhvā sarva upadrava atyanta prahāṇa upāye mārga satye abhimukhībhavati
evam dharma smṛti upasthānena mārga satyam avatarati iti
avatāraḥ atra pratyekam satye satya lakṣaṇa avabodhaḥ

original: tatra kāyasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanā anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato'nātmato'pi anekā'śucidravyasvabhāvato'pi aśucibījato'pi aśuciniṣyandato'pi aśucisthitihetuto'pi aśucivikārato'pi phenabhanga ivāsārato'pi gatito'pi yonito'pi /

original: kiṃ kāraṇam ata āha yasmāt  parijñāte vipakṣe ca iti vistaraḥ /

analyzed: evam anutpannānām kuśalānām dharmāṇām utpādaya chandan janayati iti vistaraḥ

original: katham ārabheta ? līnaṃ cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samvejanīyapramodānīyadharmamanaskāraiḥ /

original: uddhataṃ cittaṃ tasminnevālambane samyak pradadhāti samvejanīyapramodanīyadharmamanaskārair dhārayatītyarthaḥ /

samyak ebhiḥ kāyavān manāṃsi dhārayanti iti samyak pradhānāni

original: { catvāraḥ ṛddhipādāḥ } karmañatā sthites tatra iti vistaraḥ /

original: sā ca karmaṇyatā chandavīryacittamīmāṃsādhipatyaprabhavetyata āha  karmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādā iti /

sarvasya abhijñā ādikasya arthasya samṛddhiḥ ṛddhiḥ
tasyāḥ pratiṣṭhā arthena ṛddhipādāḥ ṛddhi hetavaḥ iti arthaḥ
atas eva āha sarva artha samṛddhi hetu tvāt iti

original: te punaścandasamādhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ vīryasamādhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādā cittasamādhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskārasamanavāgata ṛddhipādaḥ mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipāda iti /

original: tatra cchandsamādhir yadā chandādhipatyād vīryabhāvanāyāṃ sagauravaṃ pravartamānaḥ spṛśati cittasyakāgratāṃ /

original: vīryasamādhir yadā vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ sātatyaprayogāt spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ /

original: cittasamādhir yadā pūrvasamādhibījam āgamya citta eva cittaṃ dhārayan spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ /

original: sthitiratra cittasthitiḥ samādhir veditavya iti samādhigrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇād vyavacchedārthaṃ /

original: yata ārabdhavīryasya cittakarmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādā bhavanti ataḥ samyak prahāṇānantaraṃ ṛddhipādā nirdiṣṭāḥ /

original: sā punaḥ karmaṇyatā  kim prayojanā kiṃ hetukā cetyata āha  pañcadoṣaprahāṇāyāṣṭaprahāṇasaṃskārabhāvanānvayā videtavyeti /

original: { pañca doṣāḥ } te ca pañcadoṣā na vijñāyanta ityataḥ pṛcchati katame pañca doṣā iti /

iti vistaraḥ
