original: yadi na visaṃyogāya kimarthaṃ tarhi pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatītyata āha  yāvadevā'pratiṣṭhitanirvāṇāya bhāvayatīti /
analyzed: yadi na visaṃyogāya kimartham tarhi pratipakṣam bhāvayati iti atas āha yāvat eva a pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇāya bhāvayati iti

original: kiṃ tad apratiṣṭhitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ ? bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ tāvat karmopapattivaśitāsanniśrayeṇa kāruṇikatvāt saṃsāropapattiḥ prajñābalena tatrāsankleśaḥ /
analyzed: kim tat apratiṣṭhitam nirvāṇam bodhisattva avasthāyām tāvat karma upapatti vaśitā sat niśrayeṇa kāruṇika tvāt saṃsāra upapattiḥ prajñā balena tatra asān kleśaḥ
tat idam bodhisattvānām apratiṣṭhitam nirvāṇam vidhīyate
saṃsāra avasthitaḥ api pṛthagjana vat saṃkliṣṭaḥ na vartate
na śrāvaka ādi vat nirupādānaḥ nirvāṇe iti

original: tathāgatāvasthāyām api kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇān na saṃsāre pratiṣṭhitaḥ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇe naiva pratiṣṭhito dharmakāyasyānucchedāt sāmbhogikanairmāṇikakāyay yorval lokas tāvat parārthakaraṇāt /
analyzed: tathāgata avasthāyām api kleśa jñeya āvaraṇa prahāṇāt na saṃsāre pratiṣṭhitaḥ nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇe na eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ dharmakāyasya anucchedāt sāmbhogika nairmāṇika kāyaḥ lokaḥ tāvat parārtha karaṇāt

original: evam eṣā pratipakṣabhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakādibhya ālambanamanaskāraphalaviśeṣair viśiṣṭeti uktā pratipakṣabhāvanā //
analyzed: evam eṣā pratipakṣa bhāvanā bodhisattvānām śrāvaka ādibhyaḥ ālambana manaskāra phala viśeṣaiḥ viśiṣṭā iti uktā pratipakṣa bhāvanā

original: { tatrā'vasthā }  pratipakṣabhāvanānantaraṃ tatrāvasthoktetyataḥ pṛcchati  tatrā'vasthā katameti /
analyzed: tatra avasthā   pratipakṣa bhāvanā anantaram tatra avasthā uktā iti atas pṛcchati tatra avasthā katamā iti
tatra iti tasyām pratipakṣa bhāvanāyām
atas āha hetu avasthā avatāra ākhyā iti vistaraḥ
tatra hetu avasthā gotra sthasya pudgalasya iti
gotram hetuḥ bījam iti arthaḥ

original: tatra yo gotra eva vartate na cittotpādādiṣu sa gotrastha ihābhipretaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ gotre eva vartate na citta utpāda ādiṣu sa gotrasthaḥ iha abhipretaḥ

original: sa punar uttarāvasthāsv anuvartate na nivartate /
analyzed: sa punar uttara avasthāsu anuvartate na nivartate

original: kecit tacca gotraṃ kuśalamūlasvabhāvam iti varṇayanti /
analyzed: kecid tat ca gotram kuśala mūla svabhāvam iti varṇayanti

original: kuśalamūlānyeva hi kānicic chrāvakagotram ity ucyante /
analyzed: kuśala mūlāni eva hi kānicid śrāvaka gotram iti ucyante
evam yāvat kānicid bodhisattva gotram iti
pṛthagjana avasthām ārabhya indriya bhedaḥ gotram ucyate
citta bīja śaktiḥ gotram iti etat api eke āhuḥ

original: tasmin sati pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāñca śrāvakagotra ityucyate yāvad bodhisattvagotra iti /
analyzed: tasmin sati pṛthagjana avasthāyām śaikṣa avasthāyām ca śrāvaka gotraḥ iti ucyate yāvat bodhisattva gotraḥ iti

original: aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ tu śrāvaka ity ucyate pratyekabuddha iti vā /
analyzed: aśaikṣa avasthāyām tu śrāvakaḥ iti ucyate pratyekabuddhaḥ iti vā
na tat gotram tasya prakarṣa avasthānāt
tat ca śrāvaka ādi bhedena tridhā bhidyate
niyata aniyata prabhedena ṣaḍvidham bhavati
avatāra avasthā utpādita bodhi cittasya iti

original: sā ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhatathāgatagotrāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksambuddhabodhiṣu cittotpādāt trividhā bhavati /
analyzed: sā ca śrāvaka pratyekabuddha tathāgata gotrāṇām yathākramam śrāvaka pratyekabuddha samyaksambuddha bodhiṣu citta utpādāt trividhā bhavati

original: tasya prayogamūlabhūtatvāt tasminn utpanne prayogāvatāra iti tad utpādaḥ prayogāvatārāvasthety ucyate /
analyzed: tasya prayoga mūla bhūta tvāt tasmin utpanne prayoga avatāraḥ iti tat utpādaḥ prayoga avatāra avasthā iti ucyate
prayoga avasthā citta utpādāt ūrdhvam aprāpte phale iti

original: utpāditabodhicittasya dānaśīlādiko balabhāvanāparyavasānakuśalasamārambhaḥ prathamaphalaprāpaka upāya iti sa prayoga ucyate /
analyzed: utpādita bodhi cittasya dāna śīla ādikaḥ bala bhāvanā paryavasāna kuśala samārambhaḥ prathama phala prāpakaḥ upāyaḥ iti sa prayogaḥ ucyate
katham hetu avatāra avasthā bodhi pakṣa bhāvanā avasthā iti ucyate tad hetu tvāt

original: ata evoktaṃ  uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpāda ityevam ādi /
analyzed: atas eva uktam uttara uttara phalam gotrāt citta utpādaḥ iti evam ādi
phala avasthā prāpte prathama phale
phala artham hi prayujyate
atas prayoga anantaram phala avasthā
sa karaṇīya avasthā hi śaikṣasya
tasya phalānām a parisamāpta tvāt phala anantara prāpti pratikaraṇīya sadbhāvāt
a karaṇīya avasthā a śaikṣasya iti
aśaikṣaḥ hi tri dhātuka vīta rāgāt
tasya phalānām parisamāpta tvāt phala antara prāpti karaṇīya asadbhāvāt akaraṇīya avasthā
viśeṣa avasthā abhijñā ādi guṇa viśeṣa samanvāgatasya iti

original: samāne'rthattve'bhijñādibhir guṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgata itarasmād viśiṣṭā'bhijñādiguṇaviśeṣaniṣpannāvasthā viśeṣāvasthetyucyate /
analyzed: samāne arthattve abhijñā ādibhiḥ guṇa viśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ itarasmāt viśiṣṭā abhijñā ādi guṇa viśeṣa niṣpanna avasthā viśeṣa avasthā iti ucyate
uttarā avasthā śrāvaka pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ bhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisattvasya

original: svaparārthakārikasya lokottarasya mārgasyobhayanairātmyaprativedhasya lābhena tadanyayānottarabhūtāt tadvasthottarāvasthetyucyate /
analyzed: sva para artha kārikasya lokottarasya mārgasya ubhaya nairātmya prativedhasya lābhena tad anya yāna uttara bhūtāt tad vasthā uttara avasthā iti ucyate
anuttarā avasthā buddhasya

original: kim arthaṃ ? ata āha  tata ūrdhvam avasthā'bhāvād iti /
analyzed: kim artham atas āha tatas ūrdhvam avasthā abhāvāt iti

original: sarvaguṇadoṣaprakarṣaniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānatvād buddhasya tata ūrdhvamanyā viśiṣṭāvasthā na vidyata iti saivānuttaretyucyate /
analyzed: sarva guṇa doṣa prakarṣa niṣṭhā adhiṣṭhāna tvāt buddhasya tatas ūrdhvam anyā viśiṣṭa avasthā na vidyate iti sā eva anuttarā iti ucyate

original: iyaduktaṃ parisamāptāpi niravaśeṣāvasthā bodhisattvānām ekādaśabhūmiprabhedasandarśanārtham adhimukticartyādyavasthābhiṣekādhya vastāvasānāḥ punar uktā /
analyzed: iyat uktam parisamāptā api niravaśeṣa avasthā bodhisattvānām ekādaśa bhūmi prabheda sandarśana artham punar uktā

original: buddhānāṃ tu kāyatrayaprabhedapradarśanārthaṃ prāptyavasthādikāḥ punas tisro nirdiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: buddhānām tu kāya traya prabheda pradarśana artham prāpti avasthā ādikāḥ punar tisraḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ
tatra hetu avatāra avasthā bodhisattva itara sādhāraṇā veditavyā
tatra a adhimukti avasthā bodhisattvānām sarvasyām adhimukti caryā bhūmau iti

original: cittotpādād ūrdhvaṃ yāvan na bhūmipraveśo'trāntare'dṛṣṭatattvo'pi dṛṣṭatattvaṃ iva  buddhabodhisattveṣvadhimuktyā svabhāvatrayamukhena dharmān pratipadyate /
analyzed: citta utpādāt ūrdhvam yāvat na bhūmi praveśaḥ atra antare adṛṣṭa tattvaḥ api dṛṣṭa tattvam iva buddha bodhisattveṣu adhimuktyā svabhāva traya mukhena dharmān pratipadyate

original: tadanyasattvānāṃ duṣkaradānaśīlādiṣu buddhatvaniṣpādasambhāreṣu pravartata ityata iyam avasthādhimuktiprabhāvitattvād adhimukticaryetyucyate /
analyzed: tad anya sattvānām duṣkara dāna śīla ādiṣu buddhatva niṣpāda sambhāreṣu pravartate iti atas iyam avasthā adhimukti prabhāvi tattvāt adhimukti caryā iti ucyate
sā ca kalpa asaṃkhyeyam adhikam vā
praveśa avasthā prathamāyām bhūmau iti

original: svabhāvatrayasyāvikalpena jñānena tatprathamata eva tattvasvasamvedanaprativedha iti praveśāvasthocyate /
analyzed: svabhāva trayasya avikalpena jñānena tat prathamatas eva tattva sva samvedana prativedhaḥ iti praveśa avasthā ucyate

original: eṣaiva bodhisattvasya darśanamārgaḥ niryāṇāvasthā tad uttarāsu ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu iti /
analyzed: eṣā eva bodhisattvasya darśana mārgaḥ niryāṇa avasthā tat uttarāsu ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu iti

original: bhāvanāprahātavyasya nimittanānātvābhiniveśasya prahāṇaniṣṭāgamanāt sābhogaprayoganiṣṭhāgamanāc caitā bhūmayo niryāṇāvasthety ucyate /
analyzed: bhāvanā prahātavyasya nimitta nānātva abhiniveśasya prahāṇa niṣṭā gamanāt sa ābhoga prayoga niṣṭhā gamanāt ca etāḥ bhūmayaḥ niryāṇa avasthā iti ucyate
vyākaraṇa avasthā aṣṭamyām bhūmau iti

original: sarvathā sarvanimittābhogasaṃjñāvigamād aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau niyatipatito bhavati buddhatva iti buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ sammukhavyākaraṇena vyākriyate /
analyzed: sarvathā sarva nimitta ābhoga saṃjñā vigamāt aṣṭamyām bhūmau niyati patitaḥ bhavati buddha tve iti buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ sammukha vyākaraṇena vyākriyate
kathaka tva avasthā navamyām iti

original: navamyāṃ bhūmau śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭāścatasraḥ pratisamvidaḥ pratilabhata ity anuttaro mahādhārmakathiko bhavati /
analyzed: navamyām bhūmau śrāvaka pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭāḥ catasraḥ pratisamvidaḥ pratilabhate iti anuttaraḥ mahā dhārma kathikaḥ bhavati
abhiṣeka avasthā daśamyām bhūmau iti

original: daśamyāṃ hi bhūmau bodhisatto mārganiṣṭhāgato daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ raśmīṇām abhiṣekeṇābhiṣicyate /
analyzed: daśamyām hi bhūmau bodhisattaḥ mārga niṣṭhā gataḥ daśa diś lokadhātu vyavasthitānām buddhānām bhagavatām raśmīṇām abhiṣekeṇa abhiṣicyate
prāpti avasthā buddhānām dharmakāyaḥ iti

original: sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇāt tat pratipakṣānāsravadharmabījapracayāc cāśrayaparāvṛttyātmakaḥ sarvadharmavartyānālaya iti buddhānāṃ dharmakāyāḥ /
analyzed: sarva āvaraṇa prahāṇāt tat pratipakṣa anāsrava dharma bīja pracayāt ca āśraya parāvṛtti ātmakaḥ sarva dharma varti anālayaḥ iti buddhānām dharmakāyāḥ
tena dharma prativedha niṣṭhā adhigamanāt prāpti avasthā iti ucyate

original: anye tu niḥśeṣāgantukamalāpagamāt suviśuddho dharmadhātur eva dharmatākāyo dharmakāya iti varṇayanti /
analyzed: anye tu niḥśeṣa āgantu kamala apagamāt su viśuddhaḥ dharmadhātuḥ eva dharmatā kāyaḥ dharmakāyaḥ iti varṇayanti

original: sarvasminn api jñeye'saktāpratihatapravṛttiviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ dharmakāya ityapare /
analyzed: sarvasmin api jñeye asakta apratihata pravṛtti viśiṣṭam jñānam dharmakāyaḥ iti apare
anuśaṃsā avasthā sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ iti

original: svābhāviko yasmin kāye vyavasthite'bhisambudhyate yena kāyena niṣṭhāgatair bodhisattvaiḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍalena dharmasaṃgītim anubhavati sa sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ /
analyzed: svābhāvikaḥ yasmin kāye vyavasthite abhisambudhyate yena kāyena niṣṭhā gataiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ saha parṣad maṇḍalena dharma saṃgītim anubhavati sa sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ
kṛti anuṣṭhāna avasthā nirmāṇakāyaḥ iti

original: svābhāvikakāyāśritaḥ sattvāśayālocano vineyārthaṃ prakriyāpravṛttāvanantaprabhedo nairmāṇikaḥ kāyaḥ /
analyzed: svābhāvika kāya āśritaḥ sattva āśaya ālocanaḥ vineya artham prakriyā pravṛttau ananta prabhedaḥ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyaḥ

original: sarvāpyeṣā bahuvidhā'vasthā'bhisamasya veditavyā  dharmadhātau tridhā punaḥ //
analyzed: sarvā api eṣā bahuvidhā avasthā abhisamasya veditavyā dharmadhātau tridhā punar
iti

original: katham ityata āha  aśuddhaśuddhaśuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ /
analyzed: katham iti atas āha aśuddha śuddha śuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ
iti

original: tatrāśuddhāvasthā hetvavasthām upādāya yāvat prayogād iti  hetvavatāraprayogādhimuktyavasthā gṛhyante /
analyzed: tatra aśuddha avasthā hetu avasthām upādāya yāvat prayogāt iti hetu avatāra prayoga adhimukti avasthāḥ gṛhyante
āsu avasthāsu dharmadhātoḥ aprahīṇa niravaśeṣa mala tvāt aśuddhāvasthā iti ucyate
aśuddha śuddha avasthā śaikṣāṇām iti
atra ca phala sakaraṇīya viśeṣa uttara praveśa niryāṇa vyākaraṇa kathika abhiṣeka avasthāḥ gṛhyante
etāsu api avasthāsu dharma adhātoḥ prahīṇa aprahīṇa kleśa tām upādāya aśuddha śuddha avasthā iti ucyate
viśuddha avasthā aśaikṣāṇām iti akaraṇīya viśeṣa anuttara prāpti anuśaṃsa ākṛtyā anuṣṭhāna avasthā viśuddha avasthā iti ucyate aśaikṣāṇām niravaśeṣa kleśa prahāṇāt
etāḥ ca avasthāḥ pṛthagjana śaikṣāṇām vyavasthāpyante

original: teṣāṃ ca bahudhā vyavasthānaṃ kathaṃ vijñāpanīyam ityata āha  pudgalāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ yathāyogamato mataṃ /
analyzed: teṣām ca bahudhā vyavasthānam katham vijñāpanīyam iti atas āha pudgalāṇām vyavasthānam yathāyogam atas matam
iti
yathāyogam iti yathāsambhavam
atas iti atas avasthā prabhedāt iti arthaḥ
ayam gotra sthaḥ ayam avatīrṇaḥ iti evam ādi

original: āditagrahaṇād ayaṃ prayuktaḥ  srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan sālankāraḥ bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataḥ adhimukticārī śuddhyādhyāśayacārī niryāyī vyākṛtaḥ dhārmikathikaḥ abhiṣiktaḥ bodhiprāptaḥ bhogī parārthakṛd iti /
analyzed: ādita grahaṇāt ayam prayuktaḥ srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan sa alankāraḥ bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataḥ adhimukti cārī śuddhyā adhyāśaya cārī niryāyī vyākṛtaḥ dhārmi kathikaḥ abhiṣiktaḥ bodhi prāptaḥ bhogī para artha kṛt iti
uktāḥ avasthāḥ

original: { phalaprāptiḥ }  avasthāyāḥ phalapūrvakatvād avasthānantaraṃ phalabhāṣaṇārthaṃ pṛcchati phalaprāptiḥ katametyata āha  bhājanatvaṃ vipākākhyaṃ iti vistaraḥ /
tadidaṃ samāsena pañcavidhaṃ phalaṃ  bhājanatvaṃ balaṃ rucir vṛddhir viśuddhiśceti /
analyzed: tat idam samāsena pañcavidham phalam bhājana tvam balam ruciḥ vṛddhiḥ viśuddhiḥ ca iti

original: tatra bhājanatvaṃ yaḥ kuśalānukūlo vipāka iti /
analyzed: tatra bhājana tvam yaḥ kuśala anukūlaḥ vipākaḥ iti

original: sa punar aṣṭākṣaṇaprahāṇaḥ sāsravaviśiṣṭaṣaḍāyatano bodhipakṣadharmavipākaḥ sarvakuśaladharmotpattyāśrayatvād bhājanam ucyate /
analyzed: sa punar aṣṭa akṣaṇa prahāṇaḥ sa āsrava viśiṣṭa ṣaṣ āyatanaḥ bodhi pakṣa dharma vipākaḥ sarva kuśala dharma utpatti āśraya tvāt bhājanam ucyate
balam yāḥ bhājana tva ādhipatyāt iti
āśraya kleśa upapattim andha tām upādāya kuśala mūlasya adhimātra tā pṛṣṭa tā iti arthaḥ
idam ucyate balam

original: ruciryā pūrvābhyāsāt kuśale rucir ityatīteṣu janmasu kuśaladharmābhyāsād vartamāne janmani kuśaladharmābhiprāyo nadīsrotonyāyena sā ruciḥ /
analyzed: ruciḥ yā pūrva abhyāsāt kuśale ruciḥ iti atīteṣu janmasu kuśala dharma abhyāsāt vartamāne janmani kuśala dharma abhiprāyaḥ nadī srotaḥ nyāyena sā ruciḥ

original: vṛddhiryā pratyutpannakuśalamūla dharmābhyāsād apūrvaviśiṣṭakuśaladharmotpattiḥ kuśalamūlaparipuṣṭir ityabhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ yā dharma abhyāsāt apūrva viśiṣṭa kuśala dharma utpattiḥ kuśala mūla paripuṣṭiḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: trayaṃ balavṛddhyor viśeṣaḥ balaṃ hi mandakuśalavipākāpekṣyaṃ dārḍhyaṃ vṛddhiḥ punaḥ kuśalasyottarottaraviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: trayam bala vṛddhyoḥ viśeṣaḥ balam hi manda kuśala vipāka apekṣyam dārḍhyam vṛddhiḥ punar kuśalasya uttarottara viśeṣaḥ

original: anye punaḥ kuśalamūlapuṣṭir iti viśiṣṭakuśaladharmavāsanāpuṣṭir ihābhipreteti manyante /
analyzed: anye punar kuśala mūla puṣṭiḥ iti viśiṣṭa kuśala dharma vāsanā puṣṭiḥ iha abhipretā iti manyante
viśūddhiḥ yat āvaraṇa prahāṇam iti
tatra śrāvaka buddha gotrāṇām kleśa āvaraṇa prahāṇam viśuddhiḥ
sambuddha gotrāṇām kleśa jñeya āvaraṇa prahāṇam viśuddhiḥ
etat yathārkamam pañcavidham phalam iti
vipāka phalam yaḥ kuśala dharma anukūlaḥ vipākaḥ
adhipati phalam yā bhājana tva ādhipatyāt kuśalasya adhimātra tā
nisyanda phalam yā pūrva abhyāsāt kuśale ruciḥ
puruṣakāra phalam yā pratyutpanna kuśala dharma abhyāsāt kuśala mūla puṣṭiḥ
visaṃyoga phalam yat āvaraṇa prahāṇam

original: asyaiva pañcavidhasya phalasya samāsoktasya prabhedaḥ samāsena nirdiṣṭaḥ  uttarottaram ādyañca iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: asya eva pañcavidhasya phalasya samāsa uktasya prabhedaḥ samāsena nirdiṣṭaḥ uttara uttaram iti vistaraḥ

original: uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpādaścittotpādāt prayoga ityevamādi yathoktayā'vasthāparamparayā veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: uttara uttara phalam gotrāt citta utpādaḥ citta utpādāt prayogaḥ iti evamādi yathā uktayā avasthā paramparayā veditavyam
ādi phalam prathamatas lokottara dharma pratilambhaḥ iti darśana mārga prāptiḥ
abhyāsa phalam pareṇa śaikṣa avasthāyām iti

original: darśanamārgāt pareṇa śikṣāvasthāyāṃ pañcapudgalaprabhāvitāyāṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalañca saprayogapṛṣṭhabhāvanāmārgātmakatvād abhyāsaphalaṃ /
analyzed: darśana mārgāt pareṇa śikṣā avasthāyām pañca pudgala prabhāvitāyām sakṛdāgāmi phalam anāgāmi phalam ca sa prayoga pṛṣṭha bhāvanā mārga ātmaka tvāt abhyāsa phalam
samāpti pahlam aśaikṣāḥ dharmāḥ iti

original: te punaḥ samyag dṛṣṭisankalpavākkarmāntājīvavyāyāmasmṛtisamādhivimuktivimuktijñānadarśanākhyāḥ sarvaphalaparyantāvasthitatvāt samāptiphalam ity ucyate /
analyzed: te punar samyak sarva phala paryanta avasthita tvāt samāpti phalam iti ucyate
ānukṛtya phalam upaniṣad bhāvena uttarottara phalam eva veditavyam iti
upaniṣad bhāvaḥ hetuḥ

original: tatra cittotpādo gotrānukūlatvāc cittotpādaḥ phalam iti /
analyzed: tatra citta utpādaḥ gotra anukūla tvāt citta utpādaḥ phalam iti

original: uttarottaraphalādīnām ānukūlyaphalādīnāñca pṛthag upadeśo yathākramam uddeśanirdeśato veditavya iti /
analyzed: uttara uttara phala ādīnām ānukūlya phala ādīnām ca pṛthak upadeśaḥ yathākramam uddeśa nirdeśataḥ veditavyaḥ iti
vipakṣa phalam prahāṇa mārgaḥ yat eva ādi phalam

original: vipakṣa eva phalam iti vipakṣaphalaṃ prahāṇamārgo yena kleśebhyo visaṃyujyate /
analyzed: vipakṣaḥ eva phalam iti vipakṣa phalam prahāṇa mārgaḥ yena kleśebhyaḥ visaṃyujyate

original: ādiphalaṃ yat pūrvam uktaṃ prathamato lokottaradharmapratilambha iti /
analyzed: ādi phalam yat pūrvam uktam prathamatas lokottara dharma pratilambhaḥ iti

original: vipakṣaśabdo yadyapi pratipakṣavibandhanārthenāvaraṇam ucyate atra tu vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣo'bhipreta iti āvaraṇanirvāsapakṣo vipakṣa iti vigrahāt /
analyzed: vipakṣa śabdaḥ yadi api pratipakṣa vibandhana arthena āvaraṇam ucyate atra tu vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ abhipretaḥ iti āvaraṇa nirvāsa pakṣaḥ vipakṣaḥ iti vigrahāt

original: visaṃyogaphalam abhyāsaphalaṃ samāptiphalaṃ ca kleśavisaṃyogaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ yathākramam iti /
analyzed: visaṃyoga phalam abhyāsa phalam samāpti phalam ca kleśa visaṃyogaḥ śaikṣa aśaikṣāṇām yathākramam iti

original: abhyāsaphalaṃ visaṃyogaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ śiṣṭakleśatvāt /
analyzed: abhyāsa phalam visaṃyogaḥ sakṛdāgāmi phala pratipanna ādīnām pañcānām śaikṣāṇām śiṣṭa kleśa tvāt
samāpti phalam visaṃyogaḥ
aśaikṣāṇām parihāṇi dharma ādīnām ṣaṇṇām api traidhātuka aśeṣa kleśa prahīṇa tvāt
pūrvam bhedena uktam idānīm abhedena iti viśeṣaḥ
viśeṣa phalam abhijñā ādikaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ iti
etat api abhyāsa samāpti phala viśeṣaḥ eva veditavyam

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānāñca vaiśeṣikaguṇalābhasya vivakṣitatvāt /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam anāgāminām arhatām pratyekabuddhānām bodhisattvānām tathāgatānām ca vaiśeṣika guṇa lābhasya vivakṣita tvāt
uttara phalam bodhisattva bhūmayaḥ

original: atra kāraṇam āha  tad anyayā nottaratvād iti /
analyzed: atra kāraṇam āha tat anyayā na uttara tvāt iti

original: bodhisattvabhūmayo hi yadyapi darśanabhāvanāmārgātmakatvād ādiphalam abhyāsaphalañca tathāpi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāpekṣayā bodhisattvabhūmīnām uttaraphalatvaṃ nirvikalpatvād buddhagotrakatvān mahābodhiphalatvāc ca veditavyaṃ /
analyzed: bodhisattva bhūmayaḥ hi yadi api darśana bhāvanā mārga ātmaka tvāt ādi phalam abhyāsa phalam ca tathā api śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yāna apekṣayā bodhisattva bhūmīnām uttara phala tvam nirvikalpa tvāt buddha gotraka tvāt mahā bodhi phala tvāt ca veditavyam
anuttara phalam buddha bhūmiḥ iti

original: etad api samāptiphalam eva yataḥ sarvasavāsanākleśopakleśaprahāṇād akliṣṭājñānaprahāṇāc ca tad uttarabhūmyantarābhāvād anuttaraphalam ity ucyate /
analyzed: etat api samāpti phalam eva yatas sarva sa vāsanā kleśa upakleśa prahāṇāt akliṣṭa ajñāna prahāṇāt ca tat uttara bhūmi antara abhāvāt anuttara phalam iti ucyate

original: etad anyat phalaṃ samāsanirdeśataḥ vyāsatastvaparimāṇam iti /
analyzed: etat anyat phalam samāsa nirdeśataḥ vyāsataḥ tu aparimāṇam iti
vyāsataḥ śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bodhisattva sambuddha phalāni pratipādyamānāni aparimāṇāni bhavanti iti
vyutpatti bhāvanā smṛti upasthāna bhāvanā catur ārya satya vyutpatti tvāt
nirlekha bhāvanā samyak prahāṇa bhāvanā akuśala dharmāṇām nirlekhāt
parikarma bhāvanā ṛddhipāda bhāvanā tatra samādhi parikarma karaṇāt pañca doṣa prahāṇāya aṣṭa prahāṇa saṃskāra asevanāt
uttara samārambha bhāvanā indriya bhāvanā tasya vimokṣa bhāgīya kuśala mūla utpādaka tvāt
śliṣṭa bhāvanā bala a abala bhāvanā darśana mārga śleṣāt

original: praviṣṭabhāvanā bodhyangabhāvanā tatra tattvapraveśāt lokottaradharmapraveśādāryabhūmipraveśād vā /
analyzed: praviṣṭa bhāvanā bodhi anga bhāvanā tatra tattva praveśāt lokottara dharma praveśāt ārya bhūmi praveśāt vā

original: utkṛṣṭabhāvanā mārgabhāvanā darśanamārgād bhāvanāmārgasyotkṛṣṭatvāt /ādibhāvanā pṛthagjanāvasthāyām anukūlāviparyastā vā /
analyzed: utkṛṣṭa bhāvanā mārga bhāvanā darśana mārgāt bhāvanā mārgasya utkṛṣṭa tvāt ādi bhāvanā pṛthagjana avasthāyām anukūlā aviparyastā vā

original: madhyabhāvanā śaikṣyāvasthāyām aviparyastā viparyāsasānubandhā vā paryavasānabhāvanā'śaikṣāvasthāyām aviparyastā viparyāsaniranubandhā/
analyzed: madhya bhāvanā śaikṣya avasthāyām aviparyastā viparyāsa sa anubandhā vā paryavasāna bhāvanā aśaikṣa avasthāyām aviparyastā viparyāsa niranubandhā
sa uttarā bhāvanā śrāvaka ādīnām

original: niruttarā ca bhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ yā ālambanamanaskāraprāptiviśiṣṭeti /
analyzed: niruttarā ca bhāvanā bodhisattvānām yā ālambana manaskāra prāpti viśiṣṭā iti
avasitaḥ bhāvanāyāḥ piṇḍa arthaḥ
avasthānām piṇḍa arthaḥ avasthānām piṇḍa arthaḥ
bhavyatā avasthā hetu avasthā
ārambha avasthā saha citta utpādena prayogāt

original: aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā dve avasthe phalāvasthā sakaraṇīyāvasthā ca /

viśuddha avasthā a karaṇīya avasthā

original: anuttarāvasthā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tad uttarāvasthāntarābhāvāt /

original: sā ca prāptyavasthā anuśaṃsāvasthā kṛtyānuṣṭhānāvasthā ca yāḥ pūrvam uktāḥ //

original: { phalānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ } phalānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saṃgrahatas tadviśeṣataḥ pūrvābhyāsataḥ uttarottaranirhārata uddeśato nirdeśataśceti /
analyzed: phalānām piṇḍa arthaḥ phalānām piṇḍa arthaḥ saṃgrahataḥ tad viśeṣataḥ pūrva abhyāsataḥ uttara uttara nirhārataḥ uddeśataḥ nirdeśataḥ ca iti
eṣām bhāṣyakāraḥ eva vyākhyām karoti

original: tatra saṃgrahato vipākaphalādīni pañca phalāni teṣu sarvaphalasaṃgṛhītatvāt /

original: teṣām eva pañcānāṃ prabhedaḥ śeṣāṇy uttarottaraphalāni veditavyāni /
analyzed: teṣām eva pañcānām prabhedaḥ śeṣāṇi uttara uttara phalāni veditavyāni

original: pūrvajanmopacitāt kuśalāt pratyutpannajanmani vipākaḥ kuśalānukūlotpattir ityata uktaṃ pūrvābhyāsata iti /

uttara uttara nirhārataḥ tat anyāni catvāri iti
adhipati phalam nisyanda phalam puruṣakāra phalam visaṃyoga phalam ca
tatra vipāka nirhṛtam balam
bala nirhṛtā ruciḥ
ruchi nirhṛtā vṛddhiḥ

original: kecid āhuḥ  uttarottarākhyānaprabhāvitātvād uttarottaranirhṛtatvam ity ucyate /
analyzed: kecid āhuḥ uttara uttara ākhyāna prabhāvitā tvāt uttara uttara nirhṛta tvam iti ucyate

teṣām eva caturṇām nirdeśāt iti

original: tatrānukūlyaphalam uttarottaraphalasya nirdeśaḥ vipakṣaphalam ādiphalasya nirdeśaḥ visaṃyogaphalam abhyāsaphalasya samāptiphalasya ca nirdeśaḥ viśeṣaphalam uttaraphalam anuttaraphalañca samāptiphalasyaiva nirdeśaḥ tatraiva sālankārasya vivakṣitatvāt /
analyzed: tatra ānukūlya phalam uttarottara phalasya nirdeśaḥ vipakṣa phalam ādi phalasya nirdeśaḥ visaṃyoga phalam abhyāsa phalasya samāpti phalasya ca nirdeśaḥ viśeṣa phalam uttara phalam anuttara phalam ca samāpti phalasya eva nirdeśaḥ tatra eva sa alankārasya vivakṣita tvāt

original: anye tvāhuḥ  viśeṣaphalam abhyāsasamāptiphalayor eva nirdeśo'nāgāmino'pyabhijñādiguṇasaṃbhavāt /

original: āgamānusāriṇyāṃ madhyāntavibhāgaṭīkāyām āryasthiramatyparac itāyāṃ phala{nirdeśo}nāma caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
analyzed: āgama anusāriṇyām madhya anta vibhāga ṭīkāyām itāyām phalanirdeśaḥ nāma caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ

original: %yānā''nuttaryaparicchedaḥ pañcamaḥ  { trividhā''nuttaryaṃ }  lakṣaṇāvaraṇādiṣaṭpadārthoddeśānantaraṃ yānānuttaryam uddiṣṭam atas tannirdeśāt paraṃ yānānuttaryanirdeśaḥ prakṛtaḥ /

analyzed: atas āha yāna ānuttaryam idānīm vaktavyam
tat ucyate iti

original: idānīm iti lakṣaṇādiṣaṭkanirdeśānantaram ityarthaḥ tad anantaram uddiṣṭatvād ityabhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm iti lakṣaṇa ādi ṣaṭka nirdeśa anantaram iti arthaḥ tat anantaram uddiṣṭa tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: atha vā pratipaksabhāvanāvasthāphalaprāptayaḥ śrāvakādīnāṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sādhāraṇā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: atha vā pratipak sa bhāvanā avasthā phala prāptayaḥ śrāvaka ādīnām bodhisattvaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ

original: asādhāraṇaprasangena yānānuttaryantu bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakādibhir asādhāraṇam iha ca prādhānyenocyata iti pradarśayann āha  yānānuttaryam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ tad ucyata iti /

na asmāt uttaram asti iti ānuttarya śabdaḥ viśiṣṭa tva prayāyaḥ
kim punar etat mahāyānam
tathā hi śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yānābhyām mahāyānam viśiṣṭam
na eva mahāyānāt anyat viśiṣṭataram asti
tatra hetu phalayoḥ taratama bhedāt
anuttarasya bhāvaḥ ānuttaryam

original: kiṃ punas tad ityata āha  ānuttarya prapattau hi /

iti vistaraḥ
trividham ānuttaryam mahāyāne iti

original: kiṃ punas tan mahāyānaṃ ? etad eva tṛtayaṃ pratipattir ālambanaṃ samudāgamaś ca /
analyzed: kim punar tat mahāyānam etat eva tṛtayam pratipattiḥ ālambanam samudāgamaḥ ca

original: ālambanasya punaḥ pāramitādayo dharmā dharmadhātuś ca /
analyzed: ālambanasya punar pāramitā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ dharmadhātuḥ ca

original: anena hy ālambanena bodhisattvānām aśeṣaparārthakaraṇasamarthā bhavantītyataḥ parārthakaraṇasāmarthyahetutvam ālambanānuttaryaṃ /
analyzed: anena hi ālambanena bodhisattvānām aśeṣa para artha karaṇa samarthāḥ bhavanti iti atas para artha karaṇa sāmarthya hetu tvam ālambana ānuttaryam

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? tadvattvāt tad ālambanaṃ bodhisattvānām anuttaryam ucyate /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam tadvat tvāt tat ālambanam bodhisattvānām anuttaryam ucyate
samudāgamaḥ phalam
samudāgacchanti prāpnuvanti gotra ādibhyaḥ tat iti samudāgamaḥ

original: sa ca tato'nyaviśiṣṭasamudāgamābhāvād anuttara ity ucyate /
analyzed: sa ca tatas anya viśiṣṭa samudāgama abhāvāt anuttaraḥ iti ucyate

original: atra punaḥ pratipattir bodhisattvānāṃ sādhāra saphalā ca mahāyānam ityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atra punar pratipattiḥ bodhisattvānām sādhāra sa phalā ca mahāyānam iti uktam bhavati

original: etac ca trividhenānuttaryeṇānantarokte nānuttaryam ity ucyate /
analyzed: etat ca trividhena ānuttaryeṇa anantara ukte na ānuttaryam iti ucyate

original: atha vā mahāyānaṃ sarvavikalpaprapañcavigataṃ jñānaṃ sasamprayogaṃ sasambhāraṃ saprayogaṃ sapṛṣṭhalabdhajñānaṃ saviśiṣṭaguṇaṃ sāalambanaṃ saphalañca /
analyzed: atha vā mahāyānam sarva vikalpa prapañca vigatam jñānam sa samprayogam sa sambhāram sa prayogam sa pṛṣṭha labdha jñānam sa viśiṣṭa guṇam sa ālambanam sa phalam ca
tatra ālambanam tathatā
phalam a pratiṣṭhitam nirvāṇam iti

original: asya ca mahāyānasyābhidhāyikā yā sūtrādideśanāpi mahāyānaṃ bhavantīti grantho'pyadhikāra ivopacaryate /
analyzed: asya ca mahāyānasya abhidhāyikā yā sūtra ādi deśanā api mahāyānam bhavanti iti granthaḥ api adhikāraḥ iva upacaryate
yathā kaṃsa vadhāḥ maṇi haraṇañca
tat ca saptavidha mahat tva yogāt mahat
yānti anena prāpnuvanti apratiṣṭhitam nirvāṇam iti yānam
saptavidham punar mahattvam ālambana pratipatti jñāna vīrya upāya prāpti karma mahattvam
tatra ālambana mahattvam śatasāhasrika ādi ananta sūtra dharma ālambanāt bodhisattva mārgasya
jñāna mahat tvam pudgala dharma nairātmya jñānāt
vīrya mahat tvam triṣu kalpa saṃkhyeyeṣu aneka duṣkara śata sahasra prayogāt
upāya kauśalya mahattvam saṃsāra nirvāṇa pratiṣṭhānāt
prāpti mahat tvam bala vaiśāradya āveṇika auddha dharma ādi prameya saṃkhyeya guṇa adhigamāt
karma mahattvam yāvat saṃsāraḥ tāvat bodhi abhisandarśanena buddha kārya anuṣṭhānāt

original: etad eva mahāyānam anuttaraṃ tad anyasya viśiṣṭayānasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: etat eva mahāyānam anuttaram tat anyasya viśiṣṭa yānasya abhāvāt

tathā hi tad yogāt mahāyānam anuttaram ucyate
pratipattiḥ eva ānuttaryam pratipatti ānuttaryam
evam ālambana ānuttaryam samudāgama ānuttaryañca veditavyam

original: etad ānuttaryaṃ yathākramaṃ bodhisattvamārgaṃ tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tat phalañcādhikṛtya vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: etat ānuttaryam yathākramam bodhisattva mārgam tat adhiṣṭhānam tat phalam ca adhikṛtya vyavasthāpyate

original: etāvac ca buddhavacanenocyate  yaduta pratipattir ālambanaṃ tat phalañceti //
analyzed: etāvat ca buddha vacanena ucyate yat uta pratipattiḥ ālambanam tat phalam ca iti

original: { pratipattyānuttaryaṃ } ālambanapūrvikā pratipattir ityālambanapūrvanirdeśanayena pratipattiḥ pūrvam uktā bodhisattvānāṃ pratipattisāratāsandarśanārthaṃ /

original: nairantarya paramatā ātmaparasamatādhimokṣāt sarvasattvadānādibhiḥ pāramitā paripūraṇād iti /

analyzed: tasyāḥ ca karma samyak avavāda dānam kleśa prahāṇam ca a viparīta anuśāsana pratibaddham atas prajñayā samyak avavāda dānāt vimocayati
upāya kauśalya pāramitayā mahā bodhi pariṇāmanāt dāna ādīn akṣayān karoti

original: yasya dharmasya niṣpattaye vivṛddhaye prāptaye prahāṇāya vā yā yuktiḥ sa tatropāyas tatra kauśalyaṃ vaicakṣaṇyam upāyakauśalyaṃ /
analyzed: yasya dharmasya niṣpattaye vivṛddhaye prāptaye prahāṇāya vā yā yuktiḥ sa tatra upāyaḥ tatra kauśalyam vaicakṣaṇyam upāya kauśalyam
tasya dāna ādīnām maha bodhi pariṇāmanayā akṣaya kāraṇām
mahā bodhi pariṇāmanayā kuśala mūlāni mahā bodhi vat akṣayāni bhavanti iti
praṇidhāna pāramitayā anukūla upapatti parigrahāt sarva janmasu buddha utpāda ārāgaṇataḥ dāna ādiṣu sadā pravartate
praṇidhānam anekavidham prārthanā ātmaka tvāt

original: kuśalānukūlopapattiprārthanam atra praṇidhānam abhipretaṃ tasya janmani janmani buddhotpādārāgaṇato dānādiṣu sadā pravartanaṃ karma /
analyzed: kuśala anukūla upapatti prārthanam atra praṇidhānam abhipretam tasya janmani janmani buddha utpāda ārāgaṇataḥ dāna ādiṣu sadā pravartanam karma

original: balapāramitayā pratisaṃkhyānabhāvanābalābhyāṃ niyataṃ dānādiṣu pravartate vipakṣānabhibhavād iti /

bhāvanā tu kuśala dharma abhyāsaḥ

niyata śabdasya satata paryāya tvāt
na hi pratisaṃkhyāna bhāvanā balāt dāna ādi kuśalam vipakṣeṇa abhibhūyate

original: jñānapāramitayā yathārutadharmasammohāpagamād dānādyādhipateyadharmasambhogañca pratyanubhavati sattvāṃśca paripācayatīti /
analyzed: jñāna pāramitayā yathā ruta dharma sammoha apagamāt dāna ādi ādhipateya dharma sambhogam ca pratyanubhavati sattvān ca paripācayati iti

original: ayaṃ punar yathārutasammohaḥ kaḥ ? yenābhiprāyikam arthaṃ tyaktvā yathārutam eva kalpayatyayaṃ yathārutasammohaḥ /
analyzed: ayam punar yathāruta sammohaḥ kaḥ yena ābhiprāyikam artham tyaktvā yathārutam eva kalpayati ayam yathāruta sammohaḥ

original: dānam adhikṛtya dānam ālambya yaḥ sūtrādiko dharmo deśitaḥ sa dānādhipateyaḥ /
analyzed: dānam adhikṛtya dānam ālambya yaḥ sūtra ādikaḥ dharmaḥ deśitaḥ sa dāna ādhipateyaḥ

original: mahāyānam ārabhya buddhabodhisattvenāviparītasāṃkathyaviniścayakāraṇāt sattvānāṃ cāviparītayā dharmadeśanayā paripācanād dharmsambhogānubhavanaṃ sattvaparipācanañca jñānapāramitāyāḥ karma /
analyzed: mahāyānam ārabhya buddha bodhisattvena a viparīta sāṃkathya viniścaya kāraṇāt sattvānām ca aviparītayā dharma deśanayā paripācanāt dharma sambhoga anubhavanam sattva paripācanañca jñāna pāramitāyāḥ karma

original: { manasikārapratipattiḥ }  paramapratipattinirdeśānantaraṃ manasikārapratipattir vaktavyā tatḥ pṛcchati  manasikārapratipattiḥ katametyata āha  yathāprajñaptito dharma mahāyānamanaskriyā /

iti vistaraḥ

original: atra sūtrageyavyākaraṇādidharmā yena prakāreṇa  dānādīnyadhikṛtya bhagavatā deśitās teṣāṃ tathaivārthato vyañjanataścādhyāropāpavādarahitānāṃ manasikaraṇaṃ manasikārapratipattir nānyatheti /

mahāyāne iti na śrāvaka yāne

original: tatra hi svārthā eva dānādayo deśitā na svaparārthā yathā mahāyāne /
analyzed: tatra hi sva arthāḥ eva dāna ādayaḥ deśitāḥ na sva para arthāḥ yathā mahāyāne

original: tasmān mahāyāna eva dānādīnyadhikṛtya yathāprajñaptānāṃ sūtrādidharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvair manasikaraṇaṃ manasikāra pratipattiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt mahāyāne eva dāna ādīni adhikṛtya yathā prajñaptānām sūtra ādi dharmāṇām bodhisattvaiḥ manasikaraṇam manasikāra pratipattiḥ

original: śrāvakayāne dānādīnyadhikṛtya bhāṣitānāṃ sūtrādīnāṃ manasikaraṇam mithyāmanasikārapratipattiḥ svārthamātrāśrayatvād iti jñāpitam bhavati /
analyzed: śrāvaka yāne dāna ādīni adhikṛtya bhāṣitānām sūtra ādīnām manasikaraṇam mithyāmanasikāra pratipattiḥ svārtha mātra āśraya tvāt iti jñāpitam bhavati

original: te ca prāyeṇa cittasamatām asaktim anunnatim anupalaṃbhañcādhikṛtya prajñaptā iti /

original: samāhitasya samādhyālambanaṃ hitvā manovijñānasya viṣayāntarasañcāro bahirdhā vikṣepa ityapare /

original: yadi samāhitastameva samādhiṃ tṛṣṇādinā kleśenāsvādayati tataḥ śuddhakāt samādher vikṣepo bhavati kliṣṭasamādhipratyupasthānāt /

laya auddhatyam ca śamatha vipaśyanā samavāhinaḥ samādheḥ vikṣepaḥ bhavati
asamāhi tad tvāt ca āsvāda anālaya auddhatyānām āsvādana ādayaḥ adhyātma vikṣepaḥ iti ucyante

original: dhyāyyayaṃ mahātmetyevaṃ sambhāvanātmanītyanena nimittena samādhau prayuktasyāśayavilayatvālabdhād alabdhād vā kuśalapakṣād vikṣepo nimittavikṣepa ityucyate /
analyzed: dhyāyī ayam mahātmā iti evam sambhāvanā ātmani iti anena nimittena samādhau prayuktasya āśaya vilaya tva alabdhāt alabdhāt vā kuśala pakṣāt vikṣepaḥ nimitta vikṣepaḥ iti ucyate

original: atraiva kāraṇam āha  tan nimittaṃ kṛtvā prayogād iti /

original: jñātukāmatayā taṃ sambhāvanābhisandhiḥ nimittaṃ kṛtveti sambhāvanātmanīti /
analyzed: jñātu kāma tayā tam sambhāvanā abhisandhiḥ nimittam kṛtvā iti sambhāvanā ātmani iti
samādhi prayukta tvāt iti
sāhankara manaskāra tā dauṣṭhulya vikṣepaḥ iti

original: āśayena samādhiguṇārthino'pi sāhankaramanaskāro'smimānasam prayukto'ham asmi dhyāyīti /
analyzed: āśayena samādhi guṇa arthinaḥ api prayuktaḥ aham asmi dhyāyī iti

original: kasmād eṣa dauṣṭhulyamanaskāraḥ ? ityata āha  dauṣṭhulyavaśenāsmimānasamudācārād iti /

analyzed: kim punar dauṣṭhulyam asmimāna vāsanā paripuṣṭiḥ tayā hi asmimānaḥ samudācarati iti tad vaśena asmimāna samudācārāt

original: aniyataśrāvakādigotrasya  mahāyānamanasikāraprayuktasya samsaraduḥkhabhīrutayā sattvavipratipānatvenākalyāṇamitraniṣevaṇena ca tac chrāvakapratyekabuddhacittam utpadyate /

tat cittam hīnam sva artha mātra parāyaṇa tvāt
tat śrāvaka pratyekabuddha cittam mahāyāna manasikāra vikṣepaka tvāt manasikāra vikṣepaḥ kathyate

original: atraiva kāraṇam āha  hīnayāna manasikārasamudācārād iti /

original: evam iyaṃ bodhisattvasya ṣaḍvidhavikṣepadoṣarahitā śamathābhāvanā veditavyā //

original: tatra yad yathā vyavasthitaṃ vastu tathā tatra jñānam aviparyāsaḥ /

original: tad vastuta punar na jñāyate katividhe vastunītyata āha  tatrāviparyāso daśavidhe vastuni veditavya iti /

original: idānīṃ teṣu vastuṣu yathā viparyāso bhavati tat pradarśanārtham āha  tatra saṃyogāt saṃbhavāc caiva viyogād apyasambhavāt /
analyzed: idānīm teṣu vastuṣu yathā viparyāsaḥ bhavati tat pradarśana artham āha tatra saṃyogāt saṃbhavāt ca eva viyogāt api asambhavāt
artha sattvam asattvam ca vyañjane saḥ aviparyayaḥ
iti
saṃyoge sati vyañjanānām iti
saṃyogaḥ hi paraspara saṃśleṣaḥ
na ca asau vyañjanānām vidyate yaugapadya abhāvāt
vyañjanānām yugapad uccāraṇam na yujyate

original: pūrvavikalpānām uttaravyañjanoccaraṇakāle'navasthānam uccāraṇānantaram eva vinaṣṭatvād ityāśankāvyudāsārtham āha  avicchinnoccāraṇatayeti /
etad uktaṃ bhavati  aviparyastāvilambitoccāraṇam atra vyañjanānāṃ saṃyoga iṣyate na tu vyañjanānāṃ parasparasaṃśleṣaṇam iti /

asya ca idam nāma iti sambhavāt iti

original: yadi cāsya vastuna idaṃ nāmeti sanketo'bhyasto bhavati evam anena prakāradvayena sārthakatvaṃ vyañjanānāṃ pratyāyakatvam ityarthaḥ /

viparyayāt nirarthaka tvam iti
ubhaya abhāvaḥ anyatara vaikalyam vā viparyayaḥ

original: so'viparyāso vyañjane veditavya iti saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /

original: paramārthenāviparyāsasya nirvikalpakatvād ityanenāviparyāsena bodhisattvaḥ śabdārtharahitān sarvadharmān pratividhyati /

original: tathā ca na vidyate yathā pratibhāsate advayaprakṛtitvāt /

original: arthasya sattvena varjita ityatraiva kāraṇam āha  grāhyagrāhakābhāvād iti /

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? tat pratibhāsabhrāntisadbhāvād iti grāhyagrāhakapratibhāsabhrāntisadbhāvād ityarthaḥ /

original: ayam api saṃvṛttā'viparyāsa ucyate na paramārthataḥ savikalpatvāt /

iti vistaraḥ

original: tasmin grāhyagrāhakaprakhyānalakṣaṇe'rthe'yaṃ grāhyo'yaṃ grāhaka iti vānmanobhyāṃ yad abhilapanaṃ sa jalpa ity ucyate /

original: anena jalpena paribhāvito'nāgatataj jātīyajalpotpādāya bījaparipoṣaṇam iti paribhāvita ity ucyate /

original: sa tu manaskāro na vijṇyāte yasminn aviparyāsa ityataḥ pṛcchati  katam asminmanaskāre'viparyāsa iti /

original: yathāsau grāhyagrāhakasamprakhyānakāraṇaṃ bhavati tat pradarśanārtham āha  sa hyasau jalpamanaskāro'bhilāpasaṃjñāparibhāvitatvād iti /

athavā jalpa manaskāraḥ iti atas abhidhāna pravṛtti nimittam āha

anyathā nāma nirapekṣayā cakṣuḥ ādi tvena grahaṇam syāt
na ca asti avyutpanna sanketasya grahaṇam

original: tasmāc cakṣūrupam ityādyasyātat svabhāvatvān nāmamātram eva cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā ityevaṃ yaj jñānaṃ sarvavikalpānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ svalakṣaṇe'viparyāsa iti parikalpitadharmamukhena sarvadharmeṣu sarvavikalpapravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt cakṣūrupam ityādyasya a tat svabhāva tvāt nāma mātram eva cakṣūrūpam yāvat manaḥ dharmāḥ iti evam yat jñānam sarva vikalpānām pratipakṣeṇa ayam sva lakṣaṇe aviparyāsaḥ iti parikalpita dharma mukhena sarva dharmeṣu sarva vikalpa pravṛttiḥ

original: ato nāmamātraprativedhajñānaṃ sarvavikalpapratipakṣaḥ svalakṣaṇe'viparyāsa ity uktaṃ /
analyzed: atas nāma mātra prativedha jñānam sarva vikalpa pratipakṣaḥ sva lakṣaṇe aviparyāsaḥ iti uktam

original: tatra na jñāyate kiṃ paramārthe svalakṣaṇe āhosvit saṃvṛtāv ityataḥ pṛcchati  katam asmin svalakṣaṇa iti /
analyzed: tatra na jñāyate kim paramārthe sva lakṣaṇe āhosvit saṃvṛtau iti atas pṛcchati asmin sva lakṣaṇe iti
atas āha paramārthe sva lakṣaṇe
ayam aviparyāsaḥ
paramārthasya sva lakṣaṇasya anabhilāpya tvāt na saṃvṛteḥ

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? saṃvṛttyā yato nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate abhilāpadvāreṇa dharmasvarūpe sankalpapravṛtteḥ ayam api saṃvṛtyaiva na paramārthato nāmamātram iti vikalpanāt /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam saṃvṛttyāḥ yatas na idam nāma mātram iti gṛhyate abhilāpa dvāreṇa dharma svarūpe san kalpa pravṛtteḥ ayam api saṃvṛtyā eva na paramārthataḥ nāma mātram iti vikalpanāt
anena ca aviparyāsena bodhisattvaḥ saṃvṛti parama artha kuśalaḥ bhavati

original: idānīṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe'viparyāsapradarśanāyāha  dharmadhātuvinirmukto yasmād dharmo na vidyate /
analyzed: idānīm sāmānya lakṣaṇe aviparyāsa pradarśanāya āha dharmadhātu vinirmuktaḥ yasmāt dharmaḥ na vidyate
iti vistaraḥ

original: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid rūpyarūpī vā dharmo vidyate /
analyzed: na hi dharma nairātmyena vinā kaścid rūpya rūpī vā dharmaḥ vidyate
sarva dharmāṇām an abhilāpya advaya prakṛta tvāt grāha grāhaka bhāvena rahita tvāt

original: tasmād dharmadhātuḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt dharmadhātuḥ sarva dharmāṇām sāmānyam lakṣaṇam iti

original: sarvadharmeṣv apṛthaktvena tat sat sāmānyalakṣaṇam ucyate /
analyzed: sarva dharmeṣu apṛthak tvena tat sat sāmānya lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: yadevaṃ jñānamayaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇo'viparyāsaḥ saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: yat evam jñāna mayam sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ aviparyāsaḥ saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ
tasya nirvikalpa tvāt

original: tad anena cāviparyāsena bodhisattvo viśuddhyālambanakuśalo bhavati nirvikalpajñānaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: tat anena ca aviparyāsena bodhisattvaḥ viśuddhi ālambana kuśalaḥ bhavati nirvikalpa jñāna viṣaya tvāt

original: viśeṣaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇasvalaksaṇayoḥ ko vidyate ? abhilāpasvabhāvasamāropitatvasya pratipakṣeṇānabhilāpyasvabhāvatā paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa sva laksaṇayoḥ kaḥ vidyate abhilāpa svabhāva samāropita tvasya pratipakṣeṇa anabhilāpya svabhāva tā paramārtha lakṣaṇam

original: parikalpitasvabhāvanairātmyaṃ punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtir iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ /
analyzed: parikalpita svabhāva nairātmyam punar sarva dharmāṇām prakṛtiḥ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: evaṃ darśanabhedavaśād viśeṣo bhavati na tv arthād iti /
analyzed: evam darśana bheda vaśāt viśeṣaḥ bhavati na tu arthāt iti

original: idānīṃ dharmadhātv aviśuddhiviśuddhāv aviparyāsapradarśanārtham āha  viparyasta manaskārāvihāniparihāṇitaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm dharmadhātu aviśuddhi viśuddhau aviparyāsa pradarśana artham āha viparyasta
iti vistaraḥ

original: viparyasta manaskāraprahāṇaṃ tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhiḥ tat prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti /
analyzed: viparyasta manaskāra prahāṇam tasya dharmadhātoḥ aviśuddhiḥ tat prahāṇam viśuddhiḥ iti
tatra manaskāraḥ ālayavijñāna hetuḥ viparyaya vikalpaḥ
tasya a prahāṇam dharmadhātoḥ a viśuddhiḥ prahāṇam viśuddhiḥ

original: yadevaṃ jñānamayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramam iti /
analyzed: yat evam jñāna mayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau ca aviparyāsaḥ yathākramam iti

original: viparyasta manaskārāprahāṇaṃ tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhir iti dharmadhātor aviśuddhāvaviparyāsaḥ /
analyzed: viparyasta manaskāra a prahāṇam tasya dharmadhātoḥ aviśuddhiḥ iti dharmadhātoḥ aviśuddhau aviparyāsaḥ

original: tasya prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti viśuddhāv aviparyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tasya prahāṇam viśuddhiḥ iti viśuddhau aviparyāsaḥ
kim kāraṇam dharmadhātoḥ āgantukena upakleśena upakliṣṭa tvāt
ayam api saṃvṛttyā eva aviparyāsaḥ na paramārthataḥ

original: anena cāviparyāsena bodhisattvo'prahīṇāvaraṇaṃ dharmadhātoḥ prahāṇañca prajānāti /
analyzed: anena ca aviparyāsena bodhisattvaḥ aprahīṇa āvaraṇam dharmadhātoḥ prahāṇam ca prajānāti

original: idānīṃ dharmadhātor aviśuddher viśuddheścāgantukatve'viparyāsapradarśanārtham āha  dharmadhātor viśuddhatvāt prakṛtyā vyomavat punaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm dharmadhātoḥ aviśuddheḥ viśuddheḥ ca āgantuka tve aviparyāsa pradarśana artham āha dharmadhātoḥ viśuddha tvāt prakṛtyāḥ vyoma vat punar
iti vistaraḥ

original: dharmadhātoḥ punar ākāśavat prakṛtiviśuddhitatvād dvayam apyetadāgantukam aviśuddhir viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
analyzed: dharmadhātoḥ punar ākāśa vat dvayam api etat āgantukam aviśuddhiḥ viśuddhiḥ ca paścāt iti
tatra dharmadhātoḥ abhūta vikalpa upakliṣṭa tvāt aśuddhiḥ uktā

original: paścāc ca pratipakṣodayena tat prahāṇād viśuddhiḥ /
analyzed: paścāt ca pratipakṣa udayena tat prahāṇāt viśuddhiḥ
etat dvayam api dharmadhātau āgantukam
kim kāraṇam ākāśa vat dharmadhātoḥ prakṛti viśuddha tvāt

original: prakṛtiviśuddhasyāviśuddhir āgantukī bhaved viśuddhes tu nityaviśuddhitaḥ katham āgantukībhāva iti ? yā malavigamatātmatayā viśuddhiḥ sātra vivakṣiteti nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛti viśuddhasya aviśuddhiḥ āgantukī bhavet viśuddheḥ tu nitya viśuddhitaḥ katham āgantukībhāvaḥ iti yā mala vigama tā ātma tayā viśuddhiḥ sā atra vivakṣitā iti na ayam doṣaḥ

original: ata evoktaṃ viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
analyzed: atas eva uktam viśuddhiḥ ca paścāt iti

original: yadevaṃ dharmadhātor jñānam etad dharmadhātor viśuddhi viśuddhyor āgantukatve'viparyāsaḥ /
analyzed: yat evam dharmadhātoḥ jñānam etat dharmadhātoḥ viśuddhi viśuddhyoḥ āgantuka tve aviparyāsaḥ

original: ayam api saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: ayam api saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ

original: anena cāviparyāsena bodhisattvo dharmadhātoḥ sankleśavyavadānāvasthayoḥ kṛtrimatvaṃ prajānātīti //
analyzed: anena ca aviparyāsena bodhisattvaḥ dharmadhātoḥ san kleśa vyavadāna avasthayoḥ kṛtrima tvam prajānāti iti

original: idānīmatrāse'nunnatau cāviparyāsapradarśanārtham āha  sankleśaś ca viśuddhiś ca dharmapudgalayor na hi /
analyzed: idānīm atrāse anunnatau ca aviparyāsa pradarśana artham āha san kleśaḥ ca viśuddhiḥ ca dharma pudgalayoḥ na hi
iti vistaraḥ

original: na hi pudgalasya sankleśo na viśuddhiḥ nāpi dharmasya /
analyzed: na hi pudgalasya san kleśaḥ na viśuddhiḥ na api dharmasya
san kleśaḥ viśuddhiḥ ca iti vartate

original: atraiva kāraṇam āha  yasmān na pudgalo'sti na dharmaḥ /
analyzed: atra eva kāraṇam āha yasmāt na pudgalaḥ asti na dharmaḥ
asti iti anuvartate

original: yaḥ sankleśavyavadānavyatirekeṇa vidyate yasya sankleśo vyavadānaṃ vā parikalpayituṃ yujyate yat pṛthaktvena ca saṃkleśaviśuddhī syātāṃ sa tādṛśaḥ pudgalo nāsti pratyakṣānumānāviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: yaḥ san kleśa vyavadāna vyatirekeṇa vidyate yasya san kleśaḥ vyavadānam vā parikalpayitum yujyate yat pṛthaktvena ca saṃkleśa viśuddhī syātām sa tādṛśaḥ pudgalaḥ na asti pratyakṣa anumāna aviṣaya tvāt

original: dharmo'pi parikalpitātmako naivāsti ekasminn vastuny ekaparikalpapravṛtteḥ /

original: na caikasyānekātmakatā yujyate ato'sattvāt pudgaladharmayordvayo bandhnyaputrādivanna sanleśo na vyavadānaṃ /

paratantrsya api suddha loukika jñana gocarasya san kleśa viśuddhī na eva iṣyate

original: yadi paratantrasyāpi neṣyate kasya te syātāṃ ? tasminn asati sankleśaparihāre vyavadānaprāptiyatnavaiyarthyaṃ /
analyzed: yadi paratantrasya api na iṣyate kasya te syātām tasmin asati san kleśa parihāre vyavadāna prāpti yatna vaiyarthyam

original: dharmadhātoḥ sankleśaviśuddhī bhavata ity ayam adoṣaḥ /
analyzed: dharmadhātoḥ san kleśa viśuddhī bhavataḥ iti ayam adoṣaḥ

original: dharmadhātor apyatanmayasyaiva te vyavasthāpyete dharmadhātau tayor āgantukatvād dharmadhātoścākāśavad avikārāt /
analyzed: dharmadhātoḥ api a tanmayasya eva te vyavasthāpyete dharmadhātau tayoḥ āgantuka tvāt dharmadhātoḥ ca ākāśa vat avikārāt

original: tataḥ na saṃkleśapakṣe kasyacid hānir na vyavadānapakṣe vā kaścid viśeṣo yatas trāso vā syān mānovetyamatrāse'nunnatau cāviparyāsa iti /
analyzed: tatas na saṃkleśa pakṣe kasyacid hāniḥ na vyavadāna pakṣe vā kaścid viśeṣaḥ yatas trāsaḥ vā syāt ca aviparyāsaḥ iti

original: anye tvāhuḥ  na sankleśapakṣe kasyacid hānir na vyavadānapakṣe viśeṣo'sti tad ubhayavataḥ kasyacid abhāvāt /
analyzed: anye tu āhuḥ na san kleśa pakṣe kasyacid hāniḥ na vyavadāna pakṣe viśeṣaḥ asti tat ubhayavataḥ kasyacid abhāvāt

original: yataḥ punas ta evaṃ bhavatas tatra kim iti trāso bhavaty ayaṃ me nāstīti kim iti māno bhavaty ayaṃ me viśeṣa iti /

original: apare tu manyate  pudgalas tāvan naivāsti /

dharmaḥ api na eva asti

original: kiṃ tarhi pratītyasamutpādamātram etat sankleśavyavadānam iti /

original: anena cāviparyāsena kṣayavṛddhyasadbhāvād avikāritvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyatīti /

original: anyaḥ punar āha  ya ete vyañjane'rthe manaskāre'visāre svalakṣaṇe sāmānyalakṣaṇe'śuddhau śuddhāvāgantuke'trāse'nunnatau cāviparyāsāḥ kalpitā āśrayās te svabhāvatrayam adhikṛtyeti /

original: tatra vyañjanārthāviparyāsāv atra parikalpitaṃ svabhāvam adhikṛtya /

original: atattvaviṣayatve'pi satyevaṃ tad dvayam aviparyāsa eva /

a visāre aviparyāsaḥ pariniṣpanna svabhāvam adhikṛtya

original: kuta etan nirvikalpasya jñānasya bhāvābhāvayor vikṣepavigatatvād aviparyāsapariniṣpattyā ca pariniṣpannasvabhāvasaṃgṛhītatvāt /

original: svasāmānyalakṣaṇayor aviparyāso dharmadhātā meva tasya vikalpaviśayātikrāta svarūptvāt/

original: āgantuke'viparyāso dharmadhātāv eva tasya hy ākāśavat prakṛtiviśuddhasya cittasankleśāc cittaviśuddhyā cāgantukam etad ubhayaṃ vyavasthāpyate /

original: { daśa vajrapadāni }  ete cānantaroktā daśaviparyāsāḥ sūtrokteṣu daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
analyzed: daśa vajra padāni ete ca anantara uktāḥ daśa viparyāsāḥ sūtra ukteṣu daśasu vajra padeṣu yathākramam yojayitavyāḥ

original: daśa vajrapadāni katamāni ? sadasattā'viparyāsaḥ āśrayaḥ māyopamatā avikalpanatā prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā sankleśo vyavadānaṃ ākāśopamatā ahīnatā aviśiṣṭatā ceti /

original: anantaroktam aviparyāsajñānaṃ tac ca vajram ebhiḥ pratīyate avagamyata iti vajrapadāni /

original: atha punarvyañjanārthamanaskārādaya eva padaśabdhenocyante tato vajrasya padānyālambanānityarthaḥ /

original: athava durbhedatayā vajravadetānyeva padāni vajra padānītyuccayante /

original: vajrapadānāṃ va daśavidhāviparyāsamukhenedaṃ vyākhyānam iti pradarśanārthaṃ /

original: tatra vyañjanānām arthasattvam asattvañca sadasattetyato vyañjaneṣv aviparyāso vajrapadeṣu sadasattayā veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra vyañjanānām artha sattvam asattvam ca sat asat tā iti atas vyañjaneṣu aviparyāsaḥ vajra padeṣu sat asat tayā veditavyaḥ

original: sa ca tathā na vidyata ityayam atrāviparyāsa ityarthāviparyāso vajrapadeṣv aviparyāse yojayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca tathā na vidyate iti ayam atra aviparyāsaḥ iti artha aviparyāsaḥ vajra padeṣu aviparyāse yojayitavyaḥ

original: jalpamanaskāra evātrāśraya ityato manaskāre'viparyāso vajrapadeṣvāśraye yojayitavyaḥ /

original: māyādyupamayā yaścetaso'visāre'viparyāsaḥ sa vajrapadeṣu māyopamatāyāṃ yojayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: māyā ādi upamayā yaḥ cetasaḥ avisāre aviparyāsaḥ sa vajra padeṣu māyā upama tāyām yojayitavyaḥ

tena sāmānya lakṣaṇa aviparyāsaḥ prakṛti prabhāsvara tayā san gṛhītaḥ

original: dharmadhātor aviśuddhiviśeṣo viśuddhiviśeṣaśca sankleśo  vyavadānañcetyato'śuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāsaḥ sankleśavyavadānāntare sangṛhyate /
analyzed: dharmadhātoḥ aviśuddhi viśeṣaḥ viśuddhi viśeṣaḥ ca san kleśaḥ vyavadānam ca iti atas aśuddhau viśuddhau ca aviparyāsaḥ san kleśa vyavadāna antare san gṛhyate
dharmadhātoḥ san kleśa vyavadānayoḥ āgantuka tve aviparyāsaḥ asau api ākāśa upama tāyām yojayitavyaḥ

original: sankleśavyavadānāvasthayor dharmadhātoḥ kṣayavṛddhyabhāvād atrāse'nunnatau cāviparyāso vajrapadeṣv ahīnāviśiṣṭatāyāṃ yojayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: san kleśa vyavadāna avasthayoḥ dharmadhātoḥ kṣaya vṛddhi abhāvāt a trāse anunnatau ca aviparyāsaḥ vajra padeṣu ahīna aviśiṣṭa tāyām yojayitavyaḥ

original: evam ete daśāviparyāsā daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
analyzed: evam ete daśa aviparyāsāḥ daśasu vajra padeṣu yathākramam yojayitavyāḥ

original: vajrapadānāṃ śarīravyavasthānam iti yānārthānadhikṛtya vajrapadānāṃ pravṛttis te'rthās teṣāṃ śarīraṃ /
analyzed: vajra padānām śarīra vyavasthānam iti yāna arthān adhikṛtya vajra padānām pravṛttiḥ te arthāḥ teṣām śarīram

original: teṣāntu caturdhā vyavasthānaṃ svabhāvataḥ ālambanataḥ avikalpanataḥ codyaparihārataś ca /
analyzed: teṣām tu caturdhā vyavasthānam svabhāvataḥ ālambanataḥ a vikalpanataḥ codya parihārataḥ ca

original: tatra trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ pariniṣpannaparikalpitaparatantrākhyā ādyais tribhiḥ padair yathākramam iti /
analyzed: tatra trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ pariniṣpanna parikalpita paratantra ākhyāḥ ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramam iti

original: tatrādau bhavānyādyāni tāni punaḥ sadasattā'viparyāsa āśrayaśceti /

tatra sat asat tayā pariniṣpannaḥ uktaḥ
aviparyāsena parikalpitaḥ uktaḥ

original: katham iti ? pariniṣpannasya sadasattāyā sadasattayā nirdeśa iti kecit /

original: saṃyogāt saṃstavācākṣarāṇāṃ kalpitenārthena sārthakatvaṃ paśyan viparyayāc ca nirarthakatvaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo'nabhilāpya iti avagamyate /

original: atas tat sadasattā pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ity uktam ityanye /

original: so'rthaḥ kalpitasvabhāvasya bhavati na tu parikalpitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ arthaḥ kalpita svabhāvasya bhavati na tu parikalpitaḥ
atas sat asat tā pariniṣpannaḥ iti uktam iti apare

original: anye tv āhuḥ  sadasattā'viparyastatvāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ukta iti /

original: aviparyāsena parikalpitas tasyāvidyamānena dvayarūpeṇa prakhyāti lakṣaṇāt /

original: hetutvād āśraya ity ucyate phalatvāt paratantra iti /

original: tatrārya vigrahabhedaḥ  na vikalpayatyanenetyavikalpanaṃ na vikalpyate tadityavikalpanaṃ /

a vikalpana tayā jñāna vyavasthānam grāhaka tvāt

original: tasmācodyaparihāraś ca codyasya parihāraś ca codyaparihārau asarūpaikaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā /

katham upalabhyante grāhya grāhaka tvena iti abhiprāyaḥ

etat codyam
tat māyā upama tayā pariharati

original: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na saṃvidyata upalabhyate ceti /

original: yathā ākāśaṃ prakṛtipariśuddham āgantukenopakleśenasaṃkliśyate tad apagamād vyavadīyate ceti /

original: tad apagamāc ca vyavadānam iti yadyaprameyabuddhotpāde satyaprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kleśapraśamastat kathamanādisaṃsāre pratyekasyāpi buddhotpādasyāprameyāṇāṃ satvānaṃ saṃsārāpagamān nirvāṇapraveśāc ca na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhri veti codyaṃ /

asya ahīna aviśiṣta tayā parihāraḥ
aprameya tvāt sattvadhātoḥ vyavadāna pakṣasya ca iti

original: parimāṇavato hi vastuno hāniḥ samucchedo vā prajñāyate aprameyaś ca sattvadhātuḥ /
analyzed: parimāṇavataḥ hi vastunaḥ hāniḥ samucchedaḥ vā prajñāyate aprameyaḥ ca sattvadhātuḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ śarīravyavasthānam iti vajrapadānām ity adhikṛtaṃ /

original: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /

original: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
analyzed: bhrānti abhrānti phale ca eva paryantaḥ ca tayoḥ iti

original: vajrapadair bhrāntiviṣayo bhrāntisvarūpatā bhrāntihetur bhrāntiphalaṃ bhrāntiparyantaśca nirdiṣṭaḥ /

tathā abhrānti svarūpam abhrānti viṣayaḥ abhrānti phalam tad paryantaḥ ca iti

original: tatra yatra bhrāntir iti sadasattāyāṃ vyañjanānāṃ sārthakatvanirarthakatvalakṣaṇāyām abhidhānābhidheyayos tat sambandhasya ca bhāvasvarūpeṇa parikalpitatvāt /
analyzed: tatra yatra bhrāntiḥ iti sat asat tāyām vyañjanānām sārthaka tva nirarthaka tva lakṣaṇāyām abhidhāna abhidheyayoḥ tat sambandhasya ca bhāva svarūpeṇa parikalpita tvāt

original: yā ca bhrāntir iti viparyāso bhrāntiḥ /

original: yato bhrāntir ityāśrayād bhrāntir āśrayaḥ punar jalpaparibhāvito manaskāra ālayavijñānātmakaḥ /

original: abhrāntir yā ceti māyādivad arthataḥ sadasattāvisāro'bhrāntiḥ /

bhāva abhāva abhiniveśa bhrānti pratipakṣaḥ ca abhrāntiḥ
sā yathākramam māyā upama tayā a vikalpana tā ca nirdiṣṭā
yatra ca iti yatra ca sā abhrāntiḥ
sā punar prakṛti prabhāsvara tāyām pariniṣpanna svabhāva lakṣaṇāyām

original: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiveti tatra bhrāntiphalaṃ hi sankleśaḥ /

a bhrānti phalam vyavadānam sa samprayogam iti vākya śeṣaḥ

original: evakārakaraṇaṃ tat phale sankleśo vyavadānam ityanenaivokte ākāśopamatayā tu paśyati dharmadhātor yasya bhrāntyabhrāntiphalaṃ tat sankleśavyavadānātmakaṃ /

original: paryantaś ca tayor iti sankleśavyavadānayoḥ paryanto nirvāṇaṃ /

anye tu āhuḥ saṃsārasya aprameya tayā apacaya abhāvāt ahīna tā yuktaḥ san kleśa paryantaḥ

etāni daśa vajra padāni a viparyāsa prasanga dvāreṇa uktāni

original: na tu sūtritānītyatas tānyantaraślokābhyāṃ sangṛhītāni  sadasattā'viparyāsa āśrayo māyayopamā /

original: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //

daśa vajra padāni hi
atra ca pariniṣpanna śabda artha sambandha darśanam viparyāsaḥ

bhāvānām sva sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ vastu tvena darśanam viparyāsaḥ

ekasya eva aśuddhi viśuddhi darśanam viparyāsaḥ
san kleśa vyavadāna prahāṇa pratilambhayoḥ hāni viśeṣa darśanāt trāsa māna pravṛttiḥ viparyāsaḥ
iti ete daśa viparyāsāḥ

original: bodhisattvasya tad abhāvādaviparyāsāvasthitasya yathokteṣvartheṣvariṇatā vidarśanā bhāvanā veditavyā /

original: { antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ }  anudharmapratipattyantaram antadvayavarjane pratipattir vaktavyetyataḥ pṛcchati  antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katametyata āha  yā ratnakūṭe nāmadharmaparyāyeṇa samyak pratipatteḥ svabhāvapratipādanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipadupadiṣṭā /
analyzed: anta dvaya varjane pratipattiḥ   anu dharma pratipatti antaram anta dvaya varjane pratipattiḥ vaktavyā iti atas pṛcchati anta dvaya varjane pratipattiḥ katamā iti atas āha yā ratnakūṭe nāma dharma paryāyeṇa samyak pratipatteḥ svabhāva pratipādana artham madhyamā pratipad upadiṣṭā

original: tadyathā  kāśyapa iha mahāratnakūṭe dharmaparyāye śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena yoniśodharmaprayuktena bhavitavyaṃ /

yā na ātma pratyavekṣā na sattvana jīvana poṣana pudgalana manu jana mānava pratyavekṣā

original: iyam ucyate kāśyapa madhyamā  pratipaditi vistareṇa yāvad dvitīyapradīpodāharaṇaparyantaḥ paṭhyate /

original: kasyāntasya varjanādasau veditavyā ? katam asyāntasya varjanān madhyamā pratipatter jñātavyetyarthaḥ /

original: ata āha  pṛthaktvaikatvam antaś ca tīrthyaśrāvakayor api //

atra pṛthak ādi darśanam antar

original: tatra rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvam ātmana ityantaḥ ekatvam ityantaḥ /
