original: tatra ye rūpādīn sknadhānāyatanāni dhātūṃś ca nityātmana upabhogavastutvena kalpayanti tad rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvamātmana ityantaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ye rūpa ādīn dhātūn ca nitya ātmanaḥ upabhoga vastu tvena kalpayanti tat rūpa ādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvam ātmanaḥ iti antaḥ

original: ye punar ādhyātmikān saṃskārān rūpādīnām ātmatvena pratipannā yaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti jānāti sa ātmeti bāhyāṃścātmīyatvena kalpayanti tad rūpādibhya ekatvam ātmana ityantaḥ yat sūtryate  sa jīvas taccharīram anyo jīvo'nyaccharīram iti darśanaṃ tadevātrāntaśabdenoktaṃ /
analyzed: ye punar ādhyātmikān saṃskārān rūpa ādīnām ātma tvena pratipannāḥ yaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti jānāti saḥ ātmā iti bāhyān ca ātmīya tvena kalpayanti tat rūpa ādibhyaḥ ekatvam ātmanaḥ iti antaḥ yat sūtryate sa jīvaḥ tat śarīram anyaḥ jīvaḥ anyat śarīram iti darśanam tat eva atra anta śabdena uktam

original: tat parivarjanārtham iti rūpādibhyas tattvānyatvāntaparivarjanārtham ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tat parivarjana artham iti rūpa ādibhyaḥ tattva anya tva anta parivarjana artham ātmanaḥ

original: madhyamā pratipad yad dharmātraṃ viṣayabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ /
analyzed: madhyamā pratipad yat dharmātram viṣaya bhūtam jñānam

original: etad eva pradarśayann āha  yā nātmapratyavekṣā yāvannamānapratyavekṣeti /dharmamātradarśanāddhi vandhyāpurtravad ātmā nāstītyavagacchan nātmānaṃ pratyavekṣate nānusaratītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: etat eva pradarśayan āha yā na ātma pratyavekṣā yāvat na māna pratyavekṣā iti dharma mātra darśanāt hi vandhyā purtra vat ātmā na asti iti avagacchan na ātmānam pratyavekṣate na anusarati iti arthaḥ

original: kuta eva tasya rūpādibhyas tattvam anyatvaṃ vā gṛhyata iti ? ātmaśabdenaiva tadarthe'vagamyamāne kimarthaṃ sattvādiparyāyaviśeṣābhidhānaṃ ? na sarvasya sarvaparyāyavyutpattir ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ tadarthāvabodhārthaṃ paryāyāntaranirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: kutas eva tasya rūpa ādibhyaḥ tattvam anya tvam vā gṛhyate iti ātma śabdena eva tad arthe avagamyamāne kimartham sattva ādi paryāya viśeṣa abhidhānam na sarvasya sarva paryāya vyutpattiḥ iti atas sarveṣām tad artha avabodha artham paryāya antara nirdeśaḥ
tat kāla vikṣiptānām vā paryāya antareṇa tad artha prāpaṇa arthaḥ
tena eva abhidhānena ucyamāne anyeṣām prāpaṇāt
nityam rūpam iti tīrthika antar

original: te hi parikalpitarūpān vastutvenābhiniveśya nityatvena kalpayanti nityaviparyāsopahatatvāt /
analyzed: te hi parikalpita rūpān vastu tvena abhiniveśya nitya tvena kalpayanti nitya viparyāsa upahata tvāt
anityam iti śrāvaka antaḥ

original: tair api kalpitasvabhāvānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ vasturūpeṇānityatvena samāropaṇādantatvaṃ /
analyzed: taiḥ api kalpita svabhāvānām rūpa ādīnām vastu rūpeṇa anitya tvena samāropaṇāt anta tvam

original: atyantasaṃsārodvegakarān nirvāṇasya cāntapātanād anityadarśnasyāntatvaṃ /tad ubhayaparivarjanārtham iti nityānityadarśanaparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yā rūpādīnāṃ nanityapratyavekṣā nānityapratyavekṣeti /
analyzed: atyanta saṃsāra udvega karāt nirvāṇasya ca anta pātanāt anitya darśnasya anta tvam tat ubhaya parivarjana artham iti nitya anitya darśana parivarjana artham madhyamā pratipad yā rūpa ādīnām na nitya pratyavekṣā na anitya pratyavekṣā iti
tat punar kim

original: yan na rūpādīn rūpādiṣv eva nityatvenānityatvena cānugacchati /
analyzed: yat na rūpa ādīn rūpa ādiṣu eva nitya tvena anitya tvena ca anugacchati

original: rūpādīnām ityādiśabdena vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaskandhānāṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśadhātūnāṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaāyatanānāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ /
analyzed: rūpa ādīnām iti ādi śabdena vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñāna skandhānām pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa dhātūnām cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ āyatanānām ca grahaṇam

original: ātmeti śabdena pudgalasamāropānta iti skandhadhātvāyatana vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā vandhyāputravad asantam ātmānaṃ dravyataḥ paśyataḥ pudgalasyātmano vasturūpasamāropaṇam antaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā iti śabdena pudgala samāropa antaḥ iti skandha dhātu āyatana vyatiriktam a vyatiriktam vā vandhyā putra vat asantam ātmānam dravyataḥ paśyataḥ pudgalasya ātmanaḥ vastu rūpa samāropaṇam antar
nairātmyam iti apavāda antaḥ
apavādaḥ hi sataḥ asattva parikalpaḥ iti uktaḥ

original: ātmanastv asattvāt kathaṃ nairātmyam ity apavādānta āpadyata ityata āha  prajñaptisato'pyapavādāt nairātmyam apavādānta iti sambadhyate /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tu asattvāt katham nairātmyam iti apavāda ante āpadyate iti atas āha prajñapti sataḥ api apavādāt nairātmyam apavāda ante iti sambadhyate

original: sa punar dharmāṇāṃ santāno yasmin hetuphalasambandhaḥ prajñāyate /
analyzed: sa punar dharmāṇām santānaḥ yasmin hetu phala sambandhaḥ prajñāyate
samudayaḥ vā yatra deva manuṣya prajñaptiḥ

original: tat parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad ityātmanaḥ sadasattādarśanaparivarjanārthaṃ /
analyzed: tat parivarjana artham madhyamā pratipad iti ātmanaḥ sat asat tā darśana parivarjana artham

original: tasyāḥ punar yasyā madhyamāyāḥ pratipado nirūpaṇārtham āha  yadātmanairātmyayor madhyamam iti /
analyzed: tasyāḥ punar yasyāḥ madhyamāyāḥ pratipadaḥ nirūpaṇa artham āha yat ātma nairātmyayoḥ madhyamam iti
kim punar tat madhyam
nirvikalpam jñānam

original: grāhyārthavikalpasyāntatvaṃ darśayitvā grāhakārthavikalpasyāntatvapradarśanārtham āha  bhūtaṃ cittam ityādi /
analyzed: grāhya artha vikalpasya anta tvam darśayitvā grāhaka artha vikalpasya anta tva pradarśana artham āha bhūtam cittam ityādi

original: athavā pudgalasya samāropāpavādāntatvaṃ darśayitvā dharmasya samāropāpavādāntadarśanārtham āha  bhūtaṃ cittam ityādi /
analyzed: athavā pudgalasya samāropa apavāda anta tvam darśayitvā dharmasya samāropa apavāda anta darśana artham āha bhūtam cittam ityādi

original: yathā pratibhāsate yathā vā'bhilapyate cittaṃ tathaiva bhūtaṃ vidyata iti /ayaṃ dharmasamāropāntaḥ abhūtasya cittasvabhāvabhūtatvena samāropāt /
analyzed: yathā pratibhāsate yathā vā abhilapyate cittam tathā eva bhūtam vidyate iti ayam dharma samāropa antaḥ abhūtasya citta svabhāva bhūta tvena samāropāt
abhūtam cittam iti apavāda antaḥ

original: tasya hi grāhyagrāhakarahitātmanā nirabhilāpyena ca vidyamānam apyabhūtam iti paśyataḥ sarvātmanā dharmasvabhāvāpavādād apavādāntaḥ /
analyzed: tasya hi grāhya grāhaka rahita ātmanā nirabhilāpyena ca vidyamānam api a bhūtam iti paśyataḥ sarva ātmanā dharma svabhāva apavādāt apavāda antaḥ

original: tat parivarjanārtham iti samāropāpavādarahitasya dharmanairātmyasya pravitedhārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad /
analyzed: tat parivarjana artham iti samāropa apavāda rahitasya dharma nairātmyasya pravitedha artham madhyamā pratipad

original: sā yatra nacittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānam iti /
analyzed: sā yatra na cittam na cetanā na manaḥ na vijñānam iti
abhiniveśāḥ na pravartante iti vākya śeṣaḥ

original: yatra vā viṣaye na cittaṃ sāsravavāsanābhiścittātmakaṃ pravartate na cetanā'bhisaṃskāralakṣaṇā na mano manyanākāraṃ na vijñānañca vikalpanam iyaṃ madhyamā pratipad ityucyate /
analyzed: yatra vā viṣaye na cittam sa āsrava vāsanābhiḥ citta ātmakam pravartate na cetanā abhisaṃskāra lakṣaṇā na manaḥ manyana ākāram na vijñānam ca vikalpanam iyam madhyamā pratipad iti ucyate
tatra cittam ālayavijñānam sarva srāva dharma vāsanābhiḥ citta tvāt
cetanā manaskarma kuśala akuśala avyākṛteṣu citta preraṇa karmikā
manaḥ kliṣṭam manaḥ
vijñānam ṣaṭ vijñāna kāyāḥ
akuśala ādayaḥ dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ iti vipakṣa antaḥ
kuśala ādayaḥ vyavadānam iti pratipakṣa antaḥ
ādi śabdena sāvadya anavadya laukika lokottara sāsrava anāsrava saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta ādayaḥ nirdeśāḥ sambadhyante

original: tatra yathaivākuśalāḥ kuśalāś ca dharmāḥ pratibhāsante'bhilapyante ca tathaiva saṃkleśo vyavadānañceti darśanaṃ vipakṣāntaḥ pratipakṣāntaś ca /
analyzed: tatra yathā eva akuśalāḥ kuśalāḥ ca dharmāḥ pratibhāsante abhilapyante ca tathā eva saṃkleśaḥ vyavadānam ca iti darśanam vipakṣa antaḥ pratipakṣa antaḥ ca
tatra a kuśalāḥ a kṣema artha tvāt
sāvadyā duścarita samutthāpaka tvāt
laukikāḥ viparyasta tvāt
sa āsravāḥ āsrava anuśayita tvāt
saṃskṛtāḥ pratyaya utpādi tvāt
tad viparītāḥ tu kuśala ādayaḥ veditavyāḥ
tat parivarjana artham madhyamā pratipad iti
vipakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ tad chabdena abhisambandhaḥ

original: na madhyamā'tra pratipaj jñāyata ityata āha  yo'syāntadvayasyā'nupagamo'nudāhāro'pravyāhāra iti /
analyzed: na madhyamā atra pratipad jñāyate iti atas āha yaḥ asya anta dvayasya anupagamaḥ anudāhāraḥ apravyāhāraḥ iti
tatra anupagamaḥ vipakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ anabhiniveśaḥ
an udāhāraḥ tasmin vipakṣa pratipakṣa ante pareṣām a samādāpanāt
a pravyāhāraḥ vipakṣa pratipakṣa antayoḥ a saṃvarṇanāt

original: tīrthikaśrāvakāntapratipakṣeṇa madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ deśayitvā bodhisattvāntapratipakṣeṇa madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipādayann āha  astīti śāśvatāntaḥ nāstītyucchedāntaḥ tayor eva pudgaladharmayoḥ /
analyzed: tīrthika śrāvaka anta pratipakṣeṇa madhyamām pratipadam deśayitvā bodhisattva anta pratipakṣeṇa madhyamām pratipadam pratipādayan āha asti iti śāśvata antaḥ na asti iti uccheda antaḥ tayoḥ eva pudgala dharmayoḥ
sarvadā sva lakṣaṇa samārupāt asti iti śāśvata antaḥ
sarvathā svarūpa apavādāt na asti iti uccheda antaḥ

original: tat parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor antayor madhyamiti/
analyzed: tat parivarjana artham madhyamā pratipad yat anayoḥ antayoḥ madhyam iti
ubhaya anta vigamaḥ atra madhyam abhipretam iti eke
ubhaya lakṣanam atra dvayoḥ antayaḥ madhyam iti apare

original: kathaṃ kṛtvā ? yo'hyabhūtaparikalpavad dharmadhātuvadvā jñeyamn abhidheyaṃ ca vastu dravyataḥ paramārthataścāstītyabhiniveśaḥ sa śāśvatāntaḥ /
analyzed: katham kṛtvā yaḥ ahi abhūta parikalpa vat dharmadhātu vat vā jñeyam abhidheyam ca vastu dravyataḥ paramārthataḥ ca asti iti abhiniveśaḥ sa śāśvata antaḥ
tasya tad hā a sattvāt
tat vā śaśa viṣāṇa vat na asti eva iti darśanam uccheda antaḥ
kim kāraṇam tasya prajñaptitaḥ astitvāt
atas tad nirākaraṇena uccheda antaḥ ucyate

original: ataścāstitva nāstitvayor madhyaṃ dravyaḥ paramārthaś ca nasti prajñaptito'stītyubhayalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atas ca astitva nāstitvayoḥ madhyam dravyaḥ paramārthaḥ ca prajñaptitaḥ asti iti ubhaya lakṣaṇam bhavati

original: vipakṣapratipakṣayoḥ samāropāntam adhikṛtyāha  avidyā grāhyā grāhakā cetyantaḥ /
analyzed: vipakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ samāropa antam adhikṛtya āha avidyā grāhyā grāhakā ca iti antaḥ

original: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtañca tat pratipakṣo grāhyaṃ grāhyakañcetyantaḥ /
analyzed: evam vidyā saṃskārāḥ asaṃskṛtam ca tat pratipakṣaḥ grāhyam grāhyakam ca iti antaḥ

original: atra ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇam iti paryantagrahāṇād vijñānanāmarūpādayo'dhyākṣipyante /
analyzed: atra ca yāvat jarā maraṇam iti paryanta grahāṇāt vijñāna nāma rūpa ādayaḥ adhyākṣipyante
vijñānam grāhyam grāhakam ca iti antaḥ

original: evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātijarāmaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakañcetyantaḥ /
analyzed: evam nāma rūpam ṣaṣ āyatanam sparśaḥ vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānam bhavaḥ jāti jarā maraṇam grāhyam grāhakam ca iti antaḥ
tatra a vidyā satya ratna asaṃprakya anātmikā

original: punyā punyānijñjasvabhāva cetanā sa punarbhāvabhisaṃskaraṇāt saṃskārāḥ /
analyzed: cetanā sa punarbhāva abhisaṃskaraṇāt saṃskārāḥ
evam saṃkleśa lakṣaṇa vyākhyāna anusāreṇa vijñāna ādayaḥ api vistareṇa vaktavyāḥ
vidyā anāsravam jñānam
saṃskārāṇām jñānam eva a saṃskṛtam pratipakṣaḥ

original: atha vā'nyasmād asaṃskṛtād  vyavacchedārtham āha  tat pratipakṣa iti /
analyzed: atha vā anyasmāt a saṃskṛtāt vyavaccheda artham āha tat pratipakṣe iti

original: anye tv anutpattimatvād asaṃskṛtam aṣṭavidham apyatra manyante /
analyzed: anye tu an utpattima tvāt asaṃskṛtam aṣṭavidham api atra manyante
pratipakṣaḥ tu anāsravā cetanā punar bhāva an abhisaṃskaraṇāt iti
tat nirodhaḥ grāhyaḥ grāhakaḥ vā iti antaḥ
tat śabdena vijñāna ādayaḥ jarā maraṇa paryavasānāḥ sambadhyante

original: nirodho na vijñāyate kiṃ bhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vetyāha  yena tan nāmarūpaṃ nirudhyata iti /
analyzed: nirodhaḥ na vijñāyate kim bhāvaḥ kāraṇam vā iti āha yena tat nāma rūpam nirudhyate iti
kena punar tat nāma rūpam nirudhyate
nāma rūpa pratipakṣeṇa anāsraveṇa mārgeṇa

original: vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram ityetad evātra jñānaṃ saparivāraṃ mārgaḥ /
analyzed: vidyā ca a avidyā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram iti etat eva atra jñānam sa parivāram mārgaḥ
atas ca nirudhyate anena iti nirodhaḥ
kaḥ punar atra antaḥ
ayam eva grāhya grāhaka abhiniveśaḥ
kim kāraṇam advaya prakṛtiṣu avidyā ādiṣu a vidyamāna dvaya adhyāropa pravṛtta vāt
evam grāhya grāhaka antaḥ dvidhā kṛṣṇa śukla pakṣa bhedena iti

original: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣe dvādaśabhavāngāni avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ /
analyzed: tatra kṛṣṇa pakṣe dvādaśa bhavāngāni avidyā yāvat jarā maraṇam

original: evaṃ śuklapakṣe'pyvidhyādinirodhabhedena dvādaśaprakāra evāvidhyānirodho yāvaj jarāmaraṇanirodha iti /
analyzed: evam śuklapakṣe api vidhi ādi nirodha bhedena dvādaśa prakāraḥ eva avidhya anirodhaḥ yāvat jarā maraṇa nirodhaḥ iti

original: atra ca nirydhyante'enā'vidyādaya iti tat pratipakṣabhūto mārga eva nirodhaśabdenoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca nirydhyante avidyā ādayaḥ iti tat pratipakṣa bhūtaḥ mārgaḥ eva nirodha śabdena uktaḥ

original: tat parivarjanārtham iti grāhyagrāhakāntaparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamāpratipad uktyabhisambadhyate /
analyzed: tat parivarjana artham iti grāhya grāhaka anta parivarjana artham madhyamā pratipad uktī abhisambadhyate

original: sā ca na vijñāyata ityata āha  vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam etad iti /
analyzed: sā ca na vijñāyate iti atas āha vidyā ca a vidyā ca advayam etat iti

original: kathaṃ vidyā cāvidyā ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ tan nirodhaścā'dvayam ityata āha  vidyāvidyādīnāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvābhāvād iti /
analyzed: katham vidyā ca avidyā ca yāvat jarā maraṇam tat nirodhaḥ ca a dvayam iti atas āha vidyā avidyā ādīnām grāhya grāhaka tva abhāvāt iti
tad abhāvaḥ tu avidyā ādīnām advaya prakṛti tvāt

original: athavā vidyā'vidyeti parikalpitasvabhāvo'taś ca parikalpitasvabhāvayor vidyā'vidyayorabhāvasamatayā vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam iti /
analyzed: athavā vidyā avidyā iti parikalpita svabhāvaḥ atas ca parikalpita svabhāvayoḥ vidyā avidyayoḥ abhāva samatayā vidyā ca avidyā ca advayam iti

original: evaṃ saṃskārāṇām asaṃskṛtasya ca vijñānasya tan nirodhasya ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇasya tannirodhasya ceti vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: evam saṃskārāṇām asaṃskṛtasya ca vijñānasya tat nirodhasya ca yāvat jarā maraṇasya tat nirodhasya ca iti vaktavyaḥ
kā punar atra madhyamā pratipad

original: etad eva jñānaṃ vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etadavaidhīkāram iti na vidyotpādayitavyā nā'vidyā nirodhayitavyā /
analyzed: etat eva jñānam vidyā ca avidyā ca advayam etat avaidhīkāram iti na vidyā utpādayitavyā na a vidyā nirodhayitavyā
na saṃskāra ādayaḥ praheyāḥ

original: na tannirodhaḥ prāptavya iti yadevaṃ jñānam etadavaidhīkāraṃ //
analyzed: na tad nirodhaḥ prāptavyaḥ iti yat evam jñānam etat avaidhīkāram
trividhaḥ san kleśaḥ iti

original: tatra kleśaḥ karmajanmasaṃkleśanimittatvāt svayañca kliṣṭatvāt svaparātmanor vyābādhahetutvād vā saṃkleśa ucyate /
analyzed: tatra kleśaḥ karma janma saṃkleśa nimitta tvāt svayam ca kliṣṭa tvāt sva para ātmanoḥ vyābādha hetu tvāt vā saṃkleśaḥ ucyate

original: karmāpi kleśādhipatyanirvṛttatvāj janmahetutvāt svayam api ca kasyacit kliṣṭatvāt saṃkleśa ucyate /
analyzed: karma api kleśa ādhipatya nirvṛtta tvāt janma hetu tvāt svayam api ca kasyacid kliṣṭa tvāt saṃkleśaḥ ucyate
janma api karma kleśa nimitta tvāt sarva upadrava āspada bhūta tvāt ca saṃkleśaḥ

original: punaḥ kleśasankleśasya tridhā bhedapradarśanārtham āha  kleśasankleśastrividha iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: punar kleśa san kleśasya tridhā bheda pradarśana artham āha kleśa san kleśaḥ trividhaḥ iti vistaraḥ
tatra dṛṣṭayaḥ pañca satkāyadṛṣṭi ādikāḥ

original: rāgadveṣamohā eva nimittaṃ śokādihetutvāt punar bhavahetutvāc ca /
analyzed: rāga dveṣa mohāḥ eva nimittam śoka ādi hetu tvāt punar bhava hetu tvāt ca

original: anye tvāhuḥ  rāgādīnāṃ nimittaṃ tad anukūlā indriyārthāḥ ayoniśo manaskāraḥ rāgādivāsanā ālayavijñānasanniviṣṭā /
analyzed: anye tu āhuḥ rāga ādīnām nimittam tat anukūlāḥ indriya arthāḥ ayoniśas manaskāraḥ rāga ādi vāsanā ālayavijñāna sanniviṣṭā
evam tu varṇayanti rāga ādi nimittam tad ābhāsaḥ iti
punar bhava praṇidhānam punar bhava prārthanā
yasya pratipakṣaḥ jñāna śūnyatā iti vistaraḥ
tatra dṛṣṭānām jñāna śūnyatā pratipakṣaḥ
śūnyatā viṣayam jñāna mātra jñāna śūnyatā
rāga ādi nimitta pratipakṣaḥ jñāna a nimittam sarva nimitta vigamāt
animitta viṣayam vā jñānam jñāna animittam
parikalpita rāga ādi śūnyatā viṣaya tvāt punarbhava praṇidhāna pratipakṣaḥ jñāna apraṇihitam
punarbhava praṇidhāna vigatam punarbhava śūnyatā viṣayam vā jñānam jñāna praṇihitam

original: karmasankleśaḥ śubhāśubhakarmābhisaṃskāraḥ punarbhavākṣepakayoḥ śubhāśubhayoḥ karmaṇor upacayo'bhinirvṛttir abhisaṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: karma san kleśaḥ śubha aśubha karma abhisaṃskāraḥ punarbhava ākṣepakayoḥ śubha aśubhayoḥ karmaṇoḥ upacayaḥ abhinirvṛttiḥ abhisaṃskāraḥ
yasya pratipakṣaḥ jñāna a na abhisaṃskāraḥ

original: yena jñānena karma punarbhavann asya nā'bhisaṃskaroti taj jñānaṃ jñānābhisaṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: yena jñānena karma punar bhavan asya na a abhisaṃskaroti tat jñānam jñāna abhisaṃskāraḥ
tat punasthathatā viṣayam
janma san kleśaḥ punarbhava jātiḥ pratisandhi cittam

original: jātasya cittacaittānāṃ pratikṣaṇotpādaḥ pratisandhibandhād ūrdhvam āmaraṇāt /
analyzed: jātasya citta caittānām prati kṣaṇa utpādaḥ pratisandhi bandhāt ūrdhvam ā maraṇāt
punarbhava prabandhaḥ iti kleśa sahitaḥ maraṇa bhavaḥ
tasmāt anantaram antarbhāvaḥ
tatas ca punar api upapatti bhavaḥ
maraṇa bhavāt evā anantaram upapatti bhāvaḥ

original: yasya pratipakṣo jñānā'jātir jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
analyzed: yasya pratipakṣaḥ jñāna a jātiḥ jñāna anutpādaḥ jñāna asvabhāva tā ca

original: tatrājātāḥ sarvadharmāḥ prikalpitātmktveneti yaj jñanaṃ śunyatāviṣayaṃ vā taj jñānajātiḥ /
analyzed: tatra ajātāḥ sarva dharmāḥ yat jñanam śunya tā viṣayam vā tat jñāna jātiḥ
parikalpita dharma śūnyatā viṣayam jñanam tena tad anutpād prativedāt

original: vandhyāputravad asattvād asvabhāvo bhāvaprabandha iti yaj jñānaṃ taj jñānāsvabhāvatā /
analyzed: vandhyā putra vat asattvāt asvabhāvaḥ bhāva prabandhaḥ iti yat jñānam tat jñāna asvabhāva tā

original: etaj jñānaśūnyatādikaṃ saptavidhajñānaṃ yathoktasya saptavidhasya dṛṣṭyādivipakṣasya pratipakṣaḥ /
analyzed: etat jñāna śūnyatā ādikam saptavidha jñānam yathā uktasya saptavidhasya dṛṣṭi ādi vipakṣasya pratipakṣaḥ
etasya eva trividhasya kleśa karma janma san kleśasya saptadhā bhinnasya apagamaḥ vyavadānam
apagamaḥ prahāṇam

original: anye tu manyante tathatā mārgo nirvāṇañca vyavadānaṃ /
analyzed: anye tu manyante tathatā mārgaḥ nirvāṇañca vyavadānam

original: apagacchatyasminn anevāpagatiścetyevaṃ vigrahabhedāt tathatādayo vyavadānam iti /
analyzed: apagacchati asmin anevāpagatiḥ ca iti evam vigraha bhedāt tathatā ādayaḥ vyavadānam iti

original: tatra jñānaśūnyatādibhir iti ādiśabdāj jñānaśūnyatā jñānānimittaṃ jñānāpraṇihitaṃ jñānābhisaṃskāro jñānājātir jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca parigṛhyante /
analyzed: tatra jñāna śūnyatā ādibhiḥ iti ādi śabdāt jñāna śūnyatā jñāna animittam jñāna apraṇihitam jñāna abhisaṃskāraḥ jñāna ajātiḥ jñāna anutpādaḥ jñāna asvabhāva tā ca parigṛhyante
jñeya śūnyatā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ iti

original: atrāpyādiśabdena jñeyaśūnyatā jñeyanimittaṃ jñeyānabhisaṃskāro jñeyājātir jñeyānutpādo jñeyāsvabhāvatā ca pariniṣpannalakṣaṇāḥ parigṛhyante /
analyzed: atra api ādi śabdena jñeya śūnyatā jñeya nimittam jñeya anabhisaṃskāraḥ jñeya ajātiḥ jñeya anutpādaḥ jñeya asvabhāva tā ca pariniṣpanna lakṣaṇāḥ parigṛhyante

original: etena trividhena sankleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyanta iti /
analyzed: etena trividhena san kleśena yathāyogam yāvat na śūnyatā ādayaḥ kriyante iti

original: anantaroktena  kleśakarmajanmasaṃkleśena pṛthagbhūtajñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmā jñānaśūnyatādibhir na kriyante /
analyzed: anantara uktena kleśa karma janma saṃkleśena pṛthak bhūta jñeya śūnyatā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ jñāna śūnyatā ādibhiḥ na kriyante
kim kāraṇam na kriyante
yasmāt te prakṛtyā eva śūnyatā ādayaḥ iti
prakṛtyā eva adṛṣṭi ādi svabhāvāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kuta etat ? ata āha  dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: kutas etat atas āha dharmadhātoḥ prakṛti asaṃkliṣṭa tvāt

original: ato jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmāḥ prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādaya iti jñānaśūnyatādibhir na kriyante /
analyzed: atas jñeya śūnyatā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ prakṛtyā eva śūnyatā ādayaḥ iti jñāna śūnyatā ādibhiḥ na kriyante
yathāyogam iti ayam atra yathāyoga arthaḥ

original: jñānaśūnyatayā jñeyaśūnyatā dṛṣṭisaṃkleśena vimuktā virahitā na kriyante dṛṣṭiśūnyatāyāḥ svayam evādṛṣṭisvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: jñāna śūnyatayā jñeya śūnyatā dṛṣṭi saṃkleśena vimuktā virahitā na kriyante dṛṣṭi śūnyatāyāḥ svayam eva adṛṣṭi svabhāva tvāt

original: evaṃ jñānānimittena jñeyānimittaṃ rāgādinimittair virahitaṃ na kriyate rāgādinimittaiḥ śūnyatāyāḥ svayam evānimittatvāt /
analyzed: evam jñāna animittena jñeya animittam rāga ādi nimittaiḥ virahitam na kriyate rāga ādi nimittaiḥ śūnyatāyāḥ svayam eva animitta tvāt

original: jñānāpraṇihitena jñeyāpraṇihitaṃ na kriyate praṇidhānaśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyaivāpraṇidhānalakṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: jñāna apraṇihitena jñeya apraṇihitam na kriyate praṇidhāna śūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyā eva apraṇidhāna lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: jñānānabhisaṃskāreṇa jñeyānabhisaṃskāro na kriyate abhisaṃskāraśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyaivānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: jñāna an abhisaṃskāreṇa jñeya an abhisaṃskāraḥ na kriyate abhisaṃskāra śūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyā eva an abhisaṃskāra lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: jñānājāthyā jñeyajātirṇaṃ kriyate, jātiśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛutyai vā jāti lakṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: kriyate jāti śūnyatāyāḥ prakṛutyai vā jāti lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: jñānānutpādena kriyānutpādo na kriyate cittacaittapratikṣaṇotpādaśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyaivānutpādalakṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: jñāna anutpādena kriyā anutpādaḥ na kriyate citta caitta prati kṣaṇa utpāda śūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyā eva anutpāda lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: jñānasvabhāvatayā jñeyāsvabhāvatā na kriyate punarbhavaśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyaivāsvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: jñāna svabhāva tayā jñeya asvabhāva tā na kriyate punarbhava śūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtyā eva asvabhāva tvāt

original: athavā trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogam iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: athavā trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogam iti vistaraḥ

original: kleśakarmajanmasaṃkleśena saptadhābhinnena jñeyaśūnyatādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yasya dharmasya yena saṃkleśabhedena yogaḥ sa dharmo na jñānaśūnyatādibhiḥ kriyate kiṃ tarhyadhigamyate /
analyzed: kleśa karma janma saṃkleśena saptadhā bhinnena jñeya śūnyatā ādīnām dharmāṇām yasya dharmasya yena saṃkleśa bhedena yogaḥ sa dharmaḥ na jñāna śūnyatā ādibhiḥ kriyate kim tarhi adhigamyate

original: tatra dṛṣṭisaṃkleśena jñānaśūnyatāyogaḥ evaṃ yāvat punarbhavaprabandhena jñānāsvabhāvatāyogaḥ /
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭi saṃkleśena jñāna śūnyatā yogaḥ evam yāvat punarbhava prabandhena jñāna asvabhāva tā yogaḥ

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na kriyate ? yasmāt te prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmā dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyaivāsaṃkliṣṭatvād iti /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam na kriyate yasmāt te prakṛtyā eva śūnyatā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyā eva asaṃkliṣṭa tvāt iti

original: tatra dṛṣṭayo na jñānaśūnyatayā śūnyāḥ kriyante tāsāṃ prakṛtyaiva śūnyatā lakṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭayaḥ na jñāna śūnyatayā śūnyāḥ kriyante tāsām prakṛtyā eva śūnyatā lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: rāgādinimittaṃ jñānānimittena nānanimittaṃ kriyate dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyaivānimittatvāt /
analyzed: rāga ādi nimittam jñāna animittena na an animittam kriyate dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyā eva animitta tvāt

original: evaṃ yāvat punar bhavaprabandho jñānāsvabhāvatayā nāsvabhāvaḥ kriyate yato'nutpanne'pi pratipakṣe parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo'sanneva /
analyzed: evam yāvat punar bhava prabandhaḥ jñāna asvabhāva tayā na asvabhāvaḥ kriyate yatas anutpanne api pratipakṣe parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ asanna eva

original: yataścaitad evam ato yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśuddhyate veti kalpayatyam antaḥ /
analyzed: yatas ca etat evam atas yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśuddhyate vā iti antar

original: kiṃ kāraṇam ityato bravīti  prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭasya saṃkleśaśuddhyabhāvād ākāśavad iti /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam iti atas bravīti prakṛti asaṃkliṣṭasya saṃkleśa śuddhi abhāvāt ākāśa vat iti

original: etasyāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamāpratipad yan na śūnyatāyā vidyātmikāyā dharmānajñeyaśūnyatādīn pariniṣpannasvabhāvātmakaṃ tad vipakṣeṇa paratantrasvabhāvena dṛṣṭyādikena śūnyān virahitān karoti /
analyzed: etasya antasya parivarjana artham madhyamā a pratipad yat na śūnyatāyāḥ vidyā ātmikāyāḥ dharmān ajñeya śūnyatā ādīn pariniṣpanna svabhāva ātmakam tat vipakṣeṇa paratantra svabhāvena dṛṣṭi ādikena śūnyān virahitān karoti

original: api tv anutpannāyām api vidyāyāṃ parikalpitena svabhāvena dṛṣṭisvarūpeṇa dharmā eva śūnyāḥ /
analyzed: api tu anutpannāyām api vidyāyām parikalpitena svabhāvena dṛṣṭi svarūpeṇa dharmāḥ eva śūnyāḥ

original: evaṃ yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti dharmā evānimittāḥ yāvadyannāsvabhāvatayā dharmānasvabhāvān karoti dharmā evāsvabhāvā iti /
analyzed: evam yat na animittena dharmān animittān karoti dharmāḥ eva animittāḥ yāvat yat na asvabhāva tayā dharmān asvabhāvān karoti dharmāḥ eva asvabhāvāḥ iti

original: yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā iyam ucyate kāśyapa dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣeti /
analyzed: yā evam pratyavekṣā iyam ucyate kāśyapa dharmāṇām bhūta pratyavekṣā iti

original: evaṃ vidyāstitvaṃ tad vipakṣāstitvāṃ ca parikalpitasvabhāvavigataṃ paridīpayann adhyāropāpavādāntapratikṣepaḥ kṛto bhavati //
analyzed: evam vidyā astitvam tat ca parikalpita svabhāva vigatam paridīpayan adhyāropa apavāda anta pratikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati

original: yo'yam anukrānto vikalpaprabhedastasmād ayam aparaḥ saptavidho vikalpadvayāntaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ayam anukrāntaḥ vikalpa prabhedaḥ tasmāt ayam aparaḥ saptavidhaḥ vikalpa dvaya antaḥ

original: vikalpaprabhedapradarśanārtham āha  tadyathā bhāve'pi vikalpo'ntaḥ abhāve'pi vikalpo'nta iti /
analyzed: vikalpa prabheda pradarśana artham āha tat yathā bhāve api vikalpaḥ antaḥ abhāve api vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti

original: katham ityato bravīti  pudgalo'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā nairātmyam api vā nāstīti vikalpanāt /
analyzed: katham iti atas bravīti pudgalaḥ asti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā nairātmyam api vā na asti iti vikalpanāt

original: yadi śūnyatayā dharmān prakṛtiśūnyatvān na śūnyān karoti tena tarhi pudgalo'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā /
analyzed: yadi śūnyatayā dharmān prakṛti śūnya tvāt na śūnyān karoti tena tarhi pudgalaḥ asti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā
nairātmyam api vā nā asti pudgala abhāvāt
na hi pratipakṣaḥ nirvipakṣaḥ asti

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ pudgalāstitvaṃ vā nairātmyaṃ bhāvo vā pratipattavya iti /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam pudgala astitvam vā nairātmyam bhāvaḥ vā pratipattavyaḥ iti
tad bhāva abhāve vikalpaḥ antaḥ

original: etasya bhāvābhāvavikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham iyaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
analyzed: etasya bhāva abhāva vikalpa dvaya antasya parivarjana artham iyam madhyamā pratipad

original: na khalu punaḥ kāśyapa pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā /
analyzed: na khalu punar kāśyapa pudgala vināśāya śūnyatā

original: api tu śūnyataiva śūnyeti vistareṇa sūtrapāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: api tu śūnyatā eva śūnyā iti vistareṇa sūtra pāṭhaḥ

original: tatra na sankliṣṭa pudugalavināśāya na oyavadānpudgalothpādāya śūnyatā /senādivatprajñaptisatvāt pudgalasyotpādavināśābhāvād api tu śūnyataiva śūnyā na tu pudgalena satkāyadṛṣṭisamāropitena tasyātyantam asattvāt /
analyzed: tatra na san kliṣṭa pudugala vināśāya na śūnyatā senā ādi vat prajñapti satvāt pudgalasya utpāda vināśa abhāvāt api tu śūnyatā eva śūnyā na tu pudgalena satkāyadṛṣṭi samāropitena tasya atyantam asattvāt

original: evañca kṛtvā pudgaladharmātmanā na bhāvaḥ śūunyatā tad rahitatvāt /
analyzed: evañca kṛtvā pudgala dharma ātmanā na bhāvaḥ tad rahita tvāt

original: pariniṣpannena nābhāvaḥ tac ca śūnyatāyāḥ pariniṣpannātmakatvaṃ pratipādayann āha  pūrvāntaśūnyatā aparāntaśūnyatā pratyutpannaśūnyateti kālatraye'pi tathaivāstitvapratipādanāt /
analyzed: pariniṣpannena na abhāvaḥ tat ca śūnyatāyāḥ pariniṣpanna ātmaka tvam pratipādayan āha pūrvānta śūnyatā aparānta śūnyatā pratyutpanna śūnyatā iti kāla traye api tathā eva astitva pratipādanāt
athavā pṛthagjana aśaikṣa śaikṣa avasthāsu tathā eva astitva pratipādanāt

original: tatra pṛthagjanāvasthā pūrvāntaḥ aśaikṣāvasthā'parāntaḥ śaikṣāvasthā pratyutpanna iti /
analyzed: tatra pṛthagjana avasthā pūrva antaḥ aśaikṣa avasthā apara antaḥ śaikṣa avasthā pratyutpannaḥ iti

original: yasmāc caivaṃ bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā tasmād āha  śūnyatāṃ kāśyapa pratisarateti nirvikalpajñānaviṣayatvāt na pudgalam ityabhidhānamātratvād iti /
analyzed: yasmāt ca evam bhāva abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā tasmāt āha śūnyatām kāśyapa pratisarata iti nirvikalpa jñāna viṣaya tvāt na pudgalam iti abhidhāna mātra tvāt iti
śāmye api vikalpaḥ antaḥ śamane api vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti anuvartate

original: katham ityata āha  praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanāditi /
analyzed: katham iti atas āha praheya prahāṇa kalpanayā śūnyatāyāḥ trasanāt iti
tatra śāmyam praheyam praśamanam prahāṇam

original: dharmān praheyatvena śūunyatāñca prahāṇatvena kalpayitvā śūnyatāyāmuttrāso jāyate /
analyzed: dharmān praheya tvena śūunyatām ca prahāṇa tvena kalpayitvā śūnyatāyām uttrāsaḥ jāyate
katham trividhaḥ hi san kleśaḥ praheyaḥ

original: sa yadi prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tataḥ pudgalavan na praheyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sa yadi prakṛti śūnyaḥ tatas pudgala vat na praheyaḥ syāt

original: tataś ca praheyābhāvāt prahāṇābhāva iti śūnyatāyām uttrāso jāyate /
analyzed: tatas ca praheya abhāvāt prahāṇa abhāvaḥ iti śūnyatāyām uttrāsaḥ jāyate
ayam api antaḥ eva

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ? rūpavedanādayo hi dharmā yathaiva vijñānātmani viparivartante tathaiva te dravyataḥ santītyabhiniviṣṭāḥ teṣāṃ kalpitarūpāṇāṃ rūpādīnām ātmavat prakṛtyaivāsattvam ajānānās tacchūnyatāyā bibhyati /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam rūpa vedanā ādayaḥ hi dharmāḥ yathā eva vijñāna ātmani viparivartante tathā eva te dravyataḥ santi iti abhiniviṣṭāḥ teṣām kalpita rūpāṇām rūpa ādīnām ātma vat prakṛtyā eva asattvam a jānānāḥ tad śūnyatāyāḥ bibhyati
tasmāt etasya vikalpa dvaya antasya parivarjana artham ākāśa dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tadyathā  kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśajo bhītaḥ sorastāḍaṃ krandedevañca vaded apanayatadākāśam iti /
analyzed: tat yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣaḥ ākāśa jaḥ bhītaḥ sa uraḥ tāḍam krandet evam ca vadet apanayata ākāśam iti

original: takiṃ manyase kāśyapa śakyam ākāśam apanetuṃ ? āha  no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
analyzed: takim manyase kāśyapa śakyam ākāśam apanetum āha no hi idam bhagavan

original: bhagavān āha  evam eva kāśyapa ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ śūnyatāyām utttrasanti tān ahaṃ mahāvikṣepaprāptānīti vadāmi /
analyzed: bhagavān āha evam eva kāśyapa ete śramaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ śūnyatāyām uttrasanti tān aham mahā vikṣepa prāptāni iti vadāmi

original: tat kasmād hetoḥ ? śūnyatāyām eva hi te kāśyapa vicaranti tasyā eva bibhyantīti /
analyzed: tat kasmāt hetoḥ śūnyatāyām eva hi te kāśyapa vicaranti tasyāḥ eva bibhyanti iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati  yathākāśaṃ sarvarūpānugatatvād apanetum aśakyam evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu sarvakālaṃ śūnyatā vyavasthitetyapanetuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yathā ākāśam sarva rūpa anugata tvāt apanetum aśakyam evam sarva dharmeṣu sarvakālam śūnyatā vyavasthitā iti apanetum na śakyate

original: na ca dharmaprahāṇena śūnyatā vyavasthāpayitum ataścāyam asthānasaṃtrāsa iti darśayati /
analyzed: na ca dharma prahāṇena śūnyatā vyavasthāpayitum atas ca ayam asthāna saṃtrāsaḥ iti darśayati

original: trāsye'pi kalpo'ntaḥ tataś ca trāsyād bhaye'pi /
analyzed: trāsye api kalpaḥ antaḥ tatas ca trāsyāt bhaye api
kim vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti adhikṛtam
yatas trāsaḥ sambhavati tat trāsyam ucyate
bhīyate asmāt iti bhayam

original: tasmād yad aniṣṭaphalaṃ tasmin strāsye tasmiṃśca bhaye yo vikalpayati so'ntaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yat aniṣṭa phalam tasmin strāsye tasmin ca bhaye yaḥ vikalpayati saḥ antaḥ
katham iti atas bravīti parikalpita rūpa ādi trasanāt duḥkha bhīru tayā iti

original: bālā hi parikalpitarūpādīn vastutaḥ kalpayitvā tebhyo bhayam aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ca kalpayanti /
analyzed: bālāḥ hi parikalpita rūpa ādīn vastutaḥ kalpayitvā tebhyaḥ bhayam aniṣṭam phalam ca kalpayanti

original: tataśca duḥkhabhīrutayā tebhyo rūpādibhyas tan nimittebhyaś ca bhayāt trasantīti /
analyzed: tatas ca duḥkha bhīru tayā tebhyaḥ rūpa ādibhyaḥ tad nimittebhyaḥ ca bhayāt trasanti iti
etasya vikalpa dvaya antasya parivarjana artham citrakara dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tadyathā  kāśyapa citrakaraḥ svayam eva bhīṣaṇaṃ yakṣarūpaṃ kṛtvā tasmād eva bhītasrasto'dhomukho nipatya sammohaṃ nigacchet /
analyzed: tat yathā kāśyapa citrakaraḥ svayam eva bhīṣaṇam yakṣa rūpam kṛtvā tasmāt eva bhīta srastaḥ adhomukhaḥ nipatya sammoham nigacchet

original: evam eva kāśyapa sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ svayam eva rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān kṛtvā tebhyaḥ saṃsāre bhrāmyanti na ca tān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ prajānantīti /
analyzed: evam eva kāśyapa sarva bāla pṛthagjanāḥ svayam eva rūpa śabda gandha rasa sparśān kṛtvā tebhyaḥ saṃsāre bhrāmyanti na ca tān dharmān yathābhūtam prajānanti iti

original: yathā ca citrakaraḥ svayaṃkṛte bhīṣaṇake yakṣarūpe mithyāvikalpena bhūtayakṣabhāvam adhyāropya tasmād bhītaḥ sammoham āpadyate /
analyzed: yathā ca citrakaraḥ svayaṃkṛte bhīṣaṇake yakṣa rūpe mithyā vikalpena bhūta yakṣa bhāvam adhyāropya tasmāt bhītaḥ sammoham āpadyate

original: evaṃ sarva eva bālā mithyāvikalpaprasrutāḥ svayaṃ kṛtair iti vikalpitaiḥ saṃsāre bhrāmyante kṣaṇāvasthānikāyasabhāgānavasthitatvāt /
analyzed: evam sarve eva bālāḥ mithyā vikalpa prasrutāḥ svayam kṛtaiḥ iti vikalpitaiḥ saṃsāre bhrāmyante kṣaṇa avasthā nikāya sa bhāga anavasthita tvāt
pūrvakaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ śrāvakān adhikṛtya āyantu bodhisattvān iti

original: śrāvako hi śūnyatāyām akṛtaparicayatvāc chūnyatāyās trasyati /
analyzed: śrāvakaḥ hi śūnyatāyām a kṛta paricaya tvāt śūnyatāyāḥ trasyati
bodhisattvaḥ tu parikalpita dharma vikalpena saṃkliśyate vikalpa kleśa tvāt iti eke

original: nānayor arthaviśeṣo'styapi tu vargadvayavaśād dvayābhidhānam ityanye /
analyzed: na anayoḥ artha viśeṣaḥ asti api tu varga dvaya vaśāt dvaya abhidhānam iti anye

original: śrāvakaḥ śūnyatātrāsādadhigantavyaṃ nādhigacchati bodhisattvaḥ punar vikalpitadharmatrāsād ityapare /
analyzed: śrāvakaḥ śūnyatā trāsāt adhigantavyam na adhigacchati bodhisattvaḥ punar vikalpita dharma trāsāt iti apare

original: pūrvaka ātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ punar dharmagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti kecit //
analyzed: pūrvakaḥ ātma grāha pratipakṣeṇa ayam punar dharma grāha pratipakṣeṇa iti kecid
grāhye api vikalpaḥ antaḥ grāhake api
vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti adhikṛtam

original: katham ete grāhyarūpādayas tad grāhakāśca vijñānakāyāḥ svalakṣaṇataḥ kāryataś ca gṛhyamāṇā ātmādivad adhyāropitātmāno bhaviṣyantītyevaṃ grāhyagrāhakayor vastutaḥ parikalpo'nto'bhipretaḥ /
analyzed: katham ete grāhya rūpa ādayaḥ tat grāhakāḥ ca vijñāna kāyāḥ sva lakṣaṇataḥ kāryataḥ ca gṛhyamāṇāḥ ātma ādi vat adhyāropita ātmānaḥ bhaviṣyanti iti evam grāhya grāhakayoḥ vastutas parikalpaḥ antaḥ abhipretaḥ

original: etasya  vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ māyākāradṛṣṭāntaḥ /t tadyathā kāśyapa māyākāraḥ puruṣo māyākṛtaṃ nirmimīti /
analyzed: etasya vikalpa dvaya antasya parivarjana artham māyākāra dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat yathā kāśyapa māyākāraḥ puruṣaḥ māyā kṛtam nirmimīti

original: atha sa māyānirmitas tameva māyākāraṃ khādet /
analyzed: atha sa māyā nirmitaḥ tam eva māyākāram khādet

original: evam eva kāśyapa yogācāro bhikṣur yadyadevārambaṇaṃ manaskaroti tat sarvam asya riktam eva khyātīti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: evam eva kāśyapa yoga ācāraḥ bhikṣuḥ yat yat eva ārambaṇam manaḥ karoti tat sarvam asya riktam eva khyāti iti vistaraḥ

original: katham anenaivaṃ vidhaṃ vikalpadvayāntaṃ parivarjayantīti ? ata āha  vijñaptimātrajñānakṛtaṃ hy arthābhāvajñānaṃ /
analyzed: katham anena evaṃvidham vikalpa dvaya antam parivarjayanti iti atas āha vijñaptimātra jñāna kṛtam hi artha abhāva jñānam
tat ca artha abhāva jñānam tat eva vijñaptimātra jñānam nivartayati

original: arthābhāve vijñaptyasambhavād ityetad atra sādharmyam iti /
analyzed: artha abhāve vijñapti asambhavāt iti etat atra sādharmyam iti
māyākāra sthānīyam vijñaptimātra tā jñānam
nirmita yakṣa sthānīyam artha abhāva jñānam
vijñaptimātra jñāna prabhāvita tvāt artha abhāva jñānasya

original: yathā nirmito nirmātāraṃ bhakṣyedevam arthābhāvajñānaṃ tadeva vijñaptimātrajñānaṃ bhakṣyati /
analyzed: yathā nirmitaḥ nirmātāram bhakṣyet evam artha abhāva jñānam tat eva vijñapti mātra jñānam bhakṣyati

original: asatyarthe vijñaptimātrasyāsaṃbhavād arthopalabdhir vijñaptir iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: asati arthe vijñapti mātrasya asaṃbhavāt artha upalabdhiḥ vijñaptiḥ iti kṛtvā
samyaktve api vikalpaḥ antaḥ mithyātve api vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti adhikṛtam

original: nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthāyāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena vā vikalpayato mithyātvena vā 'ntadvayaṃ /
analyzed: nirvedha bhāgīya avasthāyām bhūta pratyavekṣām samyaktvena vā vikalpayataḥ mithyātvena vā anta dvayam
katham samyaktvam anāsravāḥ dharmāḥ mithyātvam sa āsravāḥ

original: tatra yadi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvenaivādhyavastyatyevaṃ kuśalasāsravā na bhūtapratyavekṣā syāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi bhūta pratyavekṣām samyaktvena eva adhyavastyati evam kuśala sa āsravā na bhūta pratyavekṣā syāt

original: atha punar asamyaktvalakṣaṇam eva evam api mithyātvam evopapadyate traidhātukapratisaṃyuktakuśalavad iti /
analyzed: atha punar asamyaktva lakṣaṇam eva evam api mithyātvam evā upapadyate traidhātuka pratisaṃyukta kuśala vat iti
etasya anta dvayasya parivarjana artham kāṣṭha dvaya agni dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tadyathā kāśYapa kāṣṭhadvayaṃ pratītyagnir jāyata iti jātaś ca samānastadeva kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahati /
analyzed: tat yathā kāśyapa kāṣṭha dvayam prati iti agniḥ jāyate iti jātaḥ ca samānaḥ tat eva kāṣṭha dvayam dahati

original: evam eva kāśyapa bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratītyāryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ dahatīti /
analyzed: evam eva kāśyapa bhūta pratyavekṣām pratītya āryam prajñā indriyam jāyate jātam ca tām eva bhūta pratyavekṣām dahati iti

original: amamātrārthaḥ  yathā kāṣṭhadvayād anagnilakṣaṇād agnir jāyate jātaśca kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahatīti /
analyzed: ama mātra arthaḥ yathā kāṣṭha dvayāt anagni lakṣaṇāt agniḥ jāyate jātaḥ ca kāṣṭha dvayam dahati iti

original: evam evāsamyaktvalakṣaṇāyā bhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ samyaktvalakṣaṇam āryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: evam eva a samyaktva lakṣaṇāyāḥ bhūta pratyavekṣāyāḥ samyaktva lakṣaṇam āryam prajñā indriyam jāyate

original: jātaś ca tām eva bhūtaparatyavekṣāṃ dahati /
analyzed: jātaḥ ca tām eva bhūta pa ratyavekṣām dahati
vibhāvayati iti arthaḥ

original: sā hi vibhāvanād eva dagdheva dagdhety ucyate vikṛtidarśanāt /
analyzed: sā hi vibhāvanāt eva dagdhā iva dagdhā iti ucyate vikṛti darśanāt

original: iyañca bhūtapratyavekṣā sāsravāpi satī samyaktvānukūlyād bhūtapratyavekṣety ucyata iti /
analyzed: iyat ca bhūta pratyavekṣā sa āsravā api satī samyaktva ānukūlyāt bhūta pratyavekṣā iti ucyate iti
vyāpṛtau api vikalpaḥ antaḥ a vyāpṛtau api
vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti adhikṛtam

original: katham ityata āha  jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayata iti /
analyzed: katham iti atas āha jñānasya buddhi pūrvām kriyām niḥsāmarthyam vā kalpayate iti

original: yadi  jñānam idam ajñānaṃ prajahāmītyavadhārya tat prahāṇāya pravartata ityayaṃ vyāpṛtau vikalpo'ntaḥ /
analyzed: yadi jñānam idam ajñānam prajahāmi iti avadhārya tat prahāṇāya pravartate iti ayam vyāpṛtau vikalpaḥ antaḥ
jñānasya kṣaṇika tvāt na prahāṇa vyāpāra kāle saṃbhavaḥ
atas ajñāna prahāṇasya niḥsāmarthyam tiyayam avyāpṛtau vikalpaḥ antaḥ
etasya vikalpa dvaya antasya parivarjana artham taila pradyota dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tadyathā kāśyapa tailapradyote kṛte tamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchati na khalu punaḥ kāśyapa tailapradyotasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvam andhakāraṃ vidhamāmīti /
analyzed: tat yathā kāśyapa taila pradyote kṛte tamaḥ andhakāram vigacchati na khalu punar kāśyapa taila pradyotasya evam bhavati aham sarvam andhakāram vidhamāmi iti

original: api tu khalu tailapradyotaṃ pratītya tamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchatīti /
analyzed: api tu khalu taila pradyotam pratītya tamaḥ andhakāram vigacchati iti

original: evam eva kāśyapa jñāna utpanne'jñānaṃ vigacchati na khalu punaḥ kāśyapa jñānasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham ajñānaṃ vidhamāmīti /
analyzed: evam eva kāśyapa jñāne utpanne ajñānam vigacchati na khalu punar kāśyapa jñānasya evam bhavati aham ajñānam vidhamāmi iti

original: api tu khalu jñānaṃ pratītyājñānaṃ vigacchatīti /
analyzed: api tu khalu jñānam pratītya ajñānam vigacchati iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati  yathā pradīpo vyāpāraśūnyas tamo'ndhakāravyudāsābhiprāyarahitaś ca punar yasmin pradeśe kriyate tasmāt pradeśāt pradīpasattāmātreṇa sarvatamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchatīti /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ vyāpāra śūnyaḥ tamaḥ andhakāra vyudāsa abhiprāya rahitaḥ ca punar yasmin pradeśe kriyate tasmāt pradeśāt pradīpa sattā mātreṇa sarva tamaḥ andhakāram vigacchati iti

original: evam eva yasmin santāne nirvikalpaṃ jñānam utpadyate tat sattāmātrasadbhāvād eva tasmāt santānād ajñānaṃ vigacchati jñānasya nirvikalpatvāt kriyā'bhāvārtheti /
analyzed: evam eva yasmin santāne nirvikalpam jñānam utpadyate tat sattā mātra sadbhāvāt eva tasmāt santānāt ajñānam vigacchati jñānasya nirvikalpa tvāt kriyā abhāva arthā iti

original: evaṃ jñānasya vyāpārābhāvāt sāmarthyābhāvāt sāmarrthyābhāvaḥ pradīpavat sattāmātreṇa pratipakṣanirākaraṇād iti /
analyzed: evam jñānasya vyāpāra abhāvāt sāmarthya abhāvāt sāmarrthya abhāvaḥ pradīpa vat sattā mātreṇa pratipakṣa nirākaraṇāt iti
a janma tve api vikalpaḥ antar sama kāla tve api
vikalpaḥ antaḥ iti anuvartate

original: katham ityata āha  yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati yatheyatā kālena notpannapūrvaḥ pratipakṣas tathedānīm api notpatsyata iti ayam ajanmatve vikalpo'ntaḥ /
analyzed: katham iti atas āha yadi pratipakṣasya anutpattim vā kalpayati yathā iyatā kālena na utpanna pūrvaḥ pratipakṣaḥ tathā idānīm api na utpatsyate iti ayam ajanma tve vikalpaḥ antaḥ
sat kleśasya vā dīrgha kāla tvam iti

original: na hy ajñāne jñānapratiyoginyavasthita eva jñānam utpattuṃ samarthaṃ /
analyzed: na hi ajñāne jñāna pratiyogini avasthite eva jñānam utpattum samartham

original: athāpi kathañcid utpadyeta tathāpi cirakālaviruddhatvād ajñānasya na jñānena tat kṣaṇikena vyudāsaḥ śakyate kartuṃ /
analyzed: atha api kathañcid utpadyeta tathā api cira kāla viruddha tvāt ajñānasya na jñānena tat kṣaṇikena vyudāsaḥ śakyate kartum
tatas ca san kleśa vyavadānayoḥ samāna kāla tvam iti

original: etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas tailapradyotadṛṣṭānta iti /
analyzed: etasya vikalpa dvaya antasya parivarjana artham dvitīyaḥ taila pradyota dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti

original: tadyathā kāśyapa gṛhe vā layane vā'vacarake vā varṣasahasrasyātyayān na kenacit tailapradyotaḥ kuto bhavati /
analyzed: tat yathā kāśyapa gṛhe vā layane vā avacarake vā varṣa sahasrasya atyayāt na kenacid taila pradyotaḥ kutas bhavati

original: atha tatra kaścid eva puruṣas tailapradyotaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: atha tatra kaścid eva puruṣaḥ taila pradyotam kuryāt

original: tat kiṃ manyase kāśyapāpi tu tamo'ndhākārasyaivaṃ bhaved varṣasahasrasañcito'haṃ nāham ato vigamiṣyāmīti /
analyzed: tat kim manyase kāśyapa api tu tamaḥ andha ākārasya evam bhavet varṣa sahasra sañcitaḥ aham na aham atas vigamiṣyāmi iti

original: āha  no bhagavan na hi tamo'ndhakārasya śaktir asti tailapradyote kṛte na vigantum avaśyaṃ tena vigantavyaṃ /
analyzed: āha no bhagavat na hi tamaḥ andhakārasya śaktiḥ asti taila pradyote kṛte na vigantum avaśyam tena vigantavyam

original: bhagavān āha  evam eva kāśyapa kalpaśatasahasrasañcito'pi karmakleśa ekena yoniśomanaskāreṇa vigacchati /
analyzed: bhagavān āha evam eva kāśyapa kalpa śata sahasra sañcitaḥ api karma kleśaḥ ekena yoniśas manaskāreṇa vigacchati

original: tailapradyota iti kāśyapa  idānīm ālambanānuttaryaṃ nirdeśāvasara ityata āha  ālambanānuttaryaṃ katamad iti /
analyzed: taila pradyotaḥ iti kāśyapaḥ idānīm ālambana ānuttaryam nirdeśa avasaraḥ iti atas āha ālambana ānuttaryam katamat iti

original: atas tannirdhāraṇārthaṃ bravīti  vyavasthānaṃ tathā dhātuḥ iti vistaraḥ /
analyzed: atas tad nirdhāraṇa artham bravīti vyavasthānam tathā dhātuḥ iti vistaraḥ

original: ityetad dvādaśavidham ālambanaṃ vyavasthānālambanam ārabhya yāvat prakarṣālambanaṃ /
analyzed: iti etat dvādaśavidham ālambanam vyavasthāna ālambanam ārabhya yāvat prakarṣa ālambanam
tad anya sarva ālambana utkṛṣṭa tvāt ālambana ānuttaryam ucyate

original: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmāste'pi buddhair bodhisattvaiś ca sattvānugrahārthaṃ vyavasthāpyanta iti vyavasthānaṃ /
analyzed: tatra prathamam ye pāramitā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ te api buddhaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ ca sattva anugraha artham vyavasthāpyante iti vyavasthānam

original: etad eva pradarśayan bhāṣyakāro'pyāha  dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānālambanam iti /
analyzed: etat eva pradarśayan bhāṣyakāraḥ api āha dharma prajñapti vyavasthāna ālambanam iti
dharmāṇām dāna pāramitā ādi bodhi pakṣa ārya satya ādīnām prajñaptiḥ dharma prajñaptiḥ

original: tayā vyavatiṣṭhate sā vā'tra vyavasthānam iti dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ /
analyzed: tayā vyavatiṣṭhate sā vā atra vyavasthānam iti dharma prajñapti vyavasthānam
abhisamaya ānukūlyāt ca atra vyavasthāna ālambana ādīnām ānupūrvīm draṣṭavyā iti
dvitīyam tathatā dharmadhātu paryāya tvāt
tṛtīya caturthe iti
tatra tṛtītam sādhya ālambanam caturtham sādhana ālambanam
te eva iti prathama dvitīye eva

original: yathākramam iti prathamaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
analyzed: yathākramam iti prathamam sādhya ālambanam dvitīyam sādhana ālambanam

original: tatraiva kāraṇam āha  dharmadhātuprativedhena pāramitādidharmādhigamād iti /
analyzed: tatra eva kāraṇam āha dharmadhātu prativedhena pāramitā ādi dharma adhigamāt iti

original: dharmadhātuprativedhād anāsravāḥ pāramitā adhigacchatītyataḥ sādhyālambanaṃ prathamaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ dvitīyam iti /
analyzed: dharmadhātu prativedhāt anāsravāḥ pāramitāḥ adhigacchati iti atas sādhya ālambanam prathamam sādhana ālambanam dvitīyam iti
tat śruta mayasya jñānasya

original: śrutamātreṇa pāramitādīn dharmān dharmadhātuñca dhārayatīti śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ dhāraṇety ucyate /
analyzed: śruta mātreṇa pāramitā ādīn dharmān dharmadhātum ca dhārayati iti śruta mayam jñānam dhāraṇā iti ucyate

original: tat punaḥ prathamam eva dvayaṃ vyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmādhātvālambanañca /
analyzed: tat punar prathamam eva dvayam vyavasthāna ālambanam dharma adhātu ālambanam ca
ṣaṣṭham cintā mayasya avagamya dhāraṇāt iti

original: apekṣākāryakāraṇopapattisādhanadharmatāyuktibhir avagamya śrutārthadhāraṇād avadhāraṇā cintāmayaṃ jñānaṃ tasyālambanam avadhāraṇālambanaṃ /
analyzed: apekṣā kārya kāraṇa upapatti sādhana dharma tā yuktibhiḥ avagamya śruta artha dhāraṇāt avadhāraṇā cintā mayam jñānam tasya ālambanam avadhāraṇa ālambanam
saptamam bhāvanā āmayasya ālambanam iti prakṛtam

original: pratyātmaṃ dhāraṇād iti pratyātmam arthasya  dhāraṇāt pradhāraṇā prathamabhūmipraveśaprāyogikaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ jñānaṃ /
analyzed: pratyātmam dhāraṇāt iti pratyātmam arthasya dhāraṇāt pradhāraṇā prathama bhūmi praveśa prāyogikam bhāvanā mayam jñānam
tat punar smṛti upasthānāni ārabhya yāvat balāni
tasya ālambanam pradhāraṇa ālambanam
aṣṭamam prathamāyām bhūmau darśana mārgasya iti
pratyātmam advayasya dharmadhātoḥ sarvatraga tva prativedhaḥ

original: athavā darśanaheyānāṃ kleśānām akliṣṭasya cājñānasya sarvatragārthaviṣayasya pratyanīko vedhaḥ prativedhaḥ /
analyzed: athavā darśana heyānām kleśānām akliṣṭasya ca ajñānasya sarvatraga artha viṣayasya pratyanīkaḥ vedhaḥ prativedhaḥ
sa punar darśana mārgaḥ
tasya ālambanam prativedha ālambanam

original: navamaṃ bhāvanāmārgasya yāvat saptamyāṃ bhūmāv iti /
analyzed: navamam bhāvanā mārgasya yāvat saptamyām bhūmau iti

original: tasyaiva dharmadhātuprativedhasyābhyāsād uttarottaraprakarṣaṃ gatiḥ pratānatā bhāvanāmārgo yāvat saptamyāṃ bhūmau /
analyzed: tasya eva dharmadhātu prativedhasya abhyāsāt uttarottara prakarṣam gatiḥ pratāna tā bhāvanā mārgaḥ yāvat saptamyām bhūmau
tasya bhāvanā mārgasya ālambanam pratāna tā ālambanam

original: daśamaṃ tatraiva laukikalokottarasya mārgasyālambanam iti prakṛtaṃ /
analyzed: daśamam tatra eva laukika lokottarasya mārgasya ālambanam iti prakṛtam

original: tasyām eva bhūmau sarvasūtrādidharmanimittaprakārādyabhiniveśavigamamukhena prakāreṇa dharmādhigamāt pragama iti /
analyzed: tasyām eva bhūmau sarva sūtra ādi dharma nimitta prakāra ādi abhiniveśa vigama mukhena prakāreṇa dharma adhigamāt pragamaḥ iti

original: sa eva bhāvanāmārga ucyate saptamyām eva bhūmau /
analyzed: saḥ eva bhāvanā mārgaḥ ucyate saptamyām eva bhūmau
pragamasya ālambanam pragama ālambanam
ekādaśa maṣṭamyām bhūmau

original: aṣṭamyāṃ hi bhūmau sarvanimittābhogamanasikāravigatasya svarasena praśaṭhabvahanāt sa eva bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭamyām hi bhūmau sarva nimitta ābhoga manasikāra vigatasya sva rasena saḥ eva bhāvanā mārgaḥ

daśamyām karma vaśitā prakarṣa lābhāt

original: evaṃ navamyādibhūmitraye jñānakarmaviśuddhiprakarṣagamanāt tad bhūmivyavasthitasya yadālambanaṃ tat prakarṣālambanam ucyate /

original: anyaḥ punar āha  mārgaprakarṣasyaiva mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedaṃ kṛtvā prakarṣālambanaṃ tisṛṣu bhūmiṣūktam iti /
analyzed: anyaḥ punar āha mārga prakarṣasya eva mṛdu madhya adhimātra bhedam kṛtvā prakarṣa ālambanam tisṛṣu bhūmiṣu uktam iti

original: tadeva hi prathamadvayaṃ tasyāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ tat tadālambananāma pratilabhata iti /
analyzed: tat eva hi prathama dvayam tasyām tasyām avasthāyām tat tad ālambana nāma pratilabhate iti

original: etac cālambanaṃ yad uta dharmavyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmadhātvālambanañca /

original: taccaitad ālambanadvayaṃ tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jñānāvasthāyāṃ tat tan nāma labhate /

evam yāvat prakarṣa ālambanam vaktavyam

original: navamyāṃ daśamyāṃ buddhabhūmau ca prakarṣāprāptaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tat pṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ ca laukikaṃ /

uktam ālambana ānuttaryam

original: tayā tayā pratipattyā samudānīyata iti samudāgamaḥ /
analyzed: tayā tayā pratipattyā samudānīyate iti samudāgamaḥ

original: tad anyebhyaḥ samudāgamebhyo viśiṣṭatvāt tataścānyasya samudāgamasya viśiṣṭābhāvād ānuttaryam ucyate /

original: tat pradarśanārtham āha  avaikalyāpratikṣepo vikṣepaś ca prapūraṇā /

original: teṣv āhṛteṣu gotraṃ samudāgaccyati sphītaṃ tad viśiṣṭataraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /

original: tat punaḥ satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāra ityevam ādayaḥ /

original: yadi gāmbhīryaudāryalakṣaṇamahāyānadharmaṃ na pratikṣipatyevam asya niścayasya dhāraṇātmikāyā adhimukteḥ puṣṭir bhavati /

original: yadutpāditabodhicittasya satsvapi bodhicittavyāvṛttipratyayeṣu śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam asya na krāmatyevam asya tad bodhicittaṃ puṣṭim āpadyate /
analyzed: yat utpādita bodhi cittasya satsu api bodhi citta vyāvṛtti pratyayeṣu śrāvaka yāne pratyekabuddha yāne vā cittam asya na krāmati evam asya tat bodhi cittam puṣṭim āpadyate

original: utpāditabodhicittānāṃ tadvaśād dānādipāramitānāṃ paripūryā sarvajñatā pratipattipuṣṭir bhavati /

original: tathā hy utpannadarśanamārgo niyato bhavati sugatau nirvāṇe ceti /

atas kuśala mūla nirūḍhiḥ sattva paripāka samudāgamaḥ

original: anye tvāhuḥ  evam asya sattvaparipākaḥ samudāgato bhavatiḥ yadyanena dīrghakālābhyāsamāgamya sattvasantāneṣu kuśalamūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ /

original: yat karmañatādhipatyena yathecchaṃ sphaṭikādimayaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ darśayatītyaścittakarmaṇyatā kṣetrapariśruddhisamudāgamaḥ //

original: { yānānuttaryapiṇḍārthaḥ }  yānānuttaryasya piṇḍārtha iti pūrvaṃ piṇḍārthākhyānaprayojanam ucyate /

iti

original: kim ityata āha  viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣtā ca iti /

a viparyāsānām piṇḍa arthaḥ

original: punar vyañjanā'viparyāsena śamathānimittaṃ pratividhyatīti saṃyogasvabhāvavigataṃ sākṣātkaroti /

original: arthāviparyāsena vipaśyanānimittaṃ dvayam api bhrāntimātratvena pratividhyati /

original: aviasārāviparyāsena viparyāsanimittaṃ māyādivad sadasattvānabhiniveśena saṃgṛhītaṃ karoti /

original: svalakṣaṇāviparyāsena tat pratipakṣeṇāvikalpam abhilāparahitaṃ dharmasvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /

original: aśuddhiśuddhimanaskārāviparyāsena tadāvaraṇaprahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ prajānāti prakṛtiprabhāsvarasya dharmadhātor āgantukopakleśakliṣṭatvāt /

original: tadāgantukatvāviparyāsena saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ prajānāti iti prakṛtiprabhāsvarasyānyathā saṃkleśasya vyavadānasya cāsambhavāt /

atra asa anunnati aviparyāsena pudgala dharma anabhiniveśataḥ nirāvaraṇaḥ niryāti iti
